original: @28b / rgya gar skad du /

analyzed: pa ra ma a'a di buddha aud dhri ta shr'i k'a la tsakra n'a ma tantra r'a dz'a /

original: bod skad du /

analyzed: mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas las phyung ba rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal dus kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba /

analyzed: dpal dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: thams cad mkhyan pa ye shes sku dang nyin mor byed pa'i sku ste padma'i 'dab ma rgyas pa'i spyan //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyan pa ye shes sku dang nyin mor byed pa'i sku ste padma'i 'dab ma rgyas pa'i spyan //

analyzed: sangs rgyas seng+ge'i khri la bzhugs pa lha mchog rnams kyis btud la rgyal po zla ba bzang po yis //

original: mgo @29a *// bos rab tu phyag 'tshal lag pa'i padma sbyar ba yan lag mchog la bzhag nas zhus pa ni //
analyzed: mgo @29a *// bos rab tu phyag 'tshal lag pa'i padma sbyar ba yan lag mchog la bzhag nas zhus pa ni //
translated: with his head fully bowing down, placing his lotus hands together on his supreme limb, asks:

original: rnal 'byor dpal ldan dus 'khor ka phreng ldan pa'i aa 'dus la ste mi rnams dgrol ba'i don du'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor dpal ldan dus 'khor ka phreng ldan pa'i aa 'dus la ste mi rnams dgrol ba'i don du'o //
translated: For the sake of liberating humans, in the glorious KƒÅlacakra yoga, the garland of the KƒÅlacakra, the assembly of the A,

original: stong pa ye shes kyang ste thig le mchog mchog rdo rje 'dzin pa sangs rgyas lha dang lha min yang //
analyzed: stong pa ye shes kyang ste thig le mchog mchog rdo rje 'dzin pa sangs rgyas lha dang lha min yang //
translated: The void, the intuition, the supreme drop, the supreme vajra-holder, the gods and demigods,üîΩThe external, the body, and the other, in the natures, the twenty-five principles, the body, the various measures, the three perfections, the array, the enjoyment of the gods and demigods,

original: phyi dang lus dang gzhan la yang ste rang bzhin rnams la skyes bu nyi shu lnga ba'i bdag nyid dang // lus la sna tshogs tshad dang srvid pa gsum gyi bkod pa lha dang lha min rnams kyi longs spyod dang // dkyil 'khor dang ni dbang ste skabs gsum pa dang mi yi bla mas 'di dag yang dag bshad du gsol //
analyzed: phyi dang lus dang gzhan la yang ste rang bzhin rnams la skyes bu nyi shu lnga ba'i bdag nyid dang // lus la sna tshogs tshad dang srvid pa gsum gyi bkod pa lha dang lha min rnams kyi longs spyod dang // dkyil 'khor dang ni dbang ste skabs gsum pa dang mi yi bla mas 'di dag yang dag bshad du gsol //
translated: The mandala, the consecration, the third section, and the lord of men, please explain these.üîΩO good moon, I am pleased with you, for this question of yours is not known to the supreme gods,

original: zla ba bzang po khyod la bdag mgu gang zhig khyod kyis dris pa 'di ni rab mchog lha rnams dang // mi dang srin po lha min klu dang chags bral thub mchog rigs rnams dag gis shes pa min pas so //
analyzed: zla ba bzang po khyod la bdag mgu gang zhig khyod kyis dris pa 'di ni rab mchog lha rnams dang // mi dang srin po lha min klu dang chags bral thub mchog rigs rnams dag gis shes pa min pas so //
translated: Nor to men, ogres, demigods, nagas, nor to the best of sages, the passionless, the clans.

original: mya ngan 'das pa la sogs 'dzin ma'i mthar thug tshig gi bgrod pa dang bcas sbyor ba mtha' dag ni //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das pa la sogs 'dzin ma'i mthar thug tshig gi bgrod pa dang bcas sbyor ba mtha' dag ni //
translated: The final limit of the earth, the holding of nirvana, etc., the entire path of words, the entire yoga,

original: lus dbus su ste dkyil 'khor dag dang dbang ni bshad par bya yi mi yi bdag po bzang po nyon //
analyzed: lus dbus su ste dkyil 'khor dag dang dbang ni bshad par bya yi mi yi bdag po bzang po nyon //
translated: The mandala and the consecration, O good king, will be explained to you.üîΩFrom the empty kalpas, wind, fire, water, earth, continents, mountains, oceans,üîΩthe zodiac, the sun, moon, stars, planets, sages, gods, spirits, nƒÅgas,

original: dus kyi stong pa rnams las rlung dang 'bar byed chu dang 'dzin ma gling dang ri bo rgya mtsho dang // rgyu skar ngang ni nyi zla skar ma gza' yi tshogs dang drang srong lha dang 'byung po klu rnams dang // dud 'gro skye gnas rnam pa bzhi dang sna tshogs sa dang 'og tu mi rnams dang ni dmyal ba yang //
analyzed: dus kyi stong pa rnams las rlung dang 'bar byed chu dang 'dzin ma gling dang ri bo rgya mtsho dang // rgyu skar ngang ni nyi zla skar ma gza' yi tshogs dang drang srong lha dang 'byung po klu rnams dang // dud 'gro skye gnas rnam pa bzhi dang sna tshogs sa dang 'og tu mi rnams dang ni dmyal ba yang //
translated: and the four types of animal birth, various lands, and below, humans and hell beings,

original: stong @29b pa'i dbus su yang dag 'byung ste chu la lan tshva dang ni sgo nga'i dbus su sgong skyes bzhin //
analyzed: stong @29b pa'i dbus su yang dag 'byung ste chu la lan tshva dang ni sgo nga'i dbus su sgong skyes bzhin //
translated: arise in the center of the thousand [worlds], like salt in water or an egg in the womb.üîΩThe body, gnosis, space, wind, fire, water, earth, the animate and inanimate,

original: lus dang ye shes nam mkha' dang ni rlung dang me dang chu dang sa dang brtan dang g-yo ba dang // lha ni mthong ba bskyed min dag dang srid pa rnam bcur gsungs pa rdo rje yi ni lus dag las //
analyzed: lus dang ye shes nam mkha' dang ni rlung dang me dang chu dang sa dang brtan dang g-yo ba dang // lha ni mthong ba bskyed min dag dang srid pa rnam bcur gsungs pa rdo rje yi ni lus dag las //
translated: and the gods are not generated by seeing. The ten existences are taught from the vajra body.

original: sngags kyi skye gnas dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur zhing mi yi bdag po slar yang 'di nyid du grol te //
analyzed: sngags kyi skye gnas dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur zhing mi yi bdag po slar yang 'di nyid du grol te //
translated: The mantras are born in the pure wombs, and the lord of men is liberated again in this very place.

original: de ltar gang gis yang dag rig pa de ni phyug min sems kyi kun tu rtog pa dag las grol //
analyzed: de ltar gang gis yang dag rig pa de ni phyug min sems kyi kun tu rtog pa dag las grol //
translated: Thus, he who is truly wise is not poor, for he is liberated from the thoughts of the mind.

original: g-yon gyi yan lag tu ni dkar po 'bar ba 'gro ba'i bdud rtsi'i cha dang g-yas su dmar po'i mdog /
analyzed: g-yon gyi yan lag tu ni dkar po 'bar ba 'gro ba'i bdud rtsi'i cha dang g-yas su dmar po'i mdog /
translated: On the left limb is the white flame, the portion of the nectar of the world, and on the right, the red color.

original: sgra gcan dus me zla ba nyi ma ri bong can gyi bu dang sa skyes dkar po bla ma dang // mjug ring dman pa char dang glog dang chu dang rtse mo can te 'bar ba rnams ni zung bdun po //
analyzed: sgra gcan dus me zla ba nyi ma ri bong can gyi bu dang sa skyes dkar po bla ma dang // mjug ring dman pa char dang glog dang chu dang rtse mo can te 'bar ba rnams ni zung bdun po //
translated: Rahu, KƒÅlƒÅgni, the moon, the sun, the son of the rabbit, ≈öukra, ≈öukre≈õvara, Ketu, the inferior, rain, lightning, water, and ≈öikhi‚Äîthe seven pairs are blazing.

original: 'jig rten la ni gnas pa nyid de mun pa med pa zung gcig dag ni mun pa'i mtha' la 'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten la ni gnas pa nyid de mun pa med pa zung gcig dag ni mun pa'i mtha' la 'o //
translated: They abide in the world itself, the two pairs without darkness at the end of the darkness.

original: rgyab tu ser po yang ni skar ma lha gzhu sa ste de ni rnam bzhi gnyis kyi dbye bas so //
analyzed: rgyab tu ser po yang ni skar ma lha gzhu sa ste de ni rnam bzhi gnyis kyi dbye bas so //
translated: In the back, the yellow is also the celestial bow of the stars, the earth, divided into four pairs.

original: srog ces bya ba gcig pu'i rlung ni rnam bcur 'gyur te spyi bo rtsa ba dag dang mdun du 'o //
analyzed: srog ces bya ba gcig pu'i rlung ni rnam bcur 'gyur te spyi bo rtsa ba dag dang mdun du 'o //
translated: The single wind called ‚Äúlife‚Äù becomes tenfold, in the head, the base, and in front.

original: dbus kyi rdo rje'i steng du sa bon rang gi nus pa yon tan tshogs dang bcas pa'i 'og tu gnas //
analyzed: dbus kyi rdo rje'i steng du sa bon rang gi nus pa yon tan tshogs dang bcas pa'i 'og tu gnas //
translated: The seed syllable is below the assembly of qualities of one‚Äôs own power, on top of the central vajra.

original: kun tu ye shes dang ni stong pa'o zhi ba gnas dang bcas pa dngos po kun gyis rnam par grol //
analyzed: kun tu ye shes dang ni stong pa'o zhi ba gnas dang bcas pa dngos po kun gyis rnam par grol //
translated: The all-knowing one, emptiness, peace, together with the abode, is liberated from all things.

original: aa sogs sum cu'i dbyangs gang ha ya ra wa lar ldan de dag zla ba'i cha dang nyin byed kyang //
analyzed: aa sogs sum cu'i dbyangs gang ha ya ra wa lar ldan de dag zla ba'i cha dang nyin byed kyang //
translated: The thirty vowels beginning with a, endowed with ya, ra, la, and va, are the lunar digits and the sun.

original: ka la sogs pa'i sde rnams dbyangs @30a *//
analyzed: ka la sogs pa'i sde rnams dbyangs @30a *//
translated: The groups of consonants beginning with ka,

original: dang bcas pa nyin zhag stong drug me yi tshad kyis spyod par byed //
analyzed: dang bcas pa nyin zhag stong drug me yi tshad kyis spyod par byed //
translated: together with the vowels, are the measure of the sixteen thousand breaths, by which one should practice.üîΩThe vowels beginning with ha are the hours, the abodes of gods, humans, serpents, and bh≈´tas.

original: ha sogs dbyangs rnams dag kyang chu tshod lha mi gdengs can 'byung po'i skye gnas dag kyang sngags shes pa; ;aa sogs ka sogs ldan pa dag las de ltar khams gsum dag ni nges par skyed 'gyur mi yi bdag /
analyzed: ha sogs dbyangs rnams dag kyang chu tshod lha mi gdengs can 'byung po'i skye gnas dag kyang sngags shes pa; ;aa sogs ka sogs ldan pa dag las de ltar khams gsum dag ni nges par skyed 'gyur mi yi bdag /
translated: The three realms are definitely generated from the vowels and consonants beginning with a and ka, O lord of men.

original: dbyangs ni ka tsa ta pa ta ra ldan ka la sogs pa yang dag sbyar ba rnams kyi skye ba'i gnas //
analyzed: dbyangs ni ka tsa ta pa ta ra ldan ka la sogs pa yang dag sbyar ba rnams kyi skye ba'i gnas //
translated: The vowels are the places of origin of the gutturals, palatals, cerebrals, dentals, and labials, which are endowed with the gutturals, etc.

original: mgrin rkan steng gi cha ni mkha' rlung bsreg bya las skyes mchu dang so ni chu dang sa dag go /
analyzed: mgrin rkan steng gi cha ni mkha' rlung bsreg bya las skyes mchu dang so ni chu dang sa dag go /
translated: The throat, palate, and upper part are born from space, wind, and fire; the lips and teeth are born from water and earth.

original: aa sogs rnams ni gtsug tor 'khor lo snying mgrin mgo bo lte ba'i 'khor lo dag la rim pa ste //
analyzed: aa sogs rnams ni gtsug tor 'khor lo snying mgrin mgo bo lte ba'i 'khor lo dag la rim pa ste //
translated: The a, etc., are in the head, wheel, heart, throat, head, and navel wheels, respectively.

original: sna tshogs nag dmar ri bong can dang gser 'dra phung po khams kyi lhag pa'i lha dang ldan pa la'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs nag dmar ri bong can dang gser 'dra phung po khams kyi lhag pa'i lha dang ldan pa la'o //
translated: The black, red, moon, and gold-like [elements] are endowed with the aggregates, elements, and overlords.

original: rlung gi mtha' nas lhun po'i mtshams su dmyal ba gdengs can grong khyer la ni dpag tshad 'bum phrag gnyis //
analyzed: rlung gi mtha' nas lhun po'i mtshams su dmyal ba gdengs can grong khyer la ni dpag tshad 'bum phrag gnyis //
translated: From the end of the wind [mandala] to the end of Meru, the hells and the city of the nƒÅgas extend for two hundred thousand leagues.

original: lhun po'i tshad ni 'bum phrag gcig ste gza' yi tshogs kyi gnas nas stong phrag dag ni nyi shu lnga; ;mgrin pa'o gdong la lnga bcu brtan pa'i go 'phang g-yo med dag la de bzhin nyid du nyi shu lnga //
analyzed: lhun po'i tshad ni 'bum phrag gcig ste gza' yi tshogs kyi gnas nas stong phrag dag ni nyi shu lnga; ;mgrin pa'o gdong la lnga bcu brtan pa'i go 'phang g-yo med dag la de bzhin nyid du nyi shu lnga //
translated: Meru is one hundred thousand [leagues], and from the abode of the planets up to the throat, twenty-five thousand [leagues]. The face is fifty [leagues], and the immovable stage is twenty-five [leagues].

original: de yi phyi rol stong pa gcig tu srid pa gsum bral yon tan med cing de nyid kyis dman pa'o //
analyzed: de yi phyi rol stong pa gcig tu srid pa gsum bral yon tan med cing de nyid kyis dman pa'o //
translated: Outside of that, the single empty shell, devoid of qualities, is inferior to that.

original: rlung gi mtha' nas rlung gi mtshams dang brtan pa 'dzin ma'i gzhi la snying dang ri dang rgya mtsho rnams //
analyzed: rlung gi mtha' nas rlung gi mtshams dang brtan pa 'dzin ma'i gzhi la snying dang ri dang rgya mtsho rnams //
translated: From the edge of the wind, up to the edge of the wind, on the firm base of the earth, are the heart, the mountains, and the oceans.

original: bzhi phyed 'bum phrag gnyis te rtse mo can dang g-yo ba'i @30b dkyil 'khor dpag tshad dag ni 'bum phrag gnyis //
analyzed: bzhi phyed 'bum phrag gnyis te rtse mo can dang g-yo ba'i @30b dkyil 'khor dpag tshad dag ni 'bum phrag gnyis //
translated: Two hundred thousand yojanas, with Meru at the center, and the moving ma·πá·∏çala is two hundred thousand yojanas.

original: dbus na lhun po gang gi steng du khyim gyi 'khor lo skar bcas nyin dang mtshan mor 'khor ba ste //
analyzed: dbus na lhun po gang gi steng du khyim gyi 'khor lo skar bcas nyin dang mtshan mor 'khor ba ste //
translated: In the center is Meru, on top of which is the wheel of the house with the stars, moving day and night.

original: cha drug la ni 'bum phrag gnyis gnyis srid gsum mtha' dag dus kyi sbyor ba dag las rab tu skyes //
analyzed: cha drug la ni 'bum phrag gnyis gnyis srid gsum mtha' dag dus kyi sbyor ba dag las rab tu skyes //
translated: In six parts, two hundred thousand yojanas, all three existences are produced from the conjunction of time.

original: 'jig rten khams kyi kun nas 'khor yug tu ni thad ka'i tshad kyi sum 'gyur du yang 'gyur ba ste //
analyzed: 'jig rten khams kyi kun nas 'khor yug tu ni thad ka'i tshad kyi sum 'gyur du yang 'gyur ba ste //
translated: The circumference of the world system is three times the direct measurement.

original: sa yi khor yug 'bum phrag gsum dang chu me rlung rnams kyi ni drug dgu nyi ma rim pas so //
analyzed: sa yi khor yug 'bum phrag gsum dang chu me rlung rnams kyi ni drug dgu nyi ma rim pas so //
translated: The circumference of the earth is three hundred thousand yojanas, and the circumferences of water, fire, and wind are six, nine, and twelve hundred thousand yojanas, respectively.

original: mi yi dbang po phyi rol srid pa gsum gyi gnas la dpag tshad 'bum phrag gcig nyid gang yin pa //
analyzed: mi yi dbang po phyi rol srid pa gsum gyi gnas la dpag tshad 'bum phrag gcig nyid gang yin pa //
translated: One hundred thousand yojanas is the extent of the external abodes of the three realms of desire.

original: de ni sa yi steng gi gnas su lus la rang rang dag gi tshad kyis yang dag khru gang ngo //üîΩphra rab brgyad rnams dag gis phra mo 'di gcig phra mo brgyad kyis skra yi rtse mo phra mo ste //
analyzed: de ni sa yi steng gi gnas su lus la rang rang dag gi tshad kyis yang dag khru gang ngo // phra rab brgyad rnams dag gis phra mo 'di gcig phra mo brgyad kyis skra yi rtse mo phra mo ste //
translated: That is the extent of the abodes of the earth, in terms of the bodies of the beings there.üîΩEight paramƒÅ·πáus is one a·πáu. Eight a·πáus is one louse egg.

original: 'di rnams kyis ni ske tshe shig dang nas ta lto 'gro nas kyis sor mo nyi ma ni //
analyzed: 'di rnams kyis ni ske tshe shig dang nas ta lto 'gro nas kyis sor mo nyi ma ni //
translated: Eight of those is one louse. Eight of those is one barley seed. Eight of those is one finger width.

original: zung gi sa khru 'o khru bzhis gzhu ste 'dir ni stong phrag gnyis kyi gzhu yis rgyang grags dag tu 'gyur //
analyzed: zung gi sa khru 'o khru bzhis gzhu ste 'dir ni stong phrag gnyis kyi gzhu yis rgyang grags dag tu 'gyur //
translated: Two finger widths is one upama. Four upama is one cubit. Four cubits is one hasta. Four hasta is one kro≈õa.

original: rgyang grags bzhi rnams dag gis dpag tshad de yi lha yul sa dang nam mkha' dag la tshad yin no //
analyzed: rgyang grags bzhi rnams dag gis dpag tshad de yi lha yul sa dang nam mkha' dag la tshad yin no //
translated: Four kro≈õa is one yojana. That is the measure of the abodes of the gods, the abodes of the earth, and the abodes of space.

original: dang por chos bzang bskal pa zung ni zung dang ldan pa dag ste tshangs dang 'jig rten 'das pa dang // dpal gyi bskal pa dkar po'i bskal pa yang ste shin tu dbang gyur gnas nas 'dod pa bcu gcig go /
analyzed: dang por chos bzang bskal pa zung ni zung dang ldan pa dag ste tshangs dang 'jig rten 'das pa dang // dpal gyi bskal pa dkar po'i bskal pa yang ste shin tu dbang gyur gnas nas 'dod pa bcu gcig go /
translated: First, the good aeon, the pair of aeons, the pair endowed with Brahma and beyond the world, the glorious aeon, and the white aeon‚Äîthese are the eleven desires in the abode of complete mastery.

original: gzugs med dag ni aa sogs bzhi po ha 'khrig bral ba rnams te ai la sogs pa bcu drug gzugs /
analyzed: gzugs med dag ni aa sogs bzhi po ha 'khrig bral ba rnams te ai la sogs pa bcu drug gzugs /
translated: The four beginning with A in the formless realm are free from sexual union. The sixteen beginning with I are form.

original: @31a *// ha sogs la mtha' yang ni 'dod pa rnam bcur rab tu gsal te gsal byed gcig pa ka sa 'o //
analyzed: @31a *// ha sogs la mtha' yang ni 'dod pa rnam bcur rab tu gsal te gsal byed gcig pa ka sa 'o //
translated: The final H and so on are clearly the ten desires. The single sibilant is the ka section.

original: srid pa sum cu rtsa gcig dag gis 'dir ni srid gsum du 'gyur khams kyi dbye bas khams gsum mo //
analyzed: srid pa sum cu rtsa gcig dag gis 'dir ni srid gsum du 'gyur khams kyi dbye bas khams gsum mo //
translated: Here, the three existences are the three existences with the thirty-one existences. The three realms are the three realms by the division of the realms.

original: srid gsum ma lus 'di yang rdo rje gsum du 'gyur te aa sogs ka sogs rab tu dbye bas so //
analyzed: srid gsum ma lus 'di yang rdo rje gsum du 'gyur te aa sogs ka sogs rab tu dbye bas so //
translated: Also, this entire triple existence is the three vajras, by the division of the A and so on and the ka and so on.

original: rin chen snang nas gseg ma'i chu ni dmyal bar nges par brjod de bye ma'i chu ni gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: rin chen snang nas gseg ma'i chu ni dmyal bar nges par brjod de bye ma'i chu ni gnyis pa'o //
translated: The jewel appearance, the gravel water, is said to be hell. The sand water is the second.

original: 'dam gyi chu dang mi bzad du ba dag dang me dang mun pa dang ni ngu 'bod bdun pa dang // lan tshva chang dang chu dang 'o ma zho dang mar dang sbrang rtsi'i rgya mtsho bdun te ri bo ni //
analyzed: 'dam gyi chu dang mi bzad du ba dag dang me dang mun pa dang ni ngu 'bod bdun pa dang // lan tshva chang dang chu dang 'o ma zho dang mar dang sbrang rtsi'i rgya mtsho bdun te ri bo ni //
translated: salt, liquor, water, milk, curd, butter, and honey‚Äîthese are the seven oceans, and the mountains are

original: 'od sngon mandha ra ri ni sha ta dang nor bu'i 'od dang dro na bsil ri rdo rje 'o //
analyzed: 'od sngon mandha ra ri ni sha ta dang nor bu'i 'od dang dro na bsil ri rdo rje 'o //
translated: blue, Mandara, Sahasrapatra, Manikira, Upa≈õƒÅnta, Vajra,üîΩCandraloka, Sitaprabha, KusumƒÅgra, Ki·πÉnara, and Hamsa.

original: gling ni zla ba 'od dkar dag dang rab mchog ku sha dang ni mi 'am ci dang khrung khrung dang // drag po yang ni longs spyod sa ste bdun pa dzambu mi rnams gnas pa dag ni las kyis //
analyzed: gling ni zla ba 'od dkar dag dang rab mchog ku sha dang ni mi 'am ci dang khrung khrung dang // drag po yang ni longs spyod sa ste bdun pa dzambu mi rnams gnas pa dag ni las kyis //
translated: The seventh is the mountain of enjoyment, Jamb≈´, where humans dwell, by their karma.

original: shar du rlung ni shin tu zlum por 'gyur te mi yi bdag po lho ru me ni gru gsum mo //
analyzed: shar du rlung ni shin tu zlum por 'gyur te mi yi bdag po lho ru me ni gru gsum mo //
translated: In the east, the wind is perfectly round; in the south, O King, the fire is triangular;

original: byang du chu ni phyed kyi zla ba dag dang nub tu gser mchog sa ni chu yi gter gyi zur //
analyzed: byang du chu ni phyed kyi zla ba dag dang nub tu gser mchog sa ni chu yi gter gyi zur //
translated: in the north, the water is a half-moon; in the west, the supreme gold land is the corner of the ocean.

original: ri rab lhun po stong pa'i rnam pa rdo rje mchog gi rang bzhin dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbus su ste //
analyzed: ri rab lhun po stong pa'i rnam pa rdo rje mchog gi rang bzhin dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbus su ste //
translated: In the middle of the ma·πá·∏çalas, which are the nature of the supreme vajra, are the forms of the thousand Sumeru mountains.

original: sa yi steng du dpag tshad stong phrag rnams ni ri dang klu dang gza' dang phyogs rnams dag tu 'gyur //üîΩlhun po yi ni steng gi rgya dang sa gzhi dag gi gnas la dpag tshad @31b rnams kyi stong phrag ni //
analyzed: sa yi steng du dpag tshad stong phrag rnams ni ri dang klu dang gza' dang phyogs rnams dag tu 'gyur // lhun po yi ni steng gi rgya dang sa gzhi dag gi gnas la dpag tshad @31b rnams kyi stong phrag ni //
translated: On the earth, there are thousands of yojanas for the mountains, nƒÅgas, planets, and directions.

original: lnga bcu bcu drug dag go gcig ni rab mchog sa yi gzhi la khor yug dag gi yang dag ste //
analyzed: lnga bcu bcu drug dag go gcig ni rab mchog sa yi gzhi la khor yug dag gi yang dag ste //
translated: Above Sumeru, the extent of the ground is fifty-six thousand yojanas, and the supreme earth is surrounded by CakravƒÅ·∏ça.

original: rva ni lnga po rnams dag steng dang sa gzhi dag gi gnas la phyogs kun du ni khor yug go /
analyzed: rva ni lnga po rnams dag steng dang sa gzhi dag gi gnas la phyogs kun du ni khor yug go /
translated: There are five peaks, and all around, on the ground, is CakravƒÅ·∏ça.

original: de yi phyi rol gling dang ri bo dag dang chu gter rnams te phyogs rnams kun tu me dang rlung //
analyzed: de yi phyi rol gling dang ri bo dag dang chu gter rnams te phyogs rnams kun tu me dang rlung //
translated: Beyond that are the continents, mountains, and oceans, in all directions, with fire and wind.

original: chu gter drug po thams cad kyang ni zla ba zla ba gcig gis dman pa'i stong phrag re re ste //
analyzed: chu gter drug po thams cad kyang ni zla ba zla ba gcig gis dman pa'i stong phrag re re ste //
translated: All six oceans are each one thousand less than the previous one, with each one decreasing by one thousand yojanas.

original: gling rnams dang ni ri rgyud mchog rnams dag kyang de lta'i stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga ni //
analyzed: gling rnams dang ni ri rgyud mchog rnams dag kyang de lta'i stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga ni //
translated: The islands and the best of the mountain ranges are twenty-four thousand [leagues].

original: dzambu'i gling gi yangs pa dag dang lan tshva'i chu yi gter ni 'bum phrag phyed kyi tshad yin te //
analyzed: dzambu'i gling gi yangs pa dag dang lan tshva'i chu yi gter ni 'bum phrag phyed kyi tshad yin te //
translated: The breadth of Jambudvƒ´pa and the ocean of salt water is one hundred thousand [leagues].

original: srid pa gsum po 'dzin pa yi ni mtha' ma dag gi me dang rlung gi tshad dag de bzhin no //
analyzed: srid pa gsum po 'dzin pa yi ni mtha' ma dag gi me dang rlung gi tshad dag de bzhin no //
translated: The measure of the fire and wind [elements] is the same up to the end of the three existences.

original: tshangs pa'i gnas su dus kyi 'khor lo rgyal ba mchog bcas lha yi tshogs kyis yang dag bstod pa ste //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i gnas su dus kyi 'khor lo rgyal ba mchog bcas lha yi tshogs kyis yang dag bstod pa ste //
translated: In the realm of BrahmƒÅ, the divine assembly praises the supreme Victor, the Wheel of Time.üîΩOn Meru are the hosts of the G313333

original: lhun po la ni tshigs mda'i tshogs dang sa gzhi'i 'og na gnas pa klu rnams dag ni rigs lnga'o //
analyzed: lhun po la ni tshigs mda'i tshogs dang sa gzhi'i 'og na gnas pa klu rnams dag ni rigs lnga'o //
translated: s and the five classes of nƒÅgas dwelling beneath the earth.

original: dpal ldan lhun po'i phyogs rnams kun tu sa yi dkyil 'khor la son gnas rnams kun dang nye ba'i gnas //
analyzed: dpal ldan lhun po'i phyogs rnams kun tu sa yi dkyil 'khor la son gnas rnams kun dang nye ba'i gnas //
translated: In all directions of glorious Meru, on the surface of the earth, are the abodes, the subsidiary abodes,

original: zhing dang 'dun pa dag dang 'dus pa can dang ro khang gnas ni me dang rlung gi mtshams kyi mthar //
analyzed: zhing dang 'dun pa dag dang 'dus pa can dang ro khang gnas ni me dang rlung gi mtshams kyi mthar //
translated: the fields, the parks, and the assembly halls, up to the end of the southeast.

original: shar du brgya byin mer ni me lha gshin rje bden bral nub phyogs su ni gshin rje srin po chu /
analyzed: shar du brgya byin mer ni me lha gshin rje bden bral nub phyogs su ni gshin rje srin po chu /
translated: Indra in the east, Agni in the south, Yama in the west, and RƒÅk·π£asa in the north,

original: rlung dang nor sbyin 'phrog byed phyogs su rlung dang gnod sbyin drag po steng gi cha dang 'og tu yang //
analyzed: rlung dang nor sbyin 'phrog byed phyogs su rlung dang gnod sbyin drag po steng gi cha dang 'og tu yang //
translated: VƒÅyu in the northeast, Yak·π£a in the southeast, Varu·πáa in the southwest, and Bh≈´ta in the northwest.

original: tshangs dang khyab 'jug mtshon @32a *//
analyzed: tshangs dang khyab 'jug mtshon @32a *//
translated: BrahmƒÅ and Vi·π£·πáu are in the upper and lower directions,

original: ldan 'khor gyi skye bo dang bcas rang rang phyogs ni srung zhing skyong ba ste //
analyzed: ldan 'khor gyi skye bo dang bcas rang rang phyogs ni srung zhing skyong ba ste //
translated: respectively, holding their weapons. They protect and guard their respective directions, along with their retinues.

original: de yi dbus su dus kyi 'khor lo rgyal ba mchog gi skyed mdzad gzhom du med pa rdo rje'i sku //
analyzed: de yi dbus su dus kyi 'khor lo rgyal ba mchog gi skyed mdzad gzhom du med pa rdo rje'i sku //
translated: In the center of that is the invincible, vajra body of the supreme Victor, KƒÅlacakra, the creator.

original: lhun po'i rgyab kyi phyogs rnams su ni sa gzhi dag la lha min rnams kyis rgyal bar dka' ba 'khor //üîΩgang du chos ni rnam par nyams shing rtsod dus 'jug pa de dang der ni rab tu bgrod par byed //
analyzed: lhun po'i rgyab kyi phyogs rnams su ni sa gzhi dag la lha min rnams kyis rgyal bar dka' ba 'khor // gang du chos ni rnam par nyams shing rtsod dus 'jug pa de dang der ni rab tu bgrod par byed //
translated: In the regions behind Mount Meru, the demigods have an army that is difficult for the victors to conquer on the ground.üîΩWherever the Dharma declines and the age of strife enters, there he goes.

original: kla klo rnams kyang g-yul du bcom ste rang gi chos la dgod pa byas nas mdun du rnam par rgyu //
analyzed: kla klo rnams kyang g-yul du bcom ste rang gi chos la dgod pa byas nas mdun du rnam par rgyu //
translated: Having conquered the barbarians in battle and established them in their own Dharma, he proceeds.

original: rdzogs ldan gsum ldan gnyis ldan dag dang rtsod dus gzhan ni dus kyi sbyor ba dag gis 'byung bar 'gyur; ;dum bu gang du stobs ldan 'khor lo can te rab tu zhugs pa der ni rdzogs ldan dus bgrod de //
analyzed: rdzogs ldan gsum ldan gnyis ldan dag dang rtsod dus gzhan ni dus kyi sbyor ba dag gis 'byung bar 'gyur; ;dum bu gang du stobs ldan 'khor lo can te rab tu zhugs pa der ni rdzogs ldan dus bgrod de //
translated: In whatever part of the world a powerful cakravartin king appears, that part of the world is an age of completeness.

original: rgyal po'i rgyab tu gsum ldan rtsod pa'i dus kyang mdun dag tu ste gnyis kyi bar du gnyis ldan no //
analyzed: rgyal po'i rgyab tu gsum ldan rtsod pa'i dus kyang mdun dag tu ste gnyis kyi bar du gnyis ldan no //
translated: The age of completeness is behind the king, the age of conflict is in front, and the age of three-fourths and the age of two-fourths are in between.

original: dus rnams dag gi lo yi tshad ni stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig ro brgya dag dang bcas pa ste //
analyzed: dus rnams dag gi lo yi tshad ni stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig ro brgya dag dang bcas pa ste //
translated: The measure of the ages is twenty-one thousand years, together with a remainder of one hundred years.

original: re re dag gi tshad ni dus dang mda' yis bsgyur ba'i mi rnams dag gi lo brgya gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: re re dag gi tshad ni dus dang mda' yis bsgyur ba'i mi rnams dag gi lo brgya gang yin pa'o //
translated: The measure of each age is one hundred human years, multiplied by the measure of the age, and then divided by the measure of a divine day.

original: phra dbugs dhu dang chu tshod nyin zhag dhu dang dus bzhi dag ni stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig dang // drug brgya rnams ni rim pas lus skyes phra dang mi dang 'byung po lha dang lha min rnams dang ni //
analyzed: phra dbugs dhu dang chu tshod nyin zhag dhu dang dus bzhi dag ni stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig dang // drug brgya rnams ni rim pas lus skyes phra dang mi dang 'byung po lha dang lha min rnams dang ni //
translated: Twenty-one thousand and six hundred years, respectively, are the measure of the ages of the gods of the Caturmaharajakas, etc., up to Akanistha, and of the gods of Brahma‚Äôs group, etc.

original: nus dang gtso bo'i nyin zhag gcig gi tshad des gzhi dag la ni dus bzhi nus pa'i tshad du 'jug /
analyzed: nus dang gtso bo'i nyin zhag gcig gi tshad des gzhi dag la ni dus bzhi nus pa'i tshad du 'jug /
translated: By that measure of a day of power and of the principal, in the base, it enters the measure of the power of the four times.

original: dum bu dum bur zhi ba'i go 'phang 'khor lo can bgrod nyin zhag @32b gcig la nyi ma bcu gnyis so //
analyzed: dum bu dum bur zhi ba'i go 'phang 'khor lo can bgrod nyin zhag @32b gcig la nyi ma bcu gnyis so //
translated: In the case of the one who travels in the wheel of the peace of the parts, in one day there are twelve suns.

original: phyogs dang zla ba mtha' dag dang ni dus dang dus bzhi dang ni me dus bgrod pa rnam pa gnyis //
analyzed: phyogs dang zla ba mtha' dag dang ni dus dang dus bzhi dang ni me dus bgrod pa rnam pa gnyis //
translated: The directions, the full moon, the end, the time, the four times, and the time of fire are the two kinds of travel.

original: rgyal po lo ni mtha' dag rjes su nyin zhag dus sbyor chu tshod dag dang chu yi srang rnams te //
analyzed: rgyal po lo ni mtha' dag rjes su nyin zhag dus sbyor chu tshod dag dang chu yi srang rnams te //
translated: The king, in all the years, in the sequence of the days, the muh≈´rtas, the gha·π≠is, and the palas.

original: 'di rnams de ltar bgrod pa lus skyes phra dang mi dang 'byung po lha dang lha min rnams dang ni //
analyzed: 'di rnams de ltar bgrod pa lus skyes phra dang mi dang 'byung po lha dang lha min rnams dang ni //
translated: These are the travels in that way in the body, the subtle, the human, the bh≈´tas, the gods, and the asuras.

original: nus dang gtso bo'i zhag re la ste srid pa gsum gyi gnas kyi gnas dang lus kyi dbus su de bzhin no //
analyzed: nus dang gtso bo'i zhag re la ste srid pa gsum gyi gnas kyi gnas dang lus kyi dbus su de bzhin no //
translated: In the day of power and of the principal, in the place of the three existences, in the middle of the body, in the same way.

original: lo 'di nas ni drug brgya'i lo yis gsal bar mi bdag grags pa shambha la zhes bya bar 'byung //
analyzed: lo 'di nas ni drug brgya'i lo yis gsal bar mi bdag grags pa shambha la zhes bya bar 'byung //
translated: From this year, in six hundred years, the king will be known as ≈öambhala.

original: de nas klu yi lo brgya rnams kyis nges par me kha'i yul du kla klo'i chos dag rab tu 'jug /
analyzed: de nas klu yi lo brgya rnams kyis nges par me kha'i yul du kla klo'i chos dag rab tu 'jug /
translated: Then, in the one hundred years of the nƒÅgas, the religion of the barbarians will certainly spread in the land of Magadha.

original: de yi dus su 'dzin ma la ni nyung ngu'i byed pa gsal bar mi rnams dag gis rig par bya //
analyzed: de yi dus su 'dzin ma la ni nyung ngu'i byed pa gsal bar mi rnams dag gis rig par bya //
translated: At that time, the people will know that the influence of the sun is diminished.

original: mtha' dag sa gzhi la ni grub pa'i mtha' rnams rnam par nyams pa dus kyi sbyor ba la 'byung 'gyur //
analyzed: mtha' dag sa gzhi la ni grub pa'i mtha' rnams rnam par nyams pa dus kyi sbyor ba la 'byung 'gyur //
translated: The entire earth will be afflicted by the degeneration of the tenets, which will occur due to the conjunctions of the planets.

original: me mkha' rgya mtsho rnams la rab byung la sogs 'das pa rnams bsres kla klo'i dbang po'i lo ni rab tu grub //
analyzed: me mkha' rgya mtsho rnams la rab byung la sogs 'das pa rnams bsres kla klo'i dbang po'i lo ni rab tu grub //
translated: The years of the barbarian kings will be established by mixing the past years of the ascetics and so forth of the fire, sky, and ocean.

original: kla klo dbang po'i lo ni lag pa gdengs can zla bas dman pa'i lhag ma dag kyang nyi mas bsgyur //
analyzed: kla klo dbang po'i lo ni lag pa gdengs can zla bas dman pa'i lhag ma dag kyang nyi mas bsgyur //
translated: The years of the barbarian kings are the remainder of the months of the outstretched hand, less the moon, multiplied by the sun.

original: nag pa la sogs zla ba bsres te 'og tu dus kyis bsgyur ba mkha' me zla bas rnam par dbye //
analyzed: nag pa la sogs zla ba bsres te 'og tu dus kyis bsgyur ba mkha' me zla bas rnam par dbye //
translated: The months of the dark half and so forth are mixed with the moon and multiplied below by the time, divided by the sky, fire, and moon.

original: rnyed pa steng du bsres pa dag ni mi yi bdag po zla ba'i tshogs pa rnam par dag par 'gyur //
analyzed: rnyed pa steng du bsres pa dag ni mi yi bdag po zla ba'i tshogs pa rnam par dag par 'gyur //
translated: The sum of the above is the pure collection of the months of the lord of men.

original: zla ba gnas gsum gyur pa'i dbus ma'i phung po dag la gang gnas lag pa rtse mo can gyis bsgyur //
analyzed: zla ba gnas gsum gyur pa'i dbus ma'i phung po dag la gang gnas lag pa rtse mo can gyis bsgyur //
translated: The middle of the three heaps of the moon in the three places, multiplied by the tip of the hand, is the correction.

original: @33a *// rtsa ba dag la drug gi chas rnyed de yang bu lon du 'gyur dbus ma la ni sbyang bar bya //
analyzed: @33a *// rtsa ba dag la drug gi chas rnyed de yang bu lon du 'gyur dbus ma la ni sbyang bar bya //
translated: The root is found by the sixth part, and that is the debt. The middle is to be purified.

original: steng 'og dag las mig dang sum cu'i nor ni bsres pa gsal bar bya sta drug cu'i cha dag gis //
analyzed: steng 'og dag las mig dang sum cu'i nor ni bsres pa gsal bar bya sta drug cu'i cha dag gis //
translated: The eye and the thirty of the upper and lower [parts] are mixed, and the clear is made by the sixty parts.

original: rnyed pa steng du rab bsres thub pa mchog rnams dag gis bcad pa'i lhag ma dag ni gza' ru 'gyur //
analyzed: rnyed pa steng du rab bsres thub pa mchog rnams dag gis bcad pa'i lhag ma dag ni gza' ru 'gyur //
translated: The upper part, well mixed, is the remainder cut by the supreme sages. That is the planet.

original: gnas gnyis nyi zla bsres pa dag las dus dang nyi mas thob la 'byung ba bsres pa mtha' dag ni //
analyzed: gnas gnyis nyi zla bsres pa dag las dus dang nyi mas thob la 'byung ba bsres pa mtha' dag ni //
translated: The two places, the sun and moon, are mixed. The time and the sun are obtained. The entire mixture of the elements

original: de yi steng gi phung por sbyin te dang po lag pas bsgyur la'o brgyad dang gnyis kyis phye ba tshogs //
analyzed: de yi steng gi phung por sbyin te dang po lag pas bsgyur la'o brgyad dang gnyis kyis phye ba tshogs //
translated: is given to the upper heap. The first is multiplied by the hand. The division by eight and two is the collection.

original: gnas gsum dbus ma dag ni dbang phyug gis bsgyur 'og ma dgu dang yon tan rnams kyis cha thob par //
analyzed: gnas gsum dbus ma dag ni dbang phyug gis bsgyur 'og ma dgu dang yon tan rnams kyis cha thob par //
translated: The middle of the three places is multiplied by the lord. The lower [part] is nine, and the parts are obtained by the qualities.

original: gnyis bsres dman pa'i dbu mar chu tshod dag gis thob pa nor te steng gi phung por gnyis kyis ni //
analyzed: gnyis bsres dman pa'i dbu mar chu tshod dag gis thob pa nor te steng gi phung por gnyis kyis ni //
translated: [The result] is subtracted from the upper heap by two.

original: bsgyur nas byin la skar mas bgos lhag mi bdag nyi ma'i skar ma la sogs longs spyod dag tu 'gyur //üîΩgza' la gza' ni rab sbyin mi bdag nyis 'gyur chu tshod rnams te 'og tu tshogs dag la yang gnyis //
analyzed: bsgyur nas byin la skar mas bgos lhag mi bdag nyi ma'i skar ma la sogs longs spyod dag tu 'gyur // gza' la gza' ni rab sbyin mi bdag nyis 'gyur chu tshod rnams te 'og tu tshogs dag la yang gnyis //
translated: [The result] is added to the ascendant and divided by the stars. The remainder is the ruler of the year.üîΩThe ruler of the year gives the hours to the planets, doubled for the ruler of the year.

original: skar mar gnyis dang chu tshod drag po nor du rab gsal nyi ma'i longs spyod dag la rab tu sbyin //
analyzed: skar mar gnyis dang chu tshod drag po nor du rab gsal nyi ma'i longs spyod dag la rab tu sbyin //
translated: The two [parts of the] meridian are added to the stars and the hours, and the result is given to the ruler of the year.

original: 'di dag zla ba'i nges par 'gyur te slar yang zla ba zla ba dag la rab tu sbyin par gsungs //
analyzed: 'di dag zla ba'i nges par 'gyur te slar yang zla ba zla ba dag la rab tu sbyin par gsungs //
translated: This is the rule for the moon. Again, the moon is said to give [its results] to the months.

original: tshes rnams spyan dang dor dang slar yang sbyin pa dag ni gza' dang chu tshod rkang pa rnams su ste //
analyzed: tshes rnams spyan dang dor dang slar yang sbyin pa dag ni gza' dang chu tshod rkang pa rnams su ste //
translated: The lunar days are the eyes, the subtractions, and again the gifts, to the planets, the hours, and the feet.

original: tshogs kyi cha la chu gter zla bas mnyam dang @33b mi mnyam thob pa dag la sbyin dor rkang ba'i don //
analyzed: tshogs kyi cha la chu gter zla bas mnyam dang @33b mi mnyam thob pa dag la sbyin dor rkang ba'i don //
translated: In the part of the gathering, the ocean gives the equal and unequal results to the feet, the subtractions, and the gifts.

original: stong la stong pa rnam dag bcu gsum zla ba'i rkang par lnga ste mig dang nyi ma dag la phyogs //
analyzed: stong la stong pa rnam dag bcu gsum zla ba'i rkang par lnga ste mig dang nyi ma dag la phyogs //
translated: The empty [lunar day] is the thirteenth, the pure empty is the fifteenth, and the lunar day is five [lunar days] in the foot of the sun.

original: bcu gcig me la tshes zhes bya ste bcu dang chu gter rkang par nyi shur gcig gis dman pa'o //
analyzed: bcu gcig me la tshes zhes bya ste bcu dang chu gter rkang par nyi shur gcig gis dman pa'o //
translated: The eleventh is the fire [lunar day], the twelfth is the moon [lunar day], and the twentieth is the water [lunar day], less one.

original: lnga dang bug par nyi shu rtsa gnyis dus dang nor la rgyal ba bdun par nyi shu rtsa lnga ste //
analyzed: lnga dang bug par nyi shu rtsa gnyis dus dang nor la rgyal ba bdun par nyi shu rtsa lnga ste //
translated: The twenty-second is the hole [lunar day], the twenty-fifth is the sun [lunar day] in the foot of the time [lunar day], and the twenty-fifth is the sun [lunar day] in the foot of the wealth [lunar day].

original: de la nyi ma'i rab tu dbye bas gsal byas nyi ma'i rkang pa dag ni sbyin dang dor bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de la nyi ma'i rab tu dbye bas gsal byas nyi ma'i rkang pa dag ni sbyin dang dor bar 'gyur //
translated: The lunar day is made clear by the division of the sun, and the sun's foot is given and discarded.

original: 'byung dang 'byung ba mda' dang rig byed me lag ri bong can ni snga ma'i cha dang gzhan la yang //
analyzed: 'byung dang 'byung ba mda' dang rig byed me lag ri bong can ni snga ma'i cha dang gzhan la yang //
translated: The elements, the element, the arrow, the Veda, the fire, the hand, and the rabbit are in the first part and also in the other.

original: tshogs kyi cha la chu gter zla bas mnyam dang mi mnyam thob la rgyu ba rnams ni sbyin dang dor //
analyzed: tshogs kyi cha la chu gter zla bas mnyam dang mi mnyam thob la rgyu ba rnams ni sbyin dang dor //
translated: The equal and unequal attainment of the moon in the part of the gathering moves in the water [lunar day].

original: rgyu zhing yod pas lhag ma bsgyur ba las ni dus dang nyi mas cha thob dag kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: rgyu zhing yod pas lhag ma bsgyur ba las ni dus dang nyi mas cha thob dag kyang de bzhin no //
translated: The remainder is transformed by the movement of the sun, and the parts of the time and sun are obtained in the same way.

original: de nyid la ni nyi ma'i rab tu dbye bas nyi ma'i rkang pa'i chu tshod sbyin dang dor bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de nyid la ni nyi ma'i rab tu dbye bas nyi ma'i rkang pa'i chu tshod sbyin dang dor bar 'gyur //
translated: The same [longitude] is the amount of solar degrees to be added or subtracted by the solar-day method.

original: gang zhig rig byed rnams kyis chos bsgyur gsal bar nor te de yi sum cha dag gis bsres pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig rig byed rnams kyis chos bsgyur gsal bar nor te de yi sum cha dag gis bsres pa'o //
translated: [The longitude] that is converted by the Vedas is the amount of the three signs, which is added.

original: dus kyi rgyu skar rkang pa gsum bcas bu lon dag ste nyi ma'i longs spyod dbus nas sbyang bar bya //
analyzed: dus kyi rgyu skar rkang pa gsum bcas bu lon dag ste nyi ma'i longs spyod dbus nas sbyang bar bya //
translated: The three-footed lunar mansions of the time are the debt, and the enjoyment of the sun is to be purified from the middle.

original: bya ba lhag ma mig dmar ji bzhin ro dus ri bong can rnams dal ba'i las la rkang pa ste //
analyzed: bya ba lhag ma mig dmar ji bzhin ro dus ri bong can rnams dal ba'i las la rkang pa ste //
translated: The remaining activity is like Mars, and the time of the tastes is the slow activity of the lunar mansions.

original: longs spyod kyis ni chu tshod bsgyur nas mda' dang yon tan zla bas cha thob longs spyod dang bcas pa //
analyzed: longs spyod kyis ni chu tshod bsgyur nas mda' dang yon tan zla bas cha thob longs spyod dang bcas pa //
translated: Having converted the enjoyment by the hour, the amount of the moon is the attainment of the sign together with the enjoyment.

original: bgrod pa 'gro ba'i dbang gis nyi ma la ni sbyin dang dor te gzhan du dag pa yod ma yin //
analyzed: bgrod pa 'gro ba'i dbang gis nyi ma la ni sbyin dang dor te gzhan du dag pa yod ma yin //
translated: The addition and subtraction from the sun is by the power of the movement of the planets; elsewhere there is no purification.

original: nyi ma la ni dus ro sprul dang bcu dang @34a *//
analyzed: nyi ma la ni dus ro sprul dang bcu dang @34a *//
translated: The time of the sun is the ten tastes of the serpent,

original: 'phrog byed 'phrog byed drag po phyogs dang klu dang drug /
analyzed: 'phrog byed 'phrog byed drag po phyogs dang klu dang drug /
translated: and the six of RƒÅhu, RƒÅhu, Mars, the directions, and the nƒÅgas.

original: me dang nam mkha' dag kyang bgrod pa'i mthar te byang dang lho ru nor dang bu lon dag tu 'gyur //
analyzed: me dang nam mkha' dag kyang bgrod pa'i mthar te byang dang lho ru nor dang bu lon dag tu 'gyur //
translated: Fire and space are the end of the path, in the north and south, as debt and wealth.

original: zla ba 'pho ba'i dbye ba dag las phyogs kyi dbye bas zla ba drug ni nyin mor phyed pas spyod //
analyzed: zla ba 'pho ba'i dbye ba dag las phyogs kyi dbye bas zla ba drug ni nyin mor phyed pas spyod //
translated: From the division of the transits of the moon, six months are day, divided by the division of the directions.

original: nyi ma la byin tshes grangs dag kyang 'og tu ro yis bsgyur la gza' yi longs spyod bsres pa dag /
analyzed: nyi ma la byin tshes grangs dag kyang 'og tu ro yis bsgyur la gza' yi longs spyod bsres pa dag /
translated: The lunar days are given to the sun, and are converted by the sign of Virgo, and are mixed with the enjoyment of the planets.

original: dman par gyur pa ri bong mtshan mar 'gyur te mi yi bdag po nyi zla bsres pa sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: dman par gyur pa ri bong mtshan mar 'gyur te mi yi bdag po nyi zla bsres pa sbyor ba'o //
translated: The inferior becomes the lunar mansion of the hare; the mixture of the sun and moon is the configuration of the lord of men.

original: byed pa dag ni tshes la mig gis bsgyur ba zla bral gang zhig bdun gyi cha yi lhag ma 'o //
analyzed: byed pa dag ni tshes la mig gis bsgyur ba zla bral gang zhig bdun gyi cha yi lhag ma 'o //
translated: The factors are converted by the eye on the lunar day, and the remainder of the seventh part is the remainder.

original: dag pa'i lo la klu bsres mkha' dang nam mkha' chu gter gyis bsgyur klu bsres rnams kyis sbyangs pa dag /
analyzed: dag pa'i lo la klu bsres mkha' dang nam mkha' chu gter gyis bsgyur klu bsres rnams kyis sbyangs pa dag /
translated: In a pure year, the nƒÅgas are mixed, and space is converted by the ocean, and the mixed nƒÅgas are purified.

original: ri zla me yis rab tu phye ste nam mkha' ros bsgyur ri la sogs pas bgos pa chu tshod de //
analyzed: ri zla me yis rab tu phye ste nam mkha' ros bsgyur ri la sogs pas bgos pa chu tshod de //
translated: The remainder is divided by the moon of the mountain, and space is converted by the taste, and the division by the mountain, etc., is the hour.

original: gnyis dang sum cu'i gza' dang chu tshod nges pa 'dir ldan zla ba dag la lo yi 'pho ba'o //
analyzed: gnyis dang sum cu'i gza' dang chu tshod nges pa 'dir ldan zla ba dag la lo yi 'pho ba'o //
translated: The transits of the year occur in the months that have the definite number of ghatis and tithis.

original: lug sogs rnams kyis snod byed dag la gza' dang chu tshod rim par yongs bkod bcu gnyis 'di dag ste //üîΩzla ba ri 'byung rig byed dag dang yon tan mda' ste ri bong can dang ri zla gsum pa la 'o //
analyzed: lug sogs rnams kyis snod byed dag la gza' dang chu tshod rim par yongs bkod bcu gnyis 'di dag ste // zla ba ri 'byung rig byed dag dang yon tan mda' ste ri bong can dang ri zla gsum pa la 'o //
translated: In the zodiacs of Aries and so on, the twelve houses are arranged in order, beginning with Aries, in the ghatis and tithis.üîΩThe houses of Taurus and so on are in the three signs of the moon, the moon, and the moon‚Äôs asterisms.üîΩThe houses of Gemini and so on are in the three signs of the moon‚Äôs asterisms, the moon, and the sun.üîΩThe houses of Cancer and so on are in the three signs of the sun, the moon, and the moon‚Äôs asterisms.

original: rig byed me 'byung zla ba mig dang lag pa dus dang rig byed mig ni drug pa dag la 'o //
analyzed: rig byed me 'byung zla ba mig dang lag pa dus dang rig byed mig ni drug pa dag la 'o //
translated: The houses of Leo and so on are in the three signs of the moon‚Äôs asterisms, the moon, and the sun.üîΩThe houses of Virgo and so on are in the three signs of the sun, the moon, and the moon‚Äôs asterisms.üîΩThe houses of Libra and so on are in the three signs of the moon‚Äôs asterisms, the moon, and the sun.üîΩThe houses of Scorpio and so on are in the three signs of the sun, the moon, and the moon‚Äôs asterisms.üîΩThe houses of Sagittarius and so on are in the three signs of the moon‚Äôs asterisms, the moon, and the sun.

original: drug dang zla ba mda' dang zla ba ri dus me dang drug zla rig byed ri dang 'jig rten dang // drug dang rig byed stong pa dag ste @34b stong pa mig mda' nyi ma'i go 'phang nya yi khyim la'o //
analyzed: drug dang zla ba mda' dang zla ba ri dus me dang drug zla rig byed ri dang 'jig rten dang // drug dang rig byed stong pa dag ste @34b stong pa mig mda' nyi ma'i go 'phang nya yi khyim la'o //
translated: The houses of Capricorn and so on are in the three signs of the sun, the moon, and the moon‚Äôs asterisms.üîΩThe houses of Aquarius and so on are in the three signs of the moon‚Äôs asterisms, the moon, and the sun.üîΩThe houses of Pisces and so on are in the three signs of the sun, the moon, and the moon‚Äôs asterisms.

original: zla drug 'phel dang 'grib par 'gyur te nyin dang mtshan mo dag kyang nyi ma rab tu rgyu bas so //
analyzed: zla drug 'phel dang 'grib par 'gyur te nyin dang mtshan mo dag kyang nyi ma rab tu rgyu bas so //
translated: The moon waxes and wanes in six signs. Day and night are determined by the sun‚Äôs movement.

original: chu gter srog dang chu srang me ni nyin zhag so so'i dus su 'phel 'grib bgrod pa'i yan lag gi /
analyzed: chu gter srog dang chu srang me ni nyin zhag so so'i dus su 'phel 'grib bgrod pa'i yan lag gi /
translated: The water element, the life, the lunar day, and the fire, increase and decrease in the course of the day and night.

original: lho phyogs su ni mtshan mo dag kyang 'phel bar 'gyur te kha ba'i ri yi byang du nyin mo'o //
analyzed: lho phyogs su ni mtshan mo dag kyang 'phel bar 'gyur te kha ba'i ri yi byang du nyin mo'o //
translated: The night increases in the south, and the day increases in the north of the snowy mountain.

original: zla ba dag la mig dang nyi ma bsres pa mig gis rnam bsgyur zla ba'i tshigs la gcig bsres te //
analyzed: zla ba dag la mig dang nyi ma bsres pa mig gis rnam bsgyur zla ba'i tshigs la gcig bsres te //
translated: The moon is added to the eye, and the eye is added to the sun. The moon is added to the lunar mansion.

original: mkha' dus chu yis rab phye thub pa lag pas bsgyur ba las kyang mkha' sogs cha yis skar ma'o //
analyzed: mkha' dus chu yis rab phye thub pa lag pas bsgyur ba las kyang mkha' sogs cha yis skar ma'o //
translated: The sky, the time, and the water are divided by the power of the hand. The sky, etc., are divided by the parts of the stars.

original: lhag ma drug cus bsgyur ba gang yin de las chu tshod slar yang de bsgyur ba las chu srang ste //
analyzed: lhag ma drug cus bsgyur ba gang yin de las chu tshod slar yang de bsgyur ba las chu srang ste //
translated: The remainder is multiplied by sixty. The result is the hours. Again, that is multiplied by sixty. The result is the lunar days.

original: thob pas dman pa'i 'khor lo gdong du 'gyur te mun can mjug ma dag kyang rgyu skar phyed bsres pa'o; ;zla ba sum cus bsgyur ba nyin zhag so so dag dang bcas pa las ni ri mkha' ris thob pa //
analyzed: thob pas dman pa'i 'khor lo gdong du 'gyur te mun can mjug ma dag kyang rgyu skar phyed bsres pa'o; ;zla ba sum cus bsgyur ba nyin zhag so so dag dang bcas pa las ni ri mkha' ris thob pa //
translated: The remainder is the face of the wheel. The tail is the dark half of the lunar mansion. The moon is multiplied by thirty. The result is the lunar day.

original: gnas gsum dbus su rnam par bsres pa las kyang chu gter ros thob dman pa mi gsal nyin zhag go //
analyzed: gnas gsum dbus su rnam par bsres pa las kyang chu gter ros thob dman pa mi gsal nyin zhag go //
translated: The middle of the three places is mixed with the middle of the three places. The ocean is obtained by the taste of the middle of the three places. The inferior is not clear. [It is] a day.

original: ri dus gcig gis bsres pa dag kyang gsal ba'i nyin zhag tshogs te ri klu dus kyis bgos pa yi //
analyzed: ri dus gcig gis bsres pa dag kyang gsal ba'i nyin zhag tshogs te ri klu dus kyis bgos pa yi //
translated: The mountains are mixed with the time of one. The clear day is collected. The mountains and the nƒÅgas are divided by time.

original: lhag ma skar mas bsgyur thob slar yang nam mkha' ro yis bsgyur las ri la sogs pas bgos pa chu tshod do //
analyzed: lhag ma skar mas bsgyur thob slar yang nam mkha' ro yis bsgyur las ri la sogs pas bgos pa chu tshod do //
translated: The remainder is transformed by the stars. Again, the sky is transformed by the taste. The mountains and so forth are divided by the hours.

original: mig dmar la ni phyed bcas dgu sbyang gal te bu lon lhag na 'khor lo bsres la rnam par sbyang //
analyzed: mig dmar la ni phyed bcas dgu sbyang gal te bu lon lhag na 'khor lo bsres la rnam par sbyang //
translated: In the case of Mars, nine are subtracted along with a half. If there is a remainder of debt, the wheel is mixed and subtracted.

original: phyed pas lhag par @35a *//
analyzed: phyed pas lhag par @35a *//
translated: If there is a remainder of a half,

original: gyur na 'khor lo phyed na dor bar bya ste dor ba'i lhag ma rim min 'gyur //
analyzed: gyur na 'khor lo phyed na dor bar bya ste dor ba'i lhag ma rim min 'gyur //
translated: the wheel is divided by a half and discarded. The remainder of the discarded is not in order.

original: skar ma drug cus bsgyur te chu tshod dag dang rab tu ldan par gyur pa 'byung me zla bas bgo /
analyzed: skar ma drug cus bsgyur te chu tshod dag dang rab tu ldan par gyur pa 'byung me zla bas bgo /
translated: [The remainder] is transformed by sixty stars and is endowed with the hours. The arising fire is divided by the moon.

original: gang thob dal ba'i las dag la yang nor dang bu lon dag ni rim pa min dang rim pas so //
analyzed: gang thob dal ba'i las dag la yang nor dang bu lon dag ni rim pa min dang rim pas so //
translated: Whatever is obtained is in the actions of the slow [planets]. The wealth and debt are in order and out of order.

original: de nyid bco brgyad ri ni rab tu gsal bar ro rkang 'khor lo phyed la steng dang 'og tu ste /üîΩlongs spyod kyis ni chu tshod bsgyur las mda' dang yon tan zla bas 'khor lo phyed las cha thob pa //
analyzed: de nyid bco brgyad ri ni rab tu gsal bar ro rkang 'khor lo phyed la steng dang 'og tu ste / longs spyod kyis ni chu tshod bsgyur las mda' dang yon tan zla bas 'khor lo phyed las cha thob pa //
translated: The half-hour divisions are above and below.üîΩThe half-hour divisions are to be taken from the half-hour divisions of the zodiac, and the half-hour divisions are to be subtracted from the half-hour divisions of the zodiac.

original: snga ma phyed la gzung byar 'dod de rkang pa'i dbang gis de bzhin phyi ma phyed la dor byar 'gyur; ;zos pa tshogs gcig byas nas gza' yi bgrod pa'i dbang gis sbyin dang dor ba dag kyang chu tshod la'o //
analyzed: snga ma phyed la gzung byar 'dod de rkang pa'i dbang gis de bzhin phyi ma phyed la dor byar 'gyur; ;zos pa tshogs gcig byas nas gza' yi bgrod pa'i dbang gis sbyin dang dor ba dag kyang chu tshod la'o //
translated: The sum of the consumed [half-hour divisions] is multiplied by the motion of the planets, and the sum of the subtracted [half-hour divisions] is divided by the motion of the planets.

original: de nas nyi mar sa skyes rnam par sbyang ste bla ma nyi skyes dag kyang myur ba'i las la'o //
analyzed: de nas nyi mar sa skyes rnam par sbyang ste bla ma nyi skyes dag kyang myur ba'i las la'o //
translated: Then, the solar [half-hour divisions] are subtracted from the lunar [half-hour divisions], and the remainder is divided by the motion of the planets.

original: zla skyes dkar po la yang nyi ma dag ste myur ba'i las la nges par rim pas nor du 'gyur //
analyzed: zla skyes dkar po la yang nyi ma dag ste myur ba'i las la nges par rim pas nor du 'gyur //
translated: The lunar [half-hour divisions] are subtracted from the solar [half-hour divisions], and the remainder is divided by the motion of the planets.

original: sbyangs pa'i lhag mas 'dir ni rkang pa dag ste gza' rgyu rkang pa rnams kyis lhag ma'i chu tshod bsgyur //
analyzed: sbyangs pa'i lhag mas 'dir ni rkang pa dag ste gza' rgyu rkang pa rnams kyis lhag ma'i chu tshod bsgyur //
translated: The remainder of the solar [half-hour divisions] is the feet, and the remainder of the planetary motions is the half-hour divisions.

original: drug cu'i cha yis thob pa gza' rgyu rkang pa dag las gzung bya dang ni dbrog bya de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: drug cu'i cha yis thob pa gza' rgyu rkang pa dag las gzung bya dang ni dbrog bya de bzhin nyid //
translated: The sum of the degrees of the planets, divided by 6, is the sum of the degrees to be added and subtracted from the planets.üîΩThe sum of the degrees of the planets, divided by 4, is the sum of the degrees to be added and subtracted from the planets.üîΩThe sum of the degrees of the planets, divided by 3, is the sum of the degrees to be added and subtracted from the planets.üîΩThe sum of the degrees of the planets, divided by 2, is the sum of the degrees to be added and subtracted from the planets.

original: zos pa dang ni tshogs gcig byas nas gza' yi bgrod pa'i dbang gis sbyin dang dor ba mtha' dag ste //
analyzed: zos pa dang ni tshogs gcig byas nas gza' yi bgrod pa'i dbang gis sbyin dang dor ba mtha' dag ste //
translated: The sum of the degrees of the planets, divided by 1, is the sum of the degrees to be added and subtracted from the planets.üîΩThe sum of the degrees of the planets, divided by 12, is the sum of the degrees to be added and subtracted from the planets.üîΩThe sum of the degrees of the planets, divided by 6, is the sum of the degrees to be added and subtracted from the planets.üîΩThe sum of the degrees of the planets, divided by 4, is the sum of the degrees to be added and subtracted from the planets.

original: sa skyes la ni rkang pa rgyal ba sogs te rab gsal ma nu'i gnas la mtha' dag gzhag par bya //üîΩde ltar gza' rnams thams cad kyi ni rim par yongs su @35b brtsi ba rig par bya'o mi yi dbang //üîΩzla skyes dkar po las ni nyin mor byed pas rnam dag zla skyes dkar po dag tu yang dag 'gyur //
analyzed: sa skyes la ni rkang pa rgyal ba sogs te rab gsal ma nu'i gnas la mtha' dag gzhag par bya // de ltar gza' rnams thams cad kyi ni rim par yongs su @35b brtsi ba rig par bya'o mi yi dbang // zla skyes dkar po las ni nyin mor byed pas rnam dag zla skyes dkar po dag tu yang dag 'gyur //
translated: The sum of the degrees of the planets, divided by 3, is the sum of the degrees to be added and subtracted from the planets.üîΩThe sum of the degrees of the planets, divided by 2, is the sum of the degrees to be added and subtracted from the planets.üîΩThe sum of the degrees of the planets, divided by 1, is the sum of the degrees to be added and subtracted from the planets.üîΩThe sum of the degrees of the planets, divided by 12, is the sum of the degrees to be added and subtracted from the planets.

original: stong dang nam mkha' zla bas bsgyur ba'i mtha' dag nyin zhag tshogs la me dang nyi ma ri yi sa dman //
analyzed: stong dang nam mkha' zla bas bsgyur ba'i mtha' dag nyin zhag tshogs la me dang nyi ma ri yi sa dman //
translated: The sum of the degrees of the planets, divided by 6, is the sum of the degrees to be added and subtracted from the planets.üîΩThe sum of the degrees of the planets, divided by 4, is the sum of the degrees to be added and subtracted from the planets.

original: ri nas bug pa ri dang klu yis bgo ste slar yang lhag ma skar ma la sogs dbye bas bsgyur //
analyzed: ri nas bug pa ri dang klu yis bgo ste slar yang lhag ma skar ma la sogs dbye bas bsgyur //
translated: The sum of the degrees of the planets, divided by 3, is the sum of the degrees to be added and subtracted from the planets.üîΩThe sum of the degrees of the planets, divided by 2, is the sum of the degrees to be added and subtracted from the planets.

original: rab brjod cha yis rgyu skar dag dang slar yang chu tshod rnams ni zla skyes longs spyod dag tu 'gyur //
analyzed: rab brjod cha yis rgyu skar dag dang slar yang chu tshod rnams ni zla skyes longs spyod dag tu 'gyur //
translated: The ascendant by the degrees of the planets is the planets, and again the ascendant by the degrees of the planets is the moon.

original: zla skyes dor te nyi ma'i dbus nas mi bdag bzang po mi bdag skar ma phyed kyang yang dag spang //
analyzed: zla skyes dor te nyi ma'i dbus nas mi bdag bzang po mi bdag skar ma phyed kyang yang dag spang //
translated: The ascendant is abandoned, and the good king, the sun, is in the middle of the ascendant, and the half-moon, the king, is also completely abandoned.

original: lhag ma'i bya ba nor dang bu lon dal dang myur ba'i las kyang mig dmar ji lta bzhin du 'gyur //
analyzed: lhag ma'i bya ba nor dang bu lon dal dang myur ba'i las kyang mig dmar ji lta bzhin du 'gyur //
translated: The remaining work, the work of wealth, debt, slow and fast, is also like Mars.

original: zla skyes rkang pa dal ba'i las la bcu ri me ste myur ba'i las la mi bdag la sogs so //
analyzed: zla skyes rkang pa dal ba'i las la bcu ri me ste myur ba'i las la mi bdag la sogs so //
translated: The slow work of the ascendant is the tenth, and the fast work is the ascendant and so on.

original: nyin zhag tshogs ni mkha' mkha' ro dang mig gis dman pa byas nas so me chu gter dag gis bgo /
analyzed: nyin zhag tshogs ni mkha' mkha' ro dang mig gis dman pa byas nas so me chu gter dag gis bgo /
translated: The collection of days is the sky, the sky, with the taste and eye subtracted, divided by the earth, fire, water, and treasure.

original: lhag ma skar mas bsnun las skar ma slar yang chu tshod bla ma yi yang dal ba'i las la 'o //
analyzed: lhag ma skar mas bsnun las skar ma slar yang chu tshod bla ma yi yang dal ba'i las la 'o //
translated: The remainder is struck by the stars, and the stars again by the hours, and the ascendant by the slow work.

original: rgyu skar nyi ma sbyang ste 'phrog byed dgu dang rtse mo can ni dal ba'i las la rkang pa 'o //
analyzed: rgyu skar nyi ma sbyang ste 'phrog byed dgu dang rtse mo can ni dal ba'i las la rkang pa 'o //
translated: The sign of the ascendant is purified by the sun, and the slow work is the foot of the ninth and the top of the tenth.

original: slar yang myur ba dag la rkang pa rab gsal ma nu'i gnas la phyogs rkang la sogs de dag go /
analyzed: slar yang myur ba dag la rkang pa rab gsal ma nu'i gnas la phyogs rkang la sogs de dag go /
translated: Again, the swift ones are the feet of the bright half of the month.

original: nyin zhag mkha' dang zla bas bsgyur nas chu gter nor gyis dman pa ri dang rgyal ba mig gis bgo //
analyzed: nyin zhag mkha' dang zla bas bsgyur nas chu gter nor gyis dman pa ri dang rgyal ba mig gis bgo //
translated: The day is divided by the sky and the moon, and the ocean by the wealth of the stars, the mountain by the king, and the eye by the pupil.

original: skar mas bsgyur ba las kyang skar ma'i longs spyod slar yang chu tshod myur ba'i las la pa @36a *//
analyzed: skar mas bsgyur ba las kyang skar ma'i longs spyod slar yang chu tshod myur ba'i las la pa @36a *//
translated: The enjoyment of the stars is also from the revolution of the stars, and again the hours from the swift work.

original: sangs kyi // rgyu skar dus ni nyi ma la sbyang zla dus ri bong can ni dal ba'i las la rkang pa ste //
analyzed: sangs kyi // rgyu skar dus ni nyi ma la sbyang zla dus ri bong can ni dal ba'i las la rkang pa ste //
translated: The zodiacal periods are the day for the sun, the lunar periods are the moon, and the slow work is the feet.

original: myur la de nyid la sogs dbye bas rab gsal ma nu'i gnas dag las te sbyin dor mig dmar bzhin //
analyzed: myur la de nyid la sogs dbye bas rab gsal ma nu'i gnas dag las te sbyin dor mig dmar bzhin //
translated: The swift ones are the same, divided by the divisions of the zodiac, from the place of the bright half of the month, like the donation, the rejection, and the red eye.

original: mkha' mig klu dang rig byed kyis dman gsal ba'i nyin zhag tshogs ni drug ro ri mkha' zla ba yis //
analyzed: mkha' mig klu dang rig byed kyis dman gsal ba'i nyin zhag tshogs ni drug ro ri mkha' zla ba yis //
translated: The group of the bright days is divided by the sky, the eye, the nƒÅga, and the Vedas, and the six tastes by the mountain, the sky, and the moon.

original: bgo zhing skar mas bsgyur las skar mar 'gyur te spen pa yi ni dor bya dag kyang bco brgyad do //
analyzed: bgo zhing skar mas bsgyur las skar mar 'gyur te spen pa yi ni dor bya dag kyang bco brgyad do //
translated: The stars are from the revolution of the stars, and the eighteen rejections of Saturn are also.

original: rkang pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis tshes dus rab gsal ro yi gnas la'o myur ba'i las la ro la sogs //
analyzed: rkang pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis tshes dus rab gsal ro yi gnas la'o myur ba'i las la ro la sogs //
translated: The twenty-two feet are in the houses of the signs, beginning with Aries. The swift action is in the signs beginning with Aries.

original: myur dal rgyu ba dag kyang rim pas rkang pa bgrod pa la ste 'khyog po nyid ni rim min gyis //
analyzed: myur dal rgyu ba dag kyang rim pas rkang pa bgrod pa la ste 'khyog po nyid ni rim min gyis //
translated: The slow and swift motion is in the signs beginning with Aries, respectively. The crooked motion is in the reverse order.

original: byed snga ma dang phyed phyi mar yang nyi ma 'gro ba'i dbang gis gza' rnams kyi ni 'byung ba yang //
analyzed: byed snga ma dang phyed phyi mar yang nyi ma 'gro ba'i dbang gis gza' rnams kyi ni 'byung ba yang //
translated: The arising of the planets is by the power of the sun's motion in the first half and the second half of the year.

original: sum cu rtsa bdun lag pas bsgyur ba'i zla pa rnams kyis mjug ring dag ni myur dang 'khyog por 'gyur //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa bdun lag pas bsgyur ba'i zla pa rnams kyis mjug ring dag ni myur dang 'khyog por 'gyur //
translated: The slow and crooked motion of Ketu is in the lunar mansions that are moved by the thirty-seventh finger.

original: gang dag su zhig nyi ma'i longs spyod la ni rab zhugs gza' de dag kyang nges par nub par 'gyur; ;nyi ma btang nas 'char bar 'gyur te de yi lam yang bgrod pa 'gro ba'i rnam par dbye bas so //
analyzed: gang dag su zhig nyi ma'i longs spyod la ni rab zhugs gza' de dag kyang nges par nub par 'gyur; ;nyi ma btang nas 'char bar 'gyur te de yi lam yang bgrod pa 'gro ba'i rnam par dbye bas so //
translated: The planets that enter the sun's enjoyment will certainly set. Having left the sun, they will rise, their path being divided by the motion of the planets.

original: g-yon pa'i lam la gnas pa gang yin de ni nyi ma 'gro ba'i dbang gis g-yon nas 'gro ba ste //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i lam la gnas pa gang yin de ni nyi ma 'gro ba'i dbang gis g-yon nas 'gro ba ste //
translated: Those that abide in the left path go to the left by the power of the sun's motion.

original: g-yas la gnas pa dag ni g-yas kyis slar yang gsal bar 'dir ni phan tshun 'thab ste dgra yin phyir //
analyzed: g-yas la gnas pa dag ni g-yas kyis slar yang gsal bar 'dir ni phan tshun 'thab ste dgra yin phyir //
translated: The stars that are on the right are again illuminated by the right [lunar mansion]. Here they fight each other, because they are enemies.

original: rang gi zhing la yang dag gnas rnams gal te @36b de la dgra dag gyur na nges bar 'thab pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi zhing la yang dag gnas rnams gal te @36b de la dgra dag gyur na nges bar 'thab pa'o //
translated: If the stars that are in their own place become enemies, they certainly fight.

original: skar ma la ste gzhan la 'thab pa min par nges shing 'dir ni phan tshun mtshungs pa dag tu ldan //
analyzed: skar ma la ste gzhan la 'thab pa min par nges shing 'dir ni phan tshun mtshungs pa dag tu ldan //
translated: The stars fight with the moon, not with the others. They are certainly equal here, because they are mutually connected.

original: gal te nyi ma yi ni g-yon du zla ba rab zhugs gyur cing 'byung ba yang ni g-yon pa yis //
analyzed: gal te nyi ma yi ni g-yon du zla ba rab zhugs gyur cing 'byung ba yang ni g-yon pa yis //
translated: If the moon enters to the left of the sun, and the ascendant also [enters] to the left,

original: byang gi rva ni mtho bar 'gyur te kha cig tu ni bgrod pa'i dbang gis lho ru g-yas pa yang //üîΩtshigs mtshams su yang sgra gcan gdong dang mnyam par 'gro ba mngon du phyogs par 'dzin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: byang gi rva ni mtho bar 'gyur te kha cig tu ni bgrod pa'i dbang gis lho ru g-yas pa yang // tshigs mtshams su yang sgra gcan gdong dang mnyam par 'gro ba mngon du phyogs par 'dzin pa kho na'o //
translated: the northern horn is high. In some [places], by the power of the path, the southern [horn] is also to the right.üîΩAt the joints, RƒÅhu moves in the same way as the face [of the moon]. It is certainly held to face [the moon].

original: g-yon du rgyu ba dag la g-yas min du ste nyi ma'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis g-yas la g-yas pa'i char //
analyzed: g-yon du rgyu ba dag la g-yas min du ste nyi ma'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis g-yas la g-yas pa'i char //
translated: In the left [lunar mansion], it is not to the right, because of the power of the sun's path. To the right, it is to the right part.

original: de ltar sgra gcan gyis ni phyogs mtshams su 'dzin ri bong 'dzin pa 'byung ba dag ni rgyab tu yang //
analyzed: de ltar sgra gcan gyis ni phyogs mtshams su 'dzin ri bong 'dzin pa 'byung ba dag ni rgyab tu yang //
translated: Thus RƒÅhu, holding the cardinal and intermediate directions, arises in the back.

original: tha skar la sogs nag pa phyed du nyin dang mtshan mo mnyam pa'i dbus su go la'i ri mo 'o //
analyzed: tha skar la sogs nag pa phyed du nyin dang mtshan mo mnyam pa'i dbus su go la'i ri mo 'o //
translated: In the half-month of the dark half of the lunar month beginning with ƒÄ·π£ƒÅ·∏çhƒÅ, the equator is in the middle, with day and night equal.

original: rgyu skar g-yas dang g-yas min dag la nges par srid pa'i gnas su khyim gyi dbye bas yang dag gnas //
analyzed: rgyu skar g-yas dang g-yas min dag la nges par srid pa'i gnas su khyim gyi dbye bas yang dag gnas //
translated: The houses are definitely situated in the zodiac signs, which are to the right and left of the world.

original: gzhu yi rnam pa'i dus khyim dag la go la'i dbus nas lhor ni me yi dkyil 'khor la gnas shing //
analyzed: gzhu yi rnam pa'i dus khyim dag la go la'i dbus nas lhor ni me yi dkyil 'khor la gnas shing //
translated: In the zodiac houses, which have the form of a bow, the sun is to the south of the center of the earth, in the mandala of fire.

original: byang du de ni bsil ba'i ri ste pad 'dab bzang po bzhin du shar du lug dang srang sogs la'o //
analyzed: byang du de ni bsil ba'i ri ste pad 'dab bzang po bzhin du shar du lug dang srang sogs la'o //
translated: To the north it is Meru, and in the east it is Aries, Libra, and so forth, like the beautiful petals of a lotus.

original: me nas bsil ba'i ri yi mtshams su dpag tshad stong phrag mkha' dang nam mkha' mkha' dang mda' ri 'o //
analyzed: me nas bsil ba'i ri yi mtshams su dpag tshad stong phrag mkha' dang nam mkha' mkha' dang mda' ri 'o //
translated: From fire to Meru, the distance is one thousand yojanas.

original: dbus su 'khor lo phyed kyi ri bo nyi ma'i bgrod pa dag kyang mtshan mo gcig ni mnyam pa la'o //
analyzed: dbus su 'khor lo phyed kyi ri bo nyi ma'i bgrod pa dag kyang mtshan mo gcig ni mnyam pa la'o //
translated: In the middle, on the half-wheel mountain, the sun‚Äôs path is the same in one night.

original: phyi nas g-yas dang g-yas min dag tu rgyu @37a *//
analyzed: phyi nas g-yas dang g-yas min dag tu rgyu @37a *//
translated: The sun moves to the right and left of the ecliptic in turn,

original: ste nyin dang mtshan mo rgyu skar dbye bas rim pa yis //
analyzed: ste nyin dang mtshan mo rgyu skar dbye bas rim pa yis //
translated: by the division of the lunar mansions into right and left.üîΩThe sun and moon move through the zodiacal mansions,

original: lam rnams mkha' klu zla ba 'dor zhing nyin dang mtshan mo dag kyang ji srid bgrod pa dag gi mthar //
analyzed: lam rnams mkha' klu zla ba 'dor zhing nyin dang mtshan mo dag kyang ji srid bgrod pa dag gi mthar //
translated: until the end of the path, in order, by day and by night.

original: nyi ma ri bong can gyi nyin mtshan chu tshod drug cu dag las 'grib dang 'phel ba drug chas so //
analyzed: nyi ma ri bong can gyi nyin mtshan chu tshod drug cu dag las 'grib dang 'phel ba drug chas so //
translated: The sun and moon, in the course of a month, decrease and increase by one ghatika of day and night,

original: gang phyir ri la skye bo rnams kyi nyin mtshan mnyam par 'gyur te lug nyi srang gi nyi ma la'o //
analyzed: gang phyir ri la skye bo rnams kyi nyin mtshan mnyam par 'gyur te lug nyi srang gi nyi ma la'o //
translated: because the days and nights are equal in length for people born on the mountains at the time of the sun in Aries.

original: de phyir gnyis brgyad dum bu dag la nges par glang la gnas dang sdig pa la gnas de bzhin no //
analyzed: de phyir gnyis brgyad dum bu dag la nges par glang la gnas dang sdig pa la gnas de bzhin no //
translated: Therefore, in the two sets of eight parts, the sun is in Taurus and in Scorpio, respectively.

original: bug pa zhes bya me grangs dag la 'khrig pa gzhur gnas phyogs kyi tshad dang bzhi pa dag la ni //
analyzed: bug pa zhes bya me grangs dag la 'khrig pa gzhur gnas phyogs kyi tshad dang bzhi pa dag la ni //
translated: In the four directions, the sun is in Cancer and in Capricorn, respectively, in the number of the fire signs.

original: nyi ma karka ta la gnas pa dag dang chu srin la gnas lnga pa bcu gcig pa la yang //
analyzed: nyi ma karka ta la gnas pa dag dang chu srin la gnas lnga pa bcu gcig pa la yang //
translated: The sun is in Cancer and in Capricorn, in the fifth and eleventh parts, respectively.

original: seng+ge bum par rab zhugs bcu gnyis ro yi sar ni nya dang bu mor gnas pa dag la'o //
analyzed: seng+ge bum par rab zhugs bcu gnyis ro yi sar ni nya dang bu mor gnas pa dag la'o //
translated: The twelve signs beginning with Aries enter the zodiacs in order, beginning with the one occupied by the sun.üîΩThe sun moves counterclockwise, and the zodiacs are occupied by the sun in the order of Capricorn, Aquarius, Pisces, Aries, Taurus, Gemini, Cancer, Leo, Virgo, Libra, Scorpio, and Sagittarius.

original: 'di ni g-yon bgrod du 'gyur nyi ma chu srin gnas pa la ste bum par nyi mas gnyis pa la //üîΩnya la dum bu gsum par mi rnams kyi ni bgrod pa dag kyang lug gi nyi mas bzhi par ro //
analyzed: 'di ni g-yon bgrod du 'gyur nyi ma chu srin gnas pa la ste bum par nyi mas gnyis pa la // nya la dum bu gsum par mi rnams kyi ni bgrod pa dag kyang lug gi nyi mas bzhi par ro //
translated: The sun in Aries enters the second zodiac, Pisces, in the third, and so on.

original: 'byung ba zhes byar nyi ma glang la gnas pas 'khrig par nyi gnas sa ni drug pa bdun par yang //
analyzed: 'byung ba zhes byar nyi ma glang la gnas pas 'khrig par nyi gnas sa ni drug pa bdun par yang //
translated: The sun in Taurus enters the sixth zodiac, Gemini, and the sun in Cancer enters the seventh zodiac, Leo.

original: nyi ma karka ta la gnas par 'gyur te seng+ge la gnas sa yi dum bu brgyad par ro //üîΩbu mos bug par srang gi nyi mas bcu par 'gyur te sdig pa yis kyang drag po'i dum bu la'o //
analyzed: nyi ma karka ta la gnas par 'gyur te seng+ge la gnas sa yi dum bu brgyad par ro // bu mos bug par srang gi nyi mas bcu par 'gyur te sdig pa yis kyang drag po'i dum bu la'o //
translated: The sun in Leo enters the eighth zodiac, Virgo, and the sun in Libra enters the tenth zodiac, Scorpio.

original: gzhu la gnas pas bcu gnyis par 'gyur mi rnams @37b bgrod pa dag kyang bcu gnyis rtsibs kyi sa la 'o //
analyzed: gzhu la gnas pas bcu gnyis par 'gyur mi rnams @37b bgrod pa dag kyang bcu gnyis rtsibs kyi sa la 'o //
translated: The sun in Scorpio enters the eleventh zodiac, Sagittarius, and the sun in Sagittarius enters the twelfth zodiac, Capricorn.üîΩThe sun in Capricorn enters the first zodiac, Aquarius, and the sun in Aquarius enters the third zodiac, Pisces.

original: de bzhin lhor bgrod du 'gyur nyi ma bgrod pa'i dbang gis karka ta sogs khyim rnams dag la'o //
analyzed: de bzhin lhor bgrod du 'gyur nyi ma bgrod pa'i dbang gis karka ta sogs khyim rnams dag la'o //
translated: In the same way, in the southern course, in the signs Cancer and so on, by the power of the sun‚Äôs course.

original: steng du drug dang klu yi grangs nam nyi ma'i gdung byed dag kyang byang du bgrod pa dag gi mthar //
analyzed: steng du drug dang klu yi grangs nam nyi ma'i gdung byed dag kyang byang du bgrod pa dag gi mthar //
translated: Six above, and the number of the NƒÅgas, the sun‚Äôs rays, at the end of the northern course.

original: de nas g-yas phyogs su yang zad par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po stong phrag dag ni drag po'i grangs //
analyzed: de nas g-yas phyogs su yang zad par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po stong phrag dag ni drag po'i grangs //
translated: Then, to the right, it is exhausted, O lord of men, in the number of the Rudras, ten thousand.

original: stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa gcig mda' ni brgya dang bral bar gyur pa dbus nas go la'i ri mo ste //
analyzed: stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa gcig mda' ni brgya dang bral bar gyur pa dbus nas go la'i ri mo ste //
translated: One hundred and eighty-one thousand, free from one hundred arrows, is the middle line of the circle.

original: de las gang zhig 'phel dang 'grib par 'gyur ba mkha' mkha' mda' dang mda' ni byang dang lhor yang ngo //
analyzed: de las gang zhig 'phel dang 'grib par 'gyur ba mkha' mkha' mda' dang mda' ni byang dang lhor yang ngo //
translated: From that, the increase and decrease, the sky, the arrow, the arrow, in the north and south.

original: lan tshva'i rgya mtsho 'gongs nas nyin mor byed pa dag ni lho ru me yi bar du 'gro bar byed //
analyzed: lan tshva'i rgya mtsho 'gongs nas nyin mor byed pa dag ni lho ru me yi bar du 'gro bar byed //
translated: Having crossed the salt ocean, the sun moves to the south, up to the sign of Aries.

original: kee la sha yi byang du 'gro ste gangs kyi ri la byang du yang ni byang la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: kee la sha yi byang du 'gro ste gangs kyi ri la byang du yang ni byang la gnas pa'o //
translated: It moves to the north of Kailash, to the HimƒÅlaya, and to the north, it remains in the north.

original: mda' rnams tshes kyis bsgyur ba'i dpag tshad stong phrag rnams ni phyogs kyis bgrod pa dag la 'gro bar byed //
analyzed: mda' rnams tshes kyis bsgyur ba'i dpag tshad stong phrag rnams ni phyogs kyis bgrod pa dag la 'gro bar byed //
translated: The arrows are the thousand yojanas multiplied by the number of the month.

original: phyed bcas mig klu zlas thob nyin dang nyin la 'dor ba lnga dang sa 'dzin stong phrag dag las so //
analyzed: phyed bcas mig klu zlas thob nyin dang nyin la 'dor ba lnga dang sa 'dzin stong phrag dag las so //
translated: The half plus the degrees of the nƒÅga sign, multiplied by the degrees of the sun, are subtracted from five thousand mountains.

original: khyim gcig la ni nyi ma gnas pas mtha' dag dus kyi tshogs dang zla ba dang ni phyogs rnams byed //
