analyzed: khyim gcig la ni nyi ma gnas pas mtha' dag dus kyi tshogs dang zla ba dang ni phyogs rnams byed //
translated: The sun in one sign makes the total of the time, the moon, and the directions.

original: dum bu dum bu dag tu zla bar 'gyur te sa gzhi bcu gnyis rtsibs rnams la ni rim pas so //
analyzed: dum bu dum bu dag tu zla bar 'gyur te sa gzhi bcu gnyis rtsibs rnams la ni rim pas so //
translated: The moon is in one part or another, in twelve parts of the earth, in the spokes, in order.

original: tshad gang dum bu gang du nyin mo'i dbang gis yin pa de ni bdun pa dag tu mtshan mo la'o //
analyzed: tshad gang dum bu gang du nyin mo'i dbang gis yin pa de ni bdun pa dag tu mtshan mo la'o //
translated: The measure of the part in which the sun is by day is in the seventh by night.

original: lam phyed 'bum phrag gsum po dag la nyi ma'i mdun du @38a *//
analyzed: lam phyed 'bum phrag gsum po dag la nyi ma'i mdun du @38a *//
translated: On the three hundred thousand half-paths, the sun is in front.

original: nyin mo dang ni rgyab tu mtshan mo'o //
analyzed: nyin mo dang ni rgyab tu mtshan mo'o //
translated: By day, and behind by night.

original: ri yi rgyal po dag ni skye bo thams cad kyi yang byang na gnas par 'gyur ro mi yi bdag /
analyzed: ri yi rgyal po dag ni skye bo thams cad kyi yang byang na gnas par 'gyur ro mi yi bdag /
translated: The king of mountains, Sumeru, is in the north of all the people, O King.

original: nyi ma 'char ba shar du 'gyur te ri dang mnyam pa bgrod pa dag dang de ni nub pa nub //
analyzed: nyi ma 'char ba shar du 'gyur te ri dang mnyam pa bgrod pa dag dang de ni nub pa nub //
translated: The sun rises in the east, and sets in the west, moving as if equal to the mountains.

original: dus dang thun mtshams bzhi dang thun tshod nyin dang mtshan mo dus kun du ni yang dag rgyu ba rnams //
analyzed: dus dang thun mtshams bzhi dang thun tshod nyin dang mtshan mo dus kun du ni yang dag rgyu ba rnams //
translated: It moves correctly in the four periods of the day and night, and in the four periods of the day and night.

original: dus sbyor dbye bas phye bar gyur ba lhun po'i phyogs rnams su ni rab gsal nyi ma'i sa la 'khor //
analyzed: dus sbyor dbye bas phye bar gyur ba lhun po'i phyogs rnams su ni rab gsal nyi ma'i sa la 'khor //
translated: It moves in the directions of the mountains, in the places of the sun, divided by the divisions of the periods.

original: chu tshod dus la dpag tshad stong phrag drug ni rkang pa dang bcas nyin mor byed pa 'gro ba ste //
analyzed: chu tshod dus la dpag tshad stong phrag drug ni rkang pa dang bcas nyin mor byed pa 'gro ba ste //
translated: In one period, the sun travels six thousand leagues, together with its foot.

original: drug cu la ni me 'bum dag dang lnga dang ri bo'i stong phrag nyin dang mtshan mo dag tu 'khor //
analyzed: drug cu la ni me 'bum dag dang lnga dang ri bo'i stong phrag nyin dang mtshan mo dag tu 'khor //
translated: In sixty periods, it travels one hundred thousand leagues, together with five and a thousand mountains, in the day and night.

original: nyin dang mtshan mor go la phyed la mkha' me chu tshod bgrod da go la dag la g-yas dang ni //
analyzed: nyin dang mtshan mor go la phyed la mkha' me chu tshod bgrod da go la dag la g-yas dang ni //
translated: In half a day and night, the sun travels through the sky, through the fire, and through the water. It moves to the right and to the left on the golakas.

original: g-yas min dag tu 'grib dang 'phel ba lnga ste nyin zhag so sor de ni dbugs zung chu srang gsum //
analyzed: g-yas min dag tu 'grib dang 'phel ba lnga ste nyin zhag so sor de ni dbugs zung chu srang gsum //
translated: It decreases and increases by five in the golakas to the right and to the left. Each day, it is three finger lengths in the pairs of breaths.

original: lug gi dus sbyor la ni chu sbang du 'gyur mkha' dgu lag ste mkha' dus mig ni glang la 'gyur; ;zung dag la yang mkha' mkha' gnyis te mda' ro'i chu tshed du 'gyur ku l'i ra dang seng+ge la'o //
analyzed: lug gi dus sbyor la ni chu sbang du 'gyur mkha' dgu lag ste mkha' dus mig ni glang la 'gyur; ;zung dag la yang mkha' mkha' gnyis te mda' ro'i chu tshed du 'gyur ku l'i ra dang seng+ge la'o //
translated: In the Aries season, the water is in the Aquarius decan, the ninth of the zodiac, the Aries season is in the Taurus decan, the eye of the zodiac, and the Gemini season is in the Gemini decan, the two spaces of the zodiac.üîΩ

original: bu mo la ni phyed bcas drug ste nges par srang sogs rim pa min pas de bzhin thams cad 'gyur //
analyzed: bu mo la ni phyed bcas drug ste nges par srang sogs rim pa min pas de bzhin thams cad 'gyur //
translated: In the Aries Ayanamsa, the water is in the 9th house, the 9th house is in the 1st house, the 1st house is in the 2nd house, the 2nd house is in the 3rd house, the 3rd house is in the 4th house, the 4th house is in the 5th house, the 5th house is in the 6th house, the 6th house is in the 7th house, the 7th house is in the 8th house, the 8th house is in the 9th house, the 9th house is in the 10th house, the 10th house is in the 11th house, and the 11th house is in the 12th house.üîΩIn the Taurus Ayanamsa, the 1st house is in the 1st house, the 2nd house is in the 2nd house, the 3rd house is in the 3rd house, the 4th house is in the 4th house, the 5th house is in the 5th house, the 6th house is in the 6th house, the 7th house is in the 7th house, the 8th house is in the 8th house, the 9th house is in the 9th house, the 10th house is in the 10th house, the 11th house is in the 11th house, and the 12th house is in the 12th house.

original: dus sbyor drug gis de nub gang phyir 'char ba dag kyang de bzhin nyi ma'i rgyu skar bye bas so //
analyzed: dus sbyor drug gis de nub gang phyir 'char ba dag kyang de bzhin nyi ma'i rgyu skar bye bas so //
translated: The six Ayanamsas are the same in the evening, and the same in the morning, by the motion of the sun through the lunar mansions.

original: stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig ro brgya ldan ba dag las so yi @38b cha yis nges par phyung gyur pa //
analyzed: stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig ro brgya ldan ba dag las so yi @38b cha yis nges par phyung gyur pa //
translated: From the 21,000 years, which have the measure of a caturashra, the 100 years are extracted by the 100th part.

original: lus la dbugs lhag gang dag nyin zhag so so'i dus su 'byung ba ri dang dus rnams dag gi grangs //
analyzed: lus la dbugs lhag gang dag nyin zhag so so'i dus su 'byung ba ri dang dus rnams dag gi grangs //
translated: The excess breaths in the body, which occur in each day and night, are the number of the mountains and the seasons.

original: stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug dag gis bsgyur ba rnams kyang lo brgya'i tshad du rab tu grags pa ste //
analyzed: stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug dag gis bsgyur ba rnams kyang lo brgya'i tshad du rab tu grags pa ste //
translated: The 36,000 multiplied by the 100 years is well known as the measure of a century.

original: stong dus me yis rab tu phye ba dag ni chu tshod du 'gyur drug cu'i cha yis nyin zhag kyang //
analyzed: stong dus me yis rab tu phye ba dag ni chu tshod du 'gyur drug cu'i cha yis nyin zhag kyang //
translated: When the empty [part of the day] is divided by fire, [the result] is the hours. The day is also [divided] by sixty parts.

original: zla ba'i phyogs te nyi ma'i bgrod pa dag dang sa skyes zla ba dgu rnams dag gi mtshan mo'o //
analyzed: zla ba'i phyogs te nyi ma'i bgrod pa dag dang sa skyes zla ba dgu rnams dag gi mtshan mo'o //
translated: The lunar days, the solar transits, and the nine lunar months are the nights.

original: bla ma'i lo drug tu 'gyur pa sangs kyi yang bgrod par 'gyur te zla skyes kyi yang bgrod pa'o //
analyzed: bla ma'i lo drug tu 'gyur pa sangs kyi yang bgrod par 'gyur te zla skyes kyi yang bgrod pa'o //
translated: The six months of the teacher are the day of the sun, and the six months of the student are the day of the moon.

original: tshes zhes bya ba'i lo ni nyi skyes kyis te de bzhin mun can gyi dgu rgyal po mjug ring dman //
analyzed: tshes zhes bya ba'i lo ni nyi skyes kyis te de bzhin mun can gyi dgu rgyal po mjug ring dman //
translated: The lunar year is the day of the sun, and the nine months of the dark half are the day of RƒÅhu.

original: de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus pa nor gyis bsgyur ba'i dus kyi lo dang phyed bcas zla ba gsum //
analyzed: de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus pa nor gyis bsgyur ba'i dus kyi lo dang phyed bcas zla ba gsum //
translated: All of these added together are the year of the kalpa, which is three months and a half plus the years of the planets.

original: phyed dang bcas pa'i nyin zhag grangs dag las kyang lo brgyar 'gyur te dus kyi 'khor los dman no 'dir //
analyzed: phyed dang bcas pa'i nyin zhag grangs dag las kyang lo brgyar 'gyur te dus kyi 'khor los dman no 'dir //
translated: The half-months and half-days added together make a hundred years, which is the year of the KƒÅlacakra.

original: srog ni snying stobs la 'bab rdul gyi bar dang mun pa la yang lus dag sems kyi dbye bas so //
analyzed: srog ni snying stobs la 'bab rdul gyi bar dang mun pa la yang lus dag sems kyi dbye bas so //
translated: The life force flows into sattva, rajas, and tamas, and also into the body and mind.

original: lha mi lag 'gro rnams ni de nas lnga pa nyid 'gyur zla ba phyed bcas mtshan mo dag gis kyang //
analyzed: lha mi lag 'gro rnams ni de nas lnga pa nyid 'gyur zla ba phyed bcas mtshan mo dag gis kyang //
translated: The gods, men, and animals then have five hundred [years], and the night increases by half a month.

original: grangs ni shin tu nges pa 'di dag dus kyi 'khor lor rab tu grags pa yin no mi yi dbang //
analyzed: grangs ni shin tu nges pa 'di dag dus kyi 'khor lor rab tu grags pa yin no mi yi dbang //
translated: These very certain numbers are well known in the KƒÅlacakra.

original: ma bcad dus kyi 'khor lo'i bgrod pa dag la bu lon dgu ni bsres par gyur pa mtha' dag rnams //
analyzed: ma bcad dus kyi 'khor lo'i bgrod pa dag la bu lon dgu ni bsres par gyur pa mtha' dag rnams //
translated: The nine debts of the unsevered time wheel are all mixed up.

original: bkra shis la sogs gza' ni lnga po rnams kyis myur ba'i las dag la yang rkang pa'i chu tshod de //
analyzed: bkra shis la sogs gza' ni lnga po rnams kyis myur ba'i las dag la yang rkang pa'i chu tshod de //
translated: The five planets beginning with B·πõhaspati are also the foot hours in the swift actions.

original: sa skyes la ni @39a *//
analyzed: sa skyes la ni @39a *//
translated: [The planets] are born on the earth.

original: rig byed dus mer rab 'gyur srid pa'i gnas rnams dag la rgyu ba'i dbye ba yis //
analyzed: rig byed dus mer rab 'gyur srid pa'i gnas rnams dag la rgyu ba'i dbye ba yis //
translated: The Vedas become the time fire, and the divisions of movement in the abodes of existence

original: snga phyi phyed la mtshungs par bu lon nor gyi bgrod pa dag las gnas kyi dbye bas nges par sbyar //
analyzed: snga phyi phyed la mtshungs par bu lon nor gyi bgrod pa dag las gnas kyi dbye bas nges par sbyar //
translated: are applied with certainty from the divisions of the abodes in the forward and reverse borrowing of wealth.

original: dang por rgyal dbang grangs kyi chu tshod dag ste me dang mig ni rnam gsum dag tu 'gyur //
analyzed: dang por rgyal dbang grangs kyi chu tshod dag ste me dang mig ni rnam gsum dag tu 'gyur //
translated: First, the king's power is the numbered hours, and the fire and eye are threefold.

original: gnas gnyis dag la gcig dang mig ste bco brgyad tshes dang drag po me dang rtsa bar drag po dang // sum cu rtsa brgyad brgyad cu dag dang brtan pa srid pa'i gnas la 'dir ni gsum bcas lnga bcu 'o //
analyzed: gnas gnyis dag la gcig dang mig ste bco brgyad tshes dang drag po me dang rtsa bar drag po dang // sum cu rtsa brgyad brgyad cu dag dang brtan pa srid pa'i gnas la 'dir ni gsum bcas lnga bcu 'o //
translated: thirty-eight, eighty, and the stable ones in the abodes of existence, here are the three, making fifty.

original: de yis nyi ma rnam dag gyur la bu lon dag dang nor yang rim pa min dang rim pas so //
analyzed: de yis nyi ma rnam dag gyur la bu lon dag dang nor yang rim pa min dang rim pas so //
translated: By that, the sun becomes pure, and the debt and wealth are in reverse order and in order.

original: rig byed dag dang bug pa zla ba'i grangs ni gza' lag myur ba'i las la chu tshod dag tu 'gyur //
analyzed: rig byed dag dang bug pa zla ba'i grangs ni gza' lag myur ba'i las la chu tshod dag tu 'gyur //
translated: The number of holes in the Vedas and the moon is the hours in the swift action of Mars.

original: gnas gnyis la ni bcu drug gzhan la tshes dang ma nu myos byed drag po ri dang dbang po mkha'//
analyzed: gnas gnyis la ni bcu drug gzhan la tshes dang ma nu myos byed drag po ri dang dbang po mkha'//
translated: In the two places, sixteen; in the other, the day, Manu, the fierce one, mountain, and lord of space.

original: rtsa ba dag las rig byed drag po dang ni rab gsal nges par bcu gnyis pa la nyi shu ste //
analyzed: rtsa ba dag las rig byed drag po dang ni rab gsal nges par bcu gnyis pa la nyi shu ste //
translated: From the bases, the Veda, the fierce one, and the clear one, certainly twenty in the twelfth.

original: nyi shu brgyad dang sum cu rtsa bzhi dag kyang ma nu'i gnas la rgyu ba'i dbye bas yang dag gnas //
analyzed: nyi shu brgyad dang sum cu rtsa bzhi dag kyang ma nu'i gnas la rgyu ba'i dbye bas yang dag gnas //
translated: Twenty-eight and thirty-four also abide in the division of movement in the abode of Manu.

original: chu gter nam mkha' dag dang zla ba'i grangs te 'di dag rnams ni bla ma'i chu tshod tshogs su 'gyur //
analyzed: chu gter nam mkha' dag dang zla ba'i grangs te 'di dag rnams ni bla ma'i chu tshod tshogs su 'gyur //
translated: The number of oceans, the sky, and the moon are the teacher's hours.

original: gnas gnyis dag la phyogs kyi tshad dang dgu nor dus drug lag pa zla ba dag dang rtsa bar ni //
analyzed: gnas gnyis dag la phyogs kyi tshad dang dgu nor dus drug lag pa zla ba dag dang rtsa bar ni //
translated: In two places, the measure of the directions, the nine, the error of the age, the six times, the hands, the months, and the roots,

original: me drug bug ba dang ni drag po mi bdag thub pa dang ste rgyu ba thams cad rim pas so //
analyzed: me drug bug ba dang ni drag po mi bdag thub pa dang ste rgyu ba thams cad rim pas so //
translated: the six fires, the holes, and the fierce one, the lord of men, the sages, and the movements are all in order.

original: myur dal 'khyog @39b po la yang gza' yi tshogs ni nges par nyi ma'i dbye ba dag gis rgyu bar byed //
analyzed: myur dal 'khyog @39b po la yang gza' yi tshogs ni nges par nyi ma'i dbye ba dag gis rgyu bar byed //
translated: The group of planets moves quickly, slowly, and crookedly, certainly by the divisions of the sun.

original: drug dang zla ba chu gter grangs kyi chu tshod dag ni pa sangs kyi yang myur ba'i las la 'gyur //
analyzed: drug dang zla ba chu gter grangs kyi chu tshod dag ni pa sangs kyi yang myur ba'i las la 'gyur //
translated: Six, the moon, and the number of oceans are the hours, and also Venus's quick action.

original: gnas gsum dag la nyi shu lnga ste gnyis ni rgyal ba zhes dang de bzhin lag mig rnam pa gnyis //
analyzed: gnas gsum dag la nyi shu lnga ste gnyis ni rgyal ba zhes dang de bzhin lag mig rnam pa gnyis //
translated: In three places, twenty-five, two are called Jina, and likewise two kinds of hands and eyes.

original: skyon dang tshes dang brgyad de rtsa bar drug dang nam mkha' yon tan dag dang gcig gis dman pa'i brgya; ;mthar ni me dang ri yi grangs te brtan pa srid pa'i gnas la pa sangs rgyu ba rim pas so //
analyzed: skyon dang tshes dang brgyad de rtsa bar drug dang nam mkha' yon tan dag dang gcig gis dman pa'i brgya; ;mthar ni me dang ri yi grangs te brtan pa srid pa'i gnas la pa sangs rgyu ba rim pas so //
translated: The faults, the [signs of the] lunar day, and the eighth are six in the basic [signs]; the sky, the qualities, and one less than ten are ten; the end is the number of fire and mountain, that is, the stable [signs]. The order of the planets is in the order of their distance from Meru.

original: nyi ma'i bu la drug dang 'byung ba'i grangs kyi chu tshod tshogs pa 'di dag tu 'gyur mi yi dbang //
analyzed: nyi ma'i bu la drug dang 'byung ba'i grangs kyi chu tshod tshogs pa 'di dag tu 'gyur mi yi dbang //
translated: These are the collections of the hours of the planets, the sun and so forth, in groups of six and the number of the elements.

original: drug dang 'byung ba dag dang 'byung bar rig byed chu gter mig dang zung dang stong pa rtsa bar ni //
analyzed: drug dang 'byung ba dag dang 'byung bar rig byed chu gter mig dang zung dang stong pa rtsa bar ni //
translated: Six, the elements, the elements and the Vedas, the ocean, the eyes, the pair, and the thousand are in the basic [signs].

original: phyogs dang rig byed dag dang 'byung ba ro dang nor dang rtse mo can ni rim pas gzhag par bya; ;de ltar gza' rnams kyi ni rgyu ba mtha' dag dus kyi 'khor lo dag las shin tu nges par 'gyur //
analyzed: phyogs dang rig byed dag dang 'byung ba ro dang nor dang rtse mo can ni rim pas gzhag par bya; ;de ltar gza' rnams kyi ni rgyu ba mtha' dag dus kyi 'khor lo dag las shin tu nges par 'gyur //
translated: The directions, the Vedas, the elements, the tastes, the wealth, and the crests are arranged in order. Thus, the entire motion of the planets is very well determined from the wheel of time.

original: sum cu rtsa drug phyed bcas zla ba nges par nor gyis bsgyur ba dag ni bkra shis la sogs pa //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa drug phyed bcas zla ba nges par nor gyis bsgyur ba dag ni bkra shis la sogs pa //
translated: The thirty-six and a half [signs] are definitely transformed by the wealth [signs] into the auspicious [signs] and so forth.

original: gza' rnams dag gi dal ba'i las la rkang par 'gyur te mig bug mig gi grangs kyi chu tshod do //
analyzed: gza' rnams dag gi dal ba'i las la rkang par 'gyur te mig bug mig gi grangs kyi chu tshod do //
translated: The planets are in the feet of the Dasa of the signs, in the eyes, in the number of hours of the eyes.

original: de nyid bco brgyad ri dvags brtan pa sa yi phyi ma dang ni snga ma'i cha la ste //
analyzed: de nyid bco brgyad ri dvags brtan pa sa yi phyi ma dang ni snga ma'i cha la ste //
translated: The same, in the eighteen, in the steady, in the earth, in the latter and former parts.

original: phyogs ri mo ni gza' lag gi 'o dbang phyug dgu me bla ma'i snga cha dag dang gzhan la yang //
analyzed: phyogs ri mo ni gza' lag gi 'o dbang phyug dgu me bla ma'i snga cha dag dang gzhan la yang //
translated: The side, the painting, is of Mars; of Jupiter, in the former part of the nine lords.

original: dkar po'i mda' dang chu gter zla ba spen pa yi yang mig bcas mig dang nyin zhag dus su 'gyur //
analyzed: dkar po'i mda' dang chu gter zla ba spen pa yi yang mig bcas mig dang nyin zhag dus su 'gyur //
translated: The white arrow, the ocean, the moon, and Saturn, also, are in the eyes, in the eyes, in the day, in the time.

original: zla @40a *// pa la ni sa skyes longs spyod chu tshod dgu bcu dag ste lnga dang 'jig rten zla ba'i grangs //
analyzed: zla @40a *// pa la ni sa skyes longs spyod chu tshod dgu bcu dag ste lnga dang 'jig rten zla ba'i grangs //
translated: In the month, the earth-born, the enjoyment, the ninety hours, the five, the number of the worldly moon.

original: pa sangs kyi ste de bzhin gza' lag gi yang gcig tu bsdus pa mkha' ro bsreg za dag tu 'gyur //
analyzed: pa sangs kyi ste de bzhin gza' lag gi yang gcig tu bsdus pa mkha' ro bsreg za dag tu 'gyur //
translated: The full moon, and also the moon of Mars, gathered into one, are in the sky, in the mouth, in the RƒÅhu.

original: 'di dag zla ba gsum gyis lo yi nyin zhag bu lon chu tshod longs spyod d'i ni gsum gyi'o //
analyzed: 'di dag zla ba gsum gyis lo yi nyin zhag bu lon chu tshod longs spyod d'i ni gsum gyi'o //
translated: These, in three months, are the day of the year, the debt, the hour, the enjoyment, the third of the Dƒ´na.

original: zla bar bla ma'i longs spyod du 'gyur rab gsal chu tshod drag po'i grangs ni rkang pa dang bcas te //
analyzed: zla bar bla ma'i longs spyod du 'gyur rab gsal chu tshod drag po'i grangs ni rkang pa dang bcas te //
translated: The number of hours of the sun, together with the feet, is the enjoyment of the moon.

original: chu srang sum cu rnams dang gsal bar dus kyi chu tshod dag ni nyi ma'i bu yi longs spyod do //
analyzed: chu srang sum cu rnams dang gsal bar dus kyi chu tshod dag ni nyi ma'i bu yi longs spyod do //
translated: The thirty palas and the clearly manifest hours are the enjoyment of the sun.

original: gcig tu gyur pa nyin zhag ces bya gsum gyis bsgyur ba de yang zla ba phyed bcas mtshan mor bcas //
analyzed: gcig tu gyur pa nyin zhag ces bya gsum gyis bsgyur ba de yang zla ba phyed bcas mtshan mor bcas //
translated: The single day is called the enjoyment of the sun and moon. Multiplied by three, it is also half a month with its night.

original: gtso bo'i longs spyod la ni nyin zhag rnams kyi nyin bzhin bu lon gza' drug gi yang longs spyod do //
analyzed: gtso bo'i longs spyod la ni nyin zhag rnams kyi nyin bzhin bu lon gza' drug gi yang longs spyod do //
translated: The days are the enjoyment of the sun, and the six malefic planets are the enjoyment of the debt of the days.

original: zla gcig lhag pa gang zhig dal ba'i las la khyab bdag rjes su gza' rnams kyis ni longs ma spyad //
analyzed: zla gcig lhag pa gang zhig dal ba'i las la khyab bdag rjes su gza' rnams kyis ni longs ma spyad //
translated: The lord of the slow motion, the one month plus, is not enjoyed by the planets.

original: de las rab tu gsal bar phyed bcas bdun gyi chu tshod dag ni zla ba 'di nyid la spyod de; ;sgra gcan zla ba'i longs spyod nyi ma dang bcas zla ba'i rkang pa chu tshod phyed kyis rnam par dman //
analyzed: de las rab tu gsal bar phyed bcas bdun gyi chu tshod dag ni zla ba 'di nyid la spyod de; ;sgra gcan zla ba'i longs spyod nyi ma dang bcas zla ba'i rkang pa chu tshod phyed kyis rnam par dman //
translated: From that, the clearly manifest hours, together with the half, are enjoyed by this moon itself. RƒÅhu enjoys the moon with the sun, and the foot of the moon is diminished by half an hour.

original: nyi ma'i bgrod pa dang po la gsum zla ba myos byed nyin zhag dag la zla ba'i chu tshod lnga; ;gang zhig ma spyad phyed kyi chu tshod de ni dus kyi nyin zhag dus la cha dman zla ba ste //
analyzed: nyi ma'i bgrod pa dang po la gsum zla ba myos byed nyin zhag dag la zla ba'i chu tshod lnga; ;gang zhig ma spyad phyed kyi chu tshod de ni dus kyi nyin zhag dus la cha dman zla ba ste //
translated: In the first revolution of the sun, three, one-fifth of a lunar day, and one-fifth of a lunar day and a half are not used. That is the time of the lunar day, the time of the solar day, and the time of the half-month.üîΩThat is the excess of the sun, which is certainly transformed by the time. The solar day is the lunar day of the sun.

original: de ni nyi ma'i lhag par 'gyur te nges par dus kyis bsgyur ba nyi ma'i zla bar nyin zhag @40b de'o; ;sgra gcan zla ba'i longs spyod mig gis rnam par bsgyur te phyogs kyi longs spyod dag gis bgos pha las //
analyzed: de ni nyi ma'i lhag par 'gyur te nges par dus kyis bsgyur ba nyi ma'i zla bar nyin zhag @40b de'o; ;sgra gcan zla ba'i longs spyod mig gis rnam par bsgyur te phyogs kyi longs spyod dag gis bgos pha las //
translated: RƒÅhu, by the aspect of the moon, transforms the lunar mansions. Having divided them by the aspects of the directions,

original: thob pa dag ni mjug ring chu tshod nyin zhag so so'i dus su sgra gcan zla ba'i longs spyod las //
analyzed: thob pa dag ni mjug ring chu tshod nyin zhag so so'i dus su sgra gcan zla ba'i longs spyod las //
translated: the gains are the lunar mansions, the hours, and the days, in the time of each. From the lunar mansions of the moon,

original: chu srang bdun dang phyad 'phrog nges par yon tan gyis bsgyur nyi ma'i longs spyod dag la spyang bar bya //
analyzed: chu srang bdun dang phyad 'phrog nges par yon tan gyis bsgyur nyi ma'i longs spyod dag la spyang bar bya //
translated: RƒÅhu takes seven gha·π≠ikƒÅs and one pala, certainly transformed by the qualities. He takes them from the lunar mansions of the sun.

original: mjug ring nyi ma dag dang lhan cig rnam par rgyu ste myur 'khyog dag la mdun dang rgya ba nas so //
analyzed: mjug ring nyi ma dag dang lhan cig rnam par rgyu ste myur 'khyog dag la mdun dang rgya ba nas so //
translated: The lunar mansions move together with the sun. They are in front and behind in the swift and curved [paths].

original: rgyu bar chu srang phyed bcas gnyis spyod nyin dang nyin la nyi ma'i longs spyod dag las rim pa ste //
analyzed: rgyu bar chu srang phyed bcas gnyis spyod nyin dang nyin la nyi ma'i longs spyod dag las rim pa ste //
translated: The two and a half nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s, in sequence, are the daily enjoyment of the sun.

original: rang gi zla ba sum cu drug gis de rgyu chu tshod dag kyang 'jig rten gyis ni tshes grangs bsgyur //
analyzed: rang gi zla ba sum cu drug gis de rgyu chu tshod dag kyang 'jig rten gyis ni tshes grangs bsgyur //
translated: The world converts the cause nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s of that into the lunar days.

original: phyed bcas zla bar chu tshod gnyis ni nyin zhag so sor 'char te myur 'khyog dag la mdun rgyab tu 'o //
analyzed: phyed bcas zla bar chu tshod gnyis ni nyin zhag so sor 'char te myur 'khyog dag la mdun rgyab tu 'o //
translated: Two and a half nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s in a month arise in each day; in the swift and crooked [nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s], they are in front and behind.

original: phyed bcas zla ba'i bar dag tu ni de yi 'char ba mi yi 'jig rten dag tu mthong par 'gyur //
analyzed: phyed bcas zla ba'i bar dag tu ni de yi 'char ba mi yi 'jig rten dag tu mthong par 'gyur //
translated: The arising of that [sun] is seen in the world of humans for the period of a month and a half.

original: slar yang dpal dus 'khor lor rab 'jug de ni gang tshe lo yi longs spyod dag la mthong mi 'gyur //
analyzed: slar yang dpal dus 'khor lor rab 'jug de ni gang tshe lo yi longs spyod dag la mthong mi 'gyur //
translated: Again, when it enters the glorious KƒÅlacakra, it is not seen in the enjoyment of the year.

original: de yi 'char ba'i cha dag shes par gyur na de yi 'char ba mtha' yas dus kyang shes par 'gyur //
analyzed: de yi 'char ba'i cha dag shes par gyur na de yi 'char ba mtha' yas dus kyang shes par 'gyur //
translated: If the part of its arising is known, its arising is known as infinite time.

original: lo yi nyin zhag lnga yis bsgyur te slar yang mdas bsnun bgrod pa'i nyin zhag dag gis rab tu dman //
analyzed: lo yi nyin zhag lnga yis bsgyur te slar yang mdas bsnun bgrod pa'i nyin zhag dag gis rab tu dman //
translated: Five days of the year are converted, and again, the days of travel are subtracted by five.

original: bug pa bsres pa rnams ni rang gis bgrod pa'i yon tan dbang gis gza' rnams dkyil 'khor dag tu 'gyur //
analyzed: bug pa bsres pa rnams ni rang gis bgrod pa'i yon tan dbang gis gza' rnams dkyil 'khor dag tu 'gyur //
translated: The planets are in the zodiacs by the power of the qualities of their own paths.üîΩFor the earth-born, the sum of the days of the six mountains and the nƒÅgas is the zodiac. The mountain and the nƒÅga are for the moon-born.

original: sa skyes la ni ri klu drug gi nyin zhag tshogs su 'gyur te ri bug ri klu zla skyes la'o //üîΩ@41a *// lha yi bla ma dag la so me rig byed du 'gyur pa sangs la ni ri dang rgyal ba mig /üîΩnyi ma'i bu la drug drug ri dang nam mkha' gcig gi nyin zhag tshogs ni dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sa skyes la ni ri klu drug gi nyin zhag tshogs su 'gyur te ri bug ri klu zla skyes la'o // @41a *// lha yi bla ma dag la so me rig byed du 'gyur pa sangs la ni ri dang rgyal ba mig / nyi ma'i bu la drug drug ri dang nam mkha' gcig gi nyin zhag tshogs ni dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ro //
translated: For the gods, the sum of the days of the mountain and the sun is the zodiac. For the sun-born, the sum of the days of the mountain and the moon is the zodiac.üîΩFor the son of the sun, the sum of the days of the mountain and the sky is the zodiac.üîΩFor the earth-born, the sum of the days of the mountain and the time is the zodiac.üîΩFor the moon-born, the sum of the days of the mountain and the time is the zodiac.üîΩFor the sun-born, the sum of the days of the mountain and the time is the zodiac.üîΩFor the son of the sun, the sum of the days of the mountain and the time is the zodiac.

analyzed: sa skyes la ni ri dus gcig kyang nges par nor du 'gyur te zla ba'i bu la brgyas bsnun pa //
translated: For the son of the moon, the sum of the days of the mountain and the time is the zodiac.üîΩFor the son of the sun, the sum of the days of the mountain and the time is the zodiac.üîΩFor the son of the moon, the sum of the days of the mountain and the time is the zodiac.üîΩFor the son of the sun, the sum of the days of the mountain and the time is the zodiac.üîΩFor the son of the moon, the sum of the days of the mountain and the time is the zodiac.

analyzed: me dang nyi ma ri yis dman zhing pa sangs dag la nyin zhag bcus bsgyur chu gter brgyad kyis dman //
translated: For the son of the sun, the sum of the days of the mountain and the time is the zodiac.üîΩFor the son of the moon, the sum of the days of the mountain and the time is the zodiac.üîΩFor the son of the sun, the sum of the days of the mountain and the time is the zodiac.üîΩFor the son of the moon, the sum of the days of the mountain and the time is the zodiac.üîΩFor the son of the sun, the sum of the days of the mountain and the time is the zodiac.üîΩFor the son of the moon, the sum of the days of the mountain and the time is the zodiac.üîΩFor the son of the sun, the sum of the days of the mountain and the time is the zodiac.

original: stong mkha' dus mig dag dang mkha' lag gdengs can dus rnams blon po nyi skyes dag la bu lon 'gyur //
analyzed: stong mkha' dus mig dag dang mkha' lag gdengs can dus rnams blon po nyi skyes dag la bu lon 'gyur //
translated: For the son of the moon, the sum of the days of the mountain and the time is the zodiac.üîΩFor the son of

original: sa skyes la ni phyed bcas dgu ste lag la phyed lhag mi bdag rgyu skar nyi ma bla ma la'o //
analyzed: sa skyes la ni phyed bcas dgu ste lag la phyed lhag mi bdag rgyu skar nyi ma bla ma la'o //
translated: [If] the ascendant is in the ninth house, [the native] has nine [years of] life, half of which is left in the hand. The ruler of the ascendant is the sun.

original: pa sangs la drug nyi skyes la skyon bu lon du 'gyur mtha' dag longs spyod dbus nas sbyang bar bya //
analyzed: pa sangs la drug nyi skyes la skyon bu lon du 'gyur mtha' dag longs spyod dbus nas sbyang bar bya //
translated: If the ascendant is in the sixth house, [the native] has six [years of] life, half of which is left in the hand. The ruler of the ascendant is the moon.

original: phyi nas de dag rnams ni dag par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po skye ba'i rgyu skar rgyu ba las //
analyzed: phyi nas de dag rnams ni dag par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po skye ba'i rgyu skar rgyu ba las //
translated: Afterwards, they will be purified, O lord of men, by the motion of the birth star.

original: dma' ba rang gi yan lag dag las dag 'gyur bgrod pa'i dbang gis mthon po nyi ma'i dbus gnas so //
analyzed: dma' ba rang gi yan lag dag las dag 'gyur bgrod pa'i dbang gis mthon po nyi ma'i dbus gnas so //
translated: The low [planets] are purified from their own limbs; the high [planets] are in the middle of the sun by the power of motion.

original: zla ba drug gis zla pa'i longs spyod bsgyur ba las kyang dus kyi 'khor lo'i lo yi zla ba yis //
analyzed: zla ba drug gis zla pa'i longs spyod bsgyur ba las kyang dus kyi 'khor lo'i lo yi zla ba yis //
translated: The lunar months are transformed into the year of the KƒÅlacakra by the lunar months of the year.

original: cha thob dag kyang bu lon du 'gyur nyi ma ri beng can gyis rjes su ma spyang chu tshod phyed //
analyzed: cha thob dag kyang bu lon du 'gyur nyi ma ri beng can gyis rjes su ma spyang chu tshod phyed //
translated: The parts obtained are also transformed into debt. Half a watch is not purified by the sun in the west.

original: slar yang mjug ring gi ni gang zhig lhag pa nyin zhag so so'i dus su zla ba'i nyin gyis bsgyur //
analyzed: slar yang mjug ring gi ni gang zhig lhag pa nyin zhag so so'i dus su zla ba'i nyin gyis bsgyur //
translated: Again, whatever remains of the long tail is transformed by the lunar days of each day.

original: drug cu'i cha yis chu tshod nyin zhag so so'i dus su myur dang 'khyog por 'char ba dag la yang //
analyzed: drug cu'i cha yis chu tshod nyin zhag so so'i dus su myur dang 'khyog por 'char ba dag la yang //
translated: The hours and the days arise quickly and crookedly by the sixty-year cycle.

original: zla skyes @41b blon po myur ba dag la stobs dang ldan par 'gyur te sa skyes mjug ring 'khyog po la //
analyzed: zla skyes @41b blon po myur ba dag la stobs dang ldan par 'gyur te sa skyes mjug ring 'khyog po la //
translated: The moon-born ministers, the quick ones, are powerful; the earth-born, the long-tailed, the crooked,

original: dman pa pa sangs dal ba la ste rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis rgyu ba lhag ma la stobs med //
analyzed: dman pa pa sangs dal ba la ste rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis rgyu ba lhag ma la stobs med //
translated: are inferior; the slow ones, the PƒÅ≈õa, are weak, by the power of their natural qualities. The rest are powerless.

original: myur la shar du kha phyogs 'gyur te slar yang 'khyog por rgyu la rab zhugs gzhan du mngon par phyogs //
analyzed: myur la shar du kha phyogs 'gyur te slar yang 'khyog por rgyu la rab zhugs gzhan du mngon par phyogs //
translated: The quick ones turn their faces to the east; again, entering the crooked course, they turn to the other directions.

original: dal la lho ru bzhin phyogs 'gyur te rang bgrod yon tan dbang gas 'byung ba la yang byang du gdong //
analyzed: dal la lho ru bzhin phyogs 'gyur te rang bgrod yon tan dbang gas 'byung ba la yang byang du gdong //
translated: The slow ones turn their faces to the south; by the power of their natural qualities, they turn their faces to the north in the course of the elements.

original: zla ba'i nyin zhag sum cu gang dag chu gter gyis bsgyur mkha' mig zla ba zla ba'i rkang pa ste //
analyzed: zla ba'i nyin zhag sum cu gang dag chu gter gyis bsgyur mkha' mig zla ba zla ba'i rkang pa ste //
translated: The thirty lunar days, converted by the ocean, are the lunar mansions, the moon's feet.

original: khyim ni bcu gnyis po rnams dus kyis bsgyur ba brgyad dang rig byed dag kyang nyi ma'i rkang pa'o //
analyzed: khyim ni bcu gnyis po rnams dus kyis bsgyur ba brgyad dang rig byed dag kyang nyi ma'i rkang pa'o //
translated: The twelve houses, converted by time, are the eight, and the Vedas are the feet of the sun.

original: de yi nang du 'grib dang 'phel ba dag kyang bgrod pa 'gro pa'i dbang gis rim min rim pa ste //
analyzed: de yi nang du 'grib dang 'phel ba dag kyang bgrod pa 'gro pa'i dbang gis rim min rim pa ste //
translated: The increase and decrease of the moon are due to the path of the moving [sun].

original: 'khor lo phyed phyed dag la mtha' dag nor dang dus kyi grangs rnams rig par bya'o mi yi dbang //
analyzed: 'khor lo phyed phyed dag la mtha' dag nor dang dus kyi grangs rnams rig par bya'o mi yi dbang //
translated: The half months and the full months are to be understood as the measure of time for the rulers of men.

original: tshigs mtshams su ni ri bong can gyi dkyil 'khor dag la sgra gcan rab tu 'jug ste dkyil 'khor yang //
analyzed: tshigs mtshams su ni ri bong can gyi dkyil 'khor dag la sgra gcan rab tu 'jug ste dkyil 'khor yang //
translated: At the joints [of the ecliptic] RƒÅhu enters the orb of the moon, and the orb [of the moon]

original: rnam dag gyur na thams cad 'dzin te ri bong ldan pa'i dbang gis dkyil 'khor chu tshod drug cu'o //
analyzed: rnam dag gyur na thams cad 'dzin te ri bong ldan pa'i dbang gis dkyil 'khor chu tshod drug cu'o //
translated: is completely filled when it is full. By the power of the rabbit [in the moon], the orb is sixty time-measures.

original: phyed dag gyur na phyed 'dzin ri bong can gyi dbang gis chu tshod dag ni ji snyed yod pa ste //
analyzed: phyed dag gyur na phyed 'dzin ri bong can gyi dbang gis chu tshod dag ni ji snyed yod pa ste //
translated: When it is half filled, it holds half. By the power of the rabbit, there are as many time-measures as there are [degrees of the] orb.

original: nag dang dkar ba'i tshigs mtshams dag la nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su nyi ma dang ni zla ba 'dzin //
analyzed: nag dang dkar ba'i tshigs mtshams dag la nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su nyi ma dang ni zla ba 'dzin //
translated: At the joints of the dark and light halves, the sun and moon hold day and night.

original: mi rnams kyi ni lo brgya dag kyang gza' rnams dag gi lo yi longs spyod kyis ni bsgyur bar bya //
analyzed: mi rnams kyi ni lo brgya dag kyang gza' rnams dag gi lo yi longs spyod kyis ni bsgyur bar bya //
translated: The years of men are one year of the planets, which is to be converted.

original: gnas gnyis @42a *//
analyzed: gnas gnyis @42a *//
translated: The two places

original: phyogs kyi chas thob de ni bu lon du 'gyur steng gi phung po dag la sbyang bar bya //
analyzed: phyogs kyi chas thob de ni bu lon du 'gyur steng gi phung po dag la sbyang bar bya //
translated: are obtained by the parts of the directions. They are debts to be repaid to the aggregates.

original: 'bum phrag nyi shu gcig dang khri phrag drug gi lo grangs gang dag rnams ni dus kyi phyed la 'o //
analyzed: 'bum phrag nyi shu gcig dang khri phrag drug gi lo grangs gang dag rnams ni dus kyi phyed la 'o //
translated: The number of years is twenty-one hundred thousand and sixty thousand, which is half the time.

original: slar yang phung po gnyis kyis nges par bzhi po rnams kyi lo yi grangs dag tu ni rab tu 'gyur //
analyzed: slar yang phung po gnyis kyis nges par bzhi po rnams kyi lo yi grangs dag tu ni rab tu 'gyur //
translated: Again, by two aggregates, the number of years of the four is definitely so.

original: stong ba stong pa nam mkha' klu dang lag pa thub pa ri bong can rnams rdzogs ldan dus kyi tshad //
analyzed: stong ba stong pa nam mkha' klu dang lag pa thub pa ri bong can rnams rdzogs ldan dus kyi tshad //
translated: The empty, the empty, the sky, the nƒÅga, the hand, the sage, and the rabbit are the measure of the time of the Satya Yuga.

original: gsum ldan la ni nam mkha' mkha' stong ro dang dgu dang nyin byed lo yi grangs su rab tu grags //
analyzed: gsum ldan la ni nam mkha' mkha' stong ro dang dgu dang nyin byed lo yi grangs su rab tu grags //
translated: The sky, the empty sky, the taste, the nine, and the sun are well known as the number of years of the TretƒÅ Yuga.

original: stong pa stong pa mkha' dang rig byed ro dang lag 'gro zhes pa gnyis ldan lor ni yang dag ste //
analyzed: stong pa stong pa mkha' dang rig byed ro dang lag 'gro zhes pa gnyis ldan lor ni yang dag ste //
translated: The empty, the empty, the sky, the Veda, the taste, and the moving one are the perfect years of the DvƒÅpara Yuga.

original: stong pa nam mkha' mkha' mig yon tan chu gter rnams kyi lo yi grangs ni rtsod pa'i dus la 'gyur //
analyzed: stong pa nam mkha' mkha' mig yon tan chu gter rnams kyi lo yi grangs ni rtsod pa'i dus la 'gyur //
translated: The empty, the sky, the sky, the eye, the quality, and the ocean are the number of years of the Kali Yuga.

original: lo ni 'di dag rnams kyis dus kyi mtha' ru gza' tshogs rgyu ba khyim ni stong pa dag la gnas //
analyzed: lo ni 'di dag rnams kyis dus kyi mtha' ru gza' tshogs rgyu ba khyim ni stong pa dag la gnas //
translated: At the end of these years, the planets move in the empty houses.

original: slar yang tha skar la sogs dag dang rab byung zhes dang de bzhin nag po'i zla ba la sogs dang // gza' dang spyor ba tshes dang byed pa rnams kyang de bzhin dang po dag ste de yi dus su ni //
analyzed: slar yang tha skar la sogs dag dang rab byung zhes dang de bzhin nag po'i zla ba la sogs dang // gza' dang spyor ba tshes dang byed pa rnams kyang de bzhin dang po dag ste de yi dus su ni //
translated: Again, the conjunctions of the asterisms beginning with A≈õvinƒ´ and the months beginning with ƒÄ·π£ƒÅ·∏çha, the conjunctions of the planets, the lunar days, and the activities, are as before. At that time,

original: lha rnams dag dang lha min rnams kyis 'khrug ba drag po sa gzhi'i gnas rnams su ni 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: lha rnams dag dang lha min rnams kyis 'khrug ba drag po sa gzhi'i gnas rnams su ni 'byung bar 'gyur //
translated: a great war between the gods and the asuras will occur on the earth.

original: sde pa drug ni nyi ma'i dbyangs bcas nges par yon tan gyis bsgyur lo gsum nyi ma dag la ste //
analyzed: sde pa drug ni nyi ma'i dbyangs bcas nges par yon tan gyis bsgyur lo gsum nyi ma dag la ste //
translated: The six houses, along with the solar tones, are definitely transformed by the qualities, in three years and days.

original: aa sogs thung du nyin zhag ces bya sum 'gyur ri bong can cha phyed bcas zla ba zla ba la //
analyzed: aa sogs thung du nyin zhag ces bya sum 'gyur ri bong can cha phyed bcas zla ba zla ba la //
translated: The short vowels beginning with a are called days, tripled. The lunar mansions, along with the half, are the months.

original: chu tshod ha sogs dbyangs bcas @42b sum 'gyur gang yin de dag rnams kyang sgra gcan gyi ni mtshan mo gsum //
analyzed: chu tshod ha sogs dbyangs bcas @42b sum 'gyur gang yin de dag rnams kyang sgra gcan gyi ni mtshan mo gsum //
translated: The gha·π≠ƒ´s, along with the vowels beginning with ha, tripled, are the three nights of RƒÅhu.

original: dpal ldan stong pa gzhom med la sogs sum 'gyur gang de rnams kyang sgra gcan gyi ni dus sbyor gsum //
analyzed: dpal ldan stong pa gzhom med la sogs sum 'gyur gang de rnams kyang sgra gcan gyi ni dus sbyor gsum //
translated: The three revolutions of the glorious empty, the imperishable, and so on are the three conjunctions of RƒÅhu.

original: 'byung ba nyi ma zla ba'i grangs ni mi yi bdag po phyed bcas zla ba dag dang lo gsum mo //
analyzed: 'byung ba nyi ma zla ba'i grangs ni mi yi bdag po phyed bcas zla ba dag dang lo gsum mo //
translated: The number of days of the elements, the sun, and the moon, O lord of men, is three years and a half month.

original: phyed dang bcas pa'i zla ba dor nas thub mchog rnams kyis bcad pa dag ni dus kyi 'khor lor 'gyur //
analyzed: phyed dang bcas pa'i zla ba dor nas thub mchog rnams kyis bcad pa dag ni dus kyi 'khor lor 'gyur //
translated: Having subtracted a half month, the divisions of the supreme sages are the KƒÅlacakra.

original: zla bar bsreg pa gza' gcig dang ni mi bdag nyis 'gyur chu tshod tshogs la gnyis dang rkang pa mda'//
analyzed: zla bar bsreg pa gza' gcig dang ni mi bdag nyis 'gyur chu tshod tshogs la gnyis dang rkang pa mda'//
translated: One planet is burned in a month, and in the collection of two double human hours, there are two feet and a bow.

original: 'khor lo dag las nges par lha mo drug cu rnams kyis rnam par phye ba dag ni gzar 'gyur ro; ;sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kyang chu tshod thub pa nor gyis bsgyur ba'i lha mo rnams las tshogs la gnyis //
analyzed: 'khor lo dag las nges par lha mo drug cu rnams kyis rnam par phye ba dag ni gzar 'gyur ro; ;sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kyang chu tshod thub pa nor gyis bsgyur ba'i lha mo rnams las tshogs la gnyis //
translated: From the wheels, the planets are definitely distinguished by the sixty goddesses, and by the thirty-two, there are two in the collection of human hours, the goddesses multiplied by the wealth of the sages.

original: sbyin dor sbyin pa dag dang ri bong can gyi rkang pa dang po lnga ste 'dir ni drug gis so //
analyzed: sbyin dor sbyin pa dag dang ri bong can gyi rkang pa dang po lnga ste 'dir ni drug gis so //
translated: The first five feet of the rabbit-marked [moon] are subtracted from the gifts, and here, by six.

original: zla ba'i phyogs gsum nyin zhag rnams ni sum 'gyur dag kyang nyi ma'i longs spyod la ni rab tu grags //
analyzed: zla ba'i phyogs gsum nyin zhag rnams ni sum 'gyur dag kyang nyi ma'i longs spyod la ni rab tu grags //
translated: The three lunar fortnights and the days are also tripled, and are well known as the enjoyments of the sun.

original: drug cus phye ba'i skar ma gnyis dang nyi ma'i nyin zhag dang por spyod ldan dbang phyug chu tshod do; ;dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo gza' yi tshogs dang bcas pa 'di dag phyi dang lus la dbyer med par //
analyzed: drug cus phye ba'i skar ma gnyis dang nyi ma'i nyin zhag dang por spyod ldan dbang phyug chu tshod do; ;dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo gza' yi tshogs dang bcas pa 'di dag phyi dang lus la dbyer med par //
translated: The two stars divided by sixty, the first day of the sun, and the lord of the hours are the glorious Wheel of Time, along with the host of planets, inseparable from the outer and the body.

original: bsdu ba dang ni sbro ba'i slad du srid pa gsum gyi gnas su nyi ma dus kyi gzugs dang ni; ;shes rab thabs kyi rab dbye dang ni mnyam dang mi mnyam rigs dang myur 'khyog la sogs rgyu ba ste //üîΩchags bral dang ni thub mchog rigs dang tshangs dang drag po la sogs lha rnams kyis ni @43a *//
analyzed: bsdu ba dang ni sbro ba'i slad du srid pa gsum gyi gnas su nyi ma dus kyi gzugs dang ni; ;shes rab thabs kyi rab dbye dang ni mnyam dang mi mnyam rigs dang myur 'khyog la sogs rgyu ba ste // chags bral dang ni thub mchog rigs dang tshangs dang drag po la sogs lha rnams kyis ni @43a *//
translated: For the sake of gathering and spreading, the forms of the sun and time in the abodes of the three worlds, the distinctions of wisdom and method, the even and uneven movements of the channels, and so forth,üîΩare not known by the gods such as Brahma, Rudra, and so forth,

original: shes ma yin //
analyzed: shes ma yin //
translated: who are free from attachment and of the supreme lineage of sages.

original: aa sogs lnga yis dbyangs gang dang po'i tshes grangs dbang gis dga' ba la sogs lnga dang ldan gyur ba //
analyzed: aa sogs lnga yis dbyangs gang dang po'i tshes grangs dbang gis dga' ba la sogs lnga dang ldan gyur ba //
translated: The vowels beginning with A, by the power of the lunar day, are endowed with the five, beginning with Joy.

original: de dag 'dir ni 'char byed mi bdag gal te de las skyes la sogs gza' dag ma gyur na'o //
analyzed: de dag 'dir ni 'char byed mi bdag gal te de las skyes la sogs gza' dag ma gyur na'o //
translated: If the planets beginning with the Ascendant are not in them,

original: sa skyes mi shis shar bar gyur cing gal te slar yang smin drug dag dang ldan pa nyid gyur ba //
analyzed: sa skyes mi shis shar bar gyur cing gal te slar yang smin drug dag dang ldan pa nyid gyur ba //
translated: if the inauspicious Ascendant has arisen, and if it is again endowed with the constellation Hasta,

original: de la gal te g-yul dang nad du gyur na mi rnams 'chi bar 'gyur te dang po'i dbyangs kyi'o //
analyzed: de la gal te g-yul dang nad du gyur na mi rnams 'chi bar 'gyur te dang po'i dbyangs kyi'o //
translated: if there is war or sickness, men will die. This is for the first vowel.

original: bzang po zla skyes dag gis gza' 'di la ni gal te mchu nyid ldan na gnyis pa 'chi bar 'gyur //
analyzed: bzang po zla skyes dag gis gza' 'di la ni gal te mchu nyid ldan na gnyis pa 'chi bar 'gyur //
translated: If this planet is in the constellation Mriga≈õiras, and if it is in the constellation M·πõga≈õiras, the second will die.

original: rgyal ba bla ma dag la gal te skag tu gyur na gsum pa dag ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: rgyal ba bla ma dag la gal te skag tu gyur na gsum pa dag ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin //
translated: If it is in the constellation Punarvasu, the third will die.

original: stong pa'i tshes dang pa sangs dag la gal te mon grur gyur na bzhi pa dag ni 'chi bar 'gyur //
analyzed: stong pa'i tshes dang pa sangs dag la gal te mon grur gyur na bzhi pa dag ni 'chi bar 'gyur //
translated: If it is in the constellation ƒÄ≈õle·π£ƒÅ, the fourth will die.

original: rdzogs pa spen pa dag dang lhan cig tu ni bra nye gyur na lnga pa 'chi ba nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: rdzogs pa spen pa dag dang lhan cig tu ni bra nye gyur na lnga pa 'chi ba nyid du 'gyur //
translated: When the sun is with the Pleiades and the twin stars, the fifth house is death.

original: nyi ma dag la dga' ba 'char ba rnams kyi rmar yang 'gyur te gzir ba rnams ni nyon mongs nyid //
analyzed: nyi ma dag la dga' ba 'char ba rnams kyi rmar yang 'gyur te gzir ba rnams ni nyon mongs nyid //
translated: The sun rising in the asterism of the happy ones is a disease; the afflicted ones are afflicted.

original: zla ba la ni bzang po 'char ba rnams kyi nges bar g-yul dang nad dag la yang de bzhin 'gyur //
analyzed: zla ba la ni bzang po 'char ba rnams kyi nges bar g-yul dang nad dag la yang de bzhin 'gyur //
translated: The moon rising in the asterism of the happy ones is certain victory in battle and likewise in disease.üîΩThe five rising in the asterism of the true ones is the result of many fruits; for the inferior, it is the conjunction of death.

original: bden par 'char ba lnga po rnams kyi 'bras bu mang phor 'chi ba'i sbyor bas dman pa dag la 'gyur; ;nad dang g-yul dang yul du bgrod dang bag ma dag la dge dang mi dge'i 'bras bu shes bar bya //
analyzed: bden par 'char ba lnga po rnams kyi 'bras bu mang phor 'chi ba'i sbyor bas dman pa dag la 'gyur; ;nad dang g-yul dang yul du bgrod dang bag ma dag la dge dang mi dge'i 'bras bu shes bar bya //
translated: Know the results, good and bad, in disease, battle, travel to the country, and in marriage.

analyzed: de ltar rgyu skar gza' ste dbyangs tshogs tshes rnams dag ni de nyid lnga yi @43b rab tu dbye pa yis //

analyzed: phyogs dang zla ba bgrod pa dag dang lo dang drug cu'i lo rnams la yang 'dir ni 'char bar 'gyur //

analyzed: nag ba sogs la 'dir ni yan lag bcu gnyis dag gis 'char 'gyur phyogs kyi dbye ba de nyid do //

analyzed: ka sogs sde pa'i yi ge rnams la rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis mtha' dag sbyar bar bya ba ste //
translated: The letters of the alphabet are to be applied in their entirety by the power of the natural qualities.

analyzed: thung ngu rnams ni 'dir yang dkar po'i phyogs la 'char bar 'gyur te de nyid lnga yi dbye bas so //
translated: The short ones arise here in the bright fortnight, divided into five.

analyzed: ring po rnams ni nag po'i phyogs la shin tu nges par 'gyur te spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor bas so //
translated: The long ones are certainly in the dark fortnight, by the application of expansion and contraction.

analyzed: nyi shu rtsa bdun rgyu skar de la gsal bar mda' yi chu tshod nyi ma'i dus sbyor cha dgu pa //
translated: The twenty-seven constellations are clear there, in the nine-part solar periods of the hours of the arrow.

analyzed: lug gi dus sbyor la sogs 'di dag rnams kyang 'dir ni rang bzhin gsum ste brtan g-yo shin tu mnyam //
translated: These solar periods beginning with Aries are here of three kinds, stable, moving, and very even.

analyzed: lug dang @44a *//
translated: Aries,

original: lhag ma gzhan ni gnyis kyi rang bzhin de dag nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su rtag pa nyid du 'char; ;de la yud tsam sum cu rnams dang nyin zhag dus la chu tshod dag kyang drug cu kho na ste //

analyzed: stong pa rlung me chu dang sa rnams dag kyang aa la sogs pa dbyangs ni lnga pho rnams kyi rigs //

analyzed: sngar brjod dus sbyor re re de la nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbang gis chu tshed rnams ni bsgrub par bya //

analyzed: g-yas la de nyid 'dzin ma sogs dang gza' yi tshogs ni nges par nyi ma'i bu la sogs pa nyid //

analyzed: phyi rol tu yang dus kyi chu @44b tshod gza' yi gnas dang mnyam pa dbyangs bcas dag ni bsgrub par bya //

analyzed: dris na g-yul gyi slad du 'chi bar 'gyur te stong pa la ni dus dag shar bar gyur ba na'i //

analyzed: chu dang bla ma la ni 'dum par 'gyur te sa la spen pa shar la 'khrug par mi 'gyur ro //

analyzed: 'chi dang nyon mongs rmar 'gyur bde ba dag dang mnyam pa nyid ni 'dri byed nad pa rnams kyi 'o //

analyzed: g-yul du dag ni nges par rab tu nyams par 'gyur te sgra gcan stong pa dag la shar na yang //

analyzed: chu la pa sangs la ni don rnyed sa la mjug ring shar ba dag la dgra yang dbang du 'gyur //

analyzed: mig dang rig byed ro ste shin tu mnyam pa'i gnas su gyur na bya ba dag kyang 'grub par 'gyur //

analyzed: da ltar byung ba shes pa min par dge dang mi dge'i 'bras bu 'jig rten 'dir ni gang brjod pa //

analyzed: sdig zla skyes pa'i rgyu skar gal te rtsa gcig dag la gyur na mi rnams dag ni rnam par nyams //

analyzed: drug dang tshes dang brgyad dang ri zla bcu dang bcu dgu nyi shu gcig gi lo bzang rnams //

analyzed: de dang nang gi gnas skabs la yang de las sde pa brgyad po rnams kyi yi ge dag la ni //

analyzed: lug tu nyi ma nag pa la ni ming dang gzugs so glang 'khrig la son sa ga snon dag la //
translated: In the month of ≈örava·πáa, when the sun is in Virgo, there is name-and-form. In the month of Bhadrapada, when the sun is in Libra,

analyzed: mig sogs dang ni reg pa dag ste nyi ma karka tar gnas chu @46a *//

analyzed: zla la ni tsher bar 'gyur // seng+ger nyi ma gro bzhin la yang sred pa bu mo dang ni srang du son pa khrums dang ni //

analyzed: tha skar zla ba dag la len pa nyid dang srid par 'gyur te smin drug sdig par nyi ma la //

analyzed: skye ba dang ni gzhu la nyi ma gnas pa mgo dag la yang de bzhin rga shi rim pa ste //

analyzed: de ltar nyi zla'i dbye ba dag las gnyis ka bgrod pa'i dbang gis rgyal po yan lag bcu gnyis so //

analyzed: rgyal dang mchu yi mtshams su chu srin dag la nyi ma gnas pa'i gza' de la ni ma rig pa //

original: de nas gnyis pa la ni shi bar 'gyur te mi yi bdag po de bzhin skye ba gsum pa la'o //
analyzed: de nas gnyis pa la ni shi bar 'gyur te mi yi bdag po de bzhin skye ba gsum pa la'o //
translated: Then, in the second, there is death, O lord of men, and likewise in the third birth.

analyzed: de bzhin srid pa la sogs thams cad yan lag bcu gnyis par du rim pa dag gis yongs su 'gyur //
translated: Thus, all existences and so forth are transformed in stages up to the twelve limbs.

analyzed: de nas me dang chu gter mda' ste chu srin bgrod pa'i dbang gis res 'ga' yan lag drug pa'o //
translated: Then, by the power of the transit of Makara, sometimes there are six limbs.

analyzed: tshes zhes bya ba'i gza' yis phyogs te nyi ma rgyu ba'i dbang gis res 'ga' yan lag bcu drug gis //
translated: By the power of the transit of the sun, sometimes there are sixteen limbs.

original: 'du byed mchu yi mtshams dag tu ste bum par nyi ma son pa de la 'du byed kho na 'o //
analyzed: 'du byed mchu yi mtshams dag tu ste bum par nyi ma son pa de la 'du byed kho na 'o //
translated: At the juncture of the mouth of formations, when the sun enters the sign of Vrischika, there are only formations.

analyzed: de nas gnyis pa la ni rnam par shes par 'gyur te nyin zhag gsum pa la ni ming dang gzugs //
translated: Then, in the second, consciousness arises, and in the third day, name-and-form.

analyzed: de ltar zla ba gnyis la yan lag tu gyur nyi ma'i dbang gis spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor bas so //
translated: Thus, in two months, by the power of the sun, the limbs are formed by the process of expansion and contraction.

analyzed: de la ma rig la sogs yan lag mi mnyam pa yang bya ba kun la dge bar 'gyur ba ste //
translated: There, the unequal limbs, beginning with ignorance, are always virtuous in all actions.

analyzed: gang zhig @46b 'du byed la sogs mnyam pa dag kyang rtag tu dbang bgrod bag ma dag la dge ba min //
translated: Those that are equal, beginning with the formative forces, are always non-virtuous in the course of the ascendant and descendent nodes.
