translated: In the sixth month, the fetus is composed of flesh and blood, and experiences both pleasure and pain.üîΩThe eyebrows, hair, body hair, and orifices are formed in the seventh month, and the remaining channels are formed in the eighth month.

original: gnas dang rus pa rkang du 'gyur te ro 'dzin dang ni gci ba bshad ba brgyad pa dag la yang //
analyzed: gnas dang rus pa rkang du 'gyur te ro 'dzin dang ni gci ba bshad ba brgyad pa dag la yang //
translated: In the ninth month, the eyes, ears, and nose are formed, and the sense faculties are completed.

original: bug pa zhes la btsa' ba'i dus su skye gnas kyis ni btsir ba dag gis sdug bsngal drag po 'o //
analyzed: bug pa zhes la btsa' ba'i dus su skye gnas kyis ni btsir ba dag gis sdug bsngal drag po 'o //
translated: In the tenth month, the fetus is turned upside down and experiences intense pain from being squeezed by the womb at the time of birth.

original: mngal du mngal na gnas pa'i sdug bsngal btsa' ba'i dus dang byis pa'i dus dang byis pa'i dngos po la yang sdug bsngal te //
analyzed: mngal du mngal na gnas pa'i sdug bsngal btsa' ba'i dus dang byis pa'i dus dang byis pa'i dngos po la yang sdug bsngal te //
translated: The suffering of being in the womb, the suffering of being born, the suffering of childhood, and the suffering of youth

original: gzhon nu dang ni lang tsho dag la bud med nor dang 'byor nyams nyon mongs sdug bsngal chen po gang //
analyzed: gzhon nu dang ni lang tsho dag la bud med nor dang 'byor nyams nyon mongs sdug bsngal chen po gang //
translated: are the great sufferings of women, who are afflicted by the loss of wealth and power.

original: rgan po nyid la 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal slar yang 'gro ba @56b drug tu 'jigs ster du 'bod la sogs te //
analyzed: rgan po nyid la 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal slar yang 'gro ba @56b drug tu 'jigs ster du 'bod la sogs te //
translated: The old man, again, is terrified of death, and of the six realms of existence,

original: sgyu mas rmongs par byas pa'i mtha' dag 'gro ba 'di ni sdug bsngal dag las sdug bsngal 'dzin par byed //
analyzed: sgyu mas rmongs par byas pa'i mtha' dag 'gro ba 'di ni sdug bsngal dag las sdug bsngal 'dzin par byed //
translated: and this whole world, deluded by illusion, passes from sorrow to sorrow.

original: 'khor bar mi nyid du ni 'gyur ba dag kyang 'ga' zhig tu ste chos kyi blo ni res 'ga' na //
analyzed: 'khor bar mi nyid du ni 'gyur ba dag kyang 'ga' zhig tu ste chos kyi blo ni res 'ga' na //
translated: But now and then, in the course of transmigration, a man is born in India, and now and then he acquires the idea of Dharma.

original: de bas sangs rgyas la ni rjes chags dge ba'i dbang gis 'gyur zhing dang po'i theg par rab tu 'jug //
analyzed: de bas sangs rgyas la ni rjes chags dge ba'i dbang gis 'gyur zhing dang po'i theg par rab tu 'jug //
translated: Therefore, by the power of the root of virtue, love for the Buddha arises, and he enters the first vehicle.

original: de bas dpal ldan rdo rje theg pa sgom pa la ni blo gros ma lus brgya lam dag na 'jug /
analyzed: de bas dpal ldan rdo rje theg pa sgom pa la ni blo gros ma lus brgya lam dag na 'jug /
translated: Therefore, the mind enters the glorious Vajrayana only once in a hundred births.

original: de las sangs rgyas nyid 'dod mchog gi bde ba'i go 'phang dag la 'jug pa ae ma shin tu dka'//
analyzed: de las sangs rgyas nyid 'dod mchog gi bde ba'i go 'phang dag la 'jug pa ae ma shin tu dka'//
translated: From that, the attainment of Buddhahood, the state of supreme bliss, is difficult, oh so difficult!

original: mngal du yang dag dag pa'i sku ste btsa' ba'i dus na so ni skyes pa dag kyang chos kyi 'o //
analyzed: mngal du yang dag dag pa'i sku ste btsa' ba'i dus na so ni skyes pa dag kyang chos kyi 'o //
translated: The body of perfect purity is in the womb, and the teeth of Dharma are born at the time of birth.

original: so rnams rab tu ltung bar 'gyur ba mi yi bdag po rgyal ba yi ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku //
analyzed: so rnams rab tu ltung bar 'gyur ba mi yi bdag po rgyal ba yi ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku //
translated: The teeth fall out, and the king‚Äôs enjoyment body is destroyed.

original: de nas sprul pa'i sku ni rab tu gsal zhing nges par 'chi ba'i mtshams te mi rnams dag gi 'o //
analyzed: de nas sprul pa'i sku ni rab tu gsal zhing nges par 'chi ba'i mtshams te mi rnams dag gi 'o //
translated: Then the emanation body becomes clear, and the time of death is certain for humans.

original: mngal dang phyi rol dag tu slar yang 'di ni ye shes rnam shes dbye bas rnam pa bzhi ru 'gyur //
analyzed: mngal dang phyi rol dag tu slar yang 'di ni ye shes rnam shes dbye bas rnam pa bzhi ru 'gyur //
translated: Again, this is fourfold, by the division of wisdom and consciousness, in the womb and outside.

original: rnam shes zla ba'i nyi ma dag kyang padmar gnas pa de ni mngal du dag pa'i sku yin te //
analyzed: rnam shes zla ba'i nyi ma dag kyang padmar gnas pa de ni mngal du dag pa'i sku yin te //
translated: Consciousness, moon, sun, and lotus are the pure body in the womb.

original: khams dang phung po rab tu 'byung ba rnam pa bcu po gang yin rgyal ba yi ni chos kyi sku //
analyzed: khams dang phung po rab tu 'byung ba rnam pa bcu po gang yin rgyal ba yi ni chos kyi sku //
translated: The ten kinds of elements and aggregates that arise are the Dharma body of the Victor.

original: de nas yon tan dbang gis rna ba sgra sogs skyes pa dag ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ru 'gyur //
analyzed: de nas yon tan dbang gis rna ba sgra sogs skyes pa dag ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ru 'gyur //
translated: Then, by the power of qualities, the ears, sounds, and so on, arise, and that is the enjoyment body.

original: de nas sgra la sogs pa skyes te rab tu btsa' ba'i dus kyang 'dir ni sprul pa dag gi sku //
analyzed: de nas sgra la sogs pa skyes te rab tu btsa' ba'i dus kyang 'dir ni sprul pa dag gi sku //
translated: Then, sounds and so on arise, and the time of birth is the emanation body here.

original: skyes pa na ni nges @57a *//
analyzed: skyes pa na ni nges @57a *//
translated: When born, the body is the enjoyment body.

original: par dbugs dag gang zhig rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba de nyid dag pa'i sku //
analyzed: par dbugs dag gang zhig rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba de nyid dag pa'i sku //
translated: The pure body is the one who goes forth, the pure breath.üîΩThen, the teeth are the one who has gone forth, the words are not clear, but that is the very same dharmakƒÅya.

original: de nas so ni rab byung gang zhig tshig ni gsal min dag kyang de bzhin nyid du chos  kye sku; ;de nas gnyis skyes rnams ni lhung bar 'gyur ba mi yi bdag po rgyal ba'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku //
analyzed: de nas so ni rab byung gang zhig tshig ni gsal min dag kyang de bzhin nyid du chos  kye sku; ;de nas gnyis skyes rnams ni lhung bar 'gyur ba mi yi bdag po rgyal ba'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku //
translated: Then, the two-sexed ones fall, the lord of men is the enjoyment body of the Victor.

original: so rnams dag las 'chi ba'i mtshams ni phyi ru rgyal ba'i bdag po dag gi sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur //
analyzed: so rnams dag las 'chi ba'i mtshams ni phyi ru rgyal ba'i bdag po dag gi sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur //
translated: The boundary of death from the teeth is outside, the emanation body of the lords of the Victor.

original: mngal du 'dir ni dang po dpal ldan sku yi rdo rjer 'gyur te gsung gi rang bzhin skyes pa 'o //
analyzed: mngal du 'dir ni dang po dpal ldan sku yi rdo rjer 'gyur te gsung gi rang bzhin skyes pa 'o //
translated: Here, in the womb, first is the glorious body vajra, born of the nature of speech.

original: thugs ni so dag rab tu skyes pa nyid na'o slar yang lhung nas ye shes rdo rjer rab tu 'gyur //
analyzed: thugs ni so dag rab tu skyes pa nyid na'o slar yang lhung nas ye shes rdo rjer rab tu 'gyur //
translated: The mind is the production of the teeth themselves, falling again, it becomes the wisdom vajra.

original: ye shes rnam shes bsres shing nyi ma ri bong can dang bcas pa ye shes rdo rje la sogs kun //
analyzed: ye shes rnam shes bsres shing nyi ma ri bong can dang bcas pa ye shes rdo rje la sogs kun //
translated: The wisdom mixed with consciousness, together with the sun and moon, is all the wisdom vajras and so on.

original: mngal na gnas pa dag ni sku yi rdo rje la sogs rim pa yis kyang stobs dang ldan par 'gyur //
analyzed: mngal na gnas pa dag ni sku yi rdo rje la sogs rim pa yis kyang stobs dang ldan par 'gyur //
translated: The one in the womb becomes strong by the stages of the vajra body, etc.

original: sa yi snying po dag ni bsreg zar 'gyur te 'dzin ma dang ni rlung dag stong pa'i snying po 'o //
analyzed: sa yi snying po dag ni bsreg zar 'gyur te 'dzin ma dang ni rlung dag stong pa'i snying po 'o //
translated: The heart of the earth becomes the heart of the fire, and the heart of the wind becomes the heart of the space.

original: rlung dang sa yi snying po dag ni chu nyid du 'gyur rang bzhin med pa dang ni rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rlung dang sa yi snying po dag ni chu nyid du 'gyur rang bzhin med pa dang ni rang bzhin no //
translated: The heart of the wind and the heart of the earth become the water itself, the natureless and the nature.

original: sa yi rten ni chu gter 'bar byed dag kyang chu yi rlung ni dag par byed pa dag gi 'o //
analyzed: sa yi rten ni chu gter 'bar byed dag kyang chu yi rlung ni dag par byed pa dag gi 'o //
translated: The support of the earth is the ocean, the support of the fire is the water, and the support of the wind is the pure.

original: rlung gi stong par rab tu 'gyur te mi yi dbang po 'byung ba'i rten dang brten pa ji lta bzhin //
analyzed: rlung gi stong par rab tu 'gyur te mi yi dbang po 'byung ba'i rten dang brten pa ji lta bzhin //
translated: The space of the wind becomes the space of the man, just as the support and the supported of the elements.

original: phung po'i rten ni 'byung ba rnams su 'gyur te lus mchog dag la 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi rtsa rnams so //
analyzed: phung po'i rten ni 'byung ba rnams su 'gyur te lus mchog dag la 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi rtsa rnams so //
translated: The support of the aggregates becomes the elements, and the channels of the collection of elements in the best of bodies.

original: rtsa rnams kyi ni srog rlung rnam pa bcu par 'gyur @57b te srog gi rlung rnams dag gi sems yin no //
analyzed: rtsa rnams kyi ni srog rlung rnam pa bcu par 'gyur @57b te srog gi rlung rnams dag gi sems yin no //
translated: The life-wind of the channels becomes the ten types, and the life-winds are the mind.

original: sems de gnyis kyi rang bzhin du 'gyur yon tan dbang gis rang bzhin can dang rang bzhin med pa'o //
analyzed: sems de gnyis kyi rang bzhin du 'gyur yon tan dbang gis rang bzhin can dang rang bzhin med pa'o //
translated: The nature of these two minds is the nature of the qualities and the absence of nature.

original: de dag gi yang rten ni gtso bo srid pa gsum gyis btud cing gzhom med kun tu 'gro ba gang //
analyzed: de dag gi yang rten ni gtso bo srid pa gsum gyis btud cing gzhom med kun tu 'gro ba gang //
translated: Their support is the principal one, which is bowed to by the three existences and is the imperishable, all-pervading one.

original: dri ni 'dzin ma dag las 'byung ste ro yang rtse mo can las gzugs kyi khams ni chu las so //
analyzed: dri ni 'dzin ma dag las 'byung ste ro yang rtse mo can las gzugs kyi khams ni chu las so //
translated: Smell arises from the earth, taste from the water, and the form realm from the fire.

original: rlung las reg par 'gyur te zhi ba las kyang sgra dang chos kyi khams ni nam mkha' dag las so //
analyzed: rlung las reg par 'gyur te zhi ba las kyang sgra dang chos kyi khams ni nam mkha' dag las so //
translated: Touch arises from the wind, and sound and the dharma realm arise from space.

original: stong pa sgra ni 'dzin par byed de nges par rgyal ba skyed mdzad chos kyi khams dang rlung dag ni //
analyzed: stong pa sgra ni 'dzin par byed de nges par rgyal ba skyed mdzad chos kyi khams dang rlung dag ni //
translated: The empty sound is the apprehender, and the dharma realm and wind, which definitely produce the Victor,

original: dri dang me yang gzugs te chu dag kyang ni ro 'o de bzhin 'dzin ma dag ni reg bya 'o //
analyzed: dri dang me yang gzugs te chu dag kyang ni ro 'o de bzhin 'dzin ma dag ni reg bya 'o //
translated: are smell and fire, and the water is taste. Likewise, the earth is touch.

original: grub pa gzugs ni 'dzin ma la ste srid pa gsum gyi gnas su chu la yang ni 'du shes grub //
analyzed: grub pa gzugs ni 'dzin ma la ste srid pa gsum gyi gnas su chu la yang ni 'du shes grub //
translated: The form of accomplishment is in the earth, and in the water is the accomplishment of perception, the abode of the three existences.

original: me la nges pa nyid du tshor bar 'gyur te rlung la yang ni phung po 'du byed kho na 'o //
analyzed: me la nges pa nyid du tshor bar 'gyur te rlung la yang ni phung po 'du byed kho na 'o //
translated: Fire is definitely felt, and wind is only the formation of the aggregates.

original: rnam shes ye shes bsres pa nam mkha' dang bcas rdo rje dag la grub pa nyid de lus 'di la //
analyzed: rnam shes ye shes bsres pa nam mkha' dang bcas rdo rje dag la grub pa nyid de lus 'di la //
translated: Consciousness, mixed with wisdom, is established in the vajras together with space, in this body.

original: khams dang phung po la sogs thams cad 'gyur ba dag kyang rdul dang byang chub sems sogs sbyor bas so //
analyzed: khams dang phung po la sogs thams cad 'gyur ba dag kyang rdul dang byang chub sems sogs sbyor bas so //
translated: All the elements, aggregates, and so forth transform through the union of the bindu and bodhicitta.

original: rna ba rdo rje'i rang bzhin du 'gyur mi yi bdag po sems ni nam mkha' dag gi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rna ba rdo rje'i rang bzhin du 'gyur mi yi bdag po sems ni nam mkha' dag gi rang bzhin no //
translated: The ears become the nature of vajra, O Lord of Men, the mind is the nature of space.

original: sna ni sa yi rang bzhin dag ste de bzhin kho na lce ni me yi rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: sna ni sa yi rang bzhin dag ste de bzhin kho na lce ni me yi rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur //
translated: The nose is of the nature of earth, and likewise, the tongue becomes the nature of fire.

original: mig ni chu yi rang bzhin dag ste srid pa gsum gyi gnas su lus kyang rlung gi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: mig ni chu yi rang bzhin dag ste srid pa gsum gyi gnas su lus kyang rlung gi rang bzhin no //
translated: The eyes are of the nature of water, and in the three existences, the body is also of the nature of wind.

original: de ltar @58a *//
analyzed: de ltar @58a *//
translated: Thus,

original: rna ba la sogs thams cad yon tan dbang gis 'gyur te ye shes sbyor bas so //
analyzed: rna ba la sogs thams cad yon tan dbang gis 'gyur te ye shes sbyor bas so //
translated: all the ears and so forth transform through the power of the qualities, through the union with wisdom.

original: ser sna ye shes khams la 'gyur te lus mchog dag la nas mkha' la ni zhe sdang rdo rje 'o //
analyzed: ser sna ye shes khams la 'gyur te lus mchog dag la nas mkha' la ni zhe sdang rdo rje 'o //
translated: Avarice becomes the element of wisdom, and the supreme body is born from space, which is the vajra of anger.

original: rlung la phrag dog rdo rje me la chags pa'i rdo rje rab tu gsal mdzad de bzhin nyid du ni //
analyzed: rlung la phrag dog rdo rje me la chags pa'i rdo rje rab tu gsal mdzad de bzhin nyid du ni //
translated: Jealousy is the vajra of wind, passion is the vajra of fire, and the illuminator is the vajra of reality.

original: chu la dpal ldan nga rgyal rdo rje sa la gti mug rdo rje rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis so //
analyzed: chu la dpal ldan nga rgyal rdo rje sa la gti mug rdo rje rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis so //
translated: Pride is the vajra of water, and the vajra of delusion is the earth, by the power of the qualities.

original: ngag dang lag pa rkang pa bshad lam thams cad rlung me chu dang sa rnams dag las 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: ngag dang lag pa rkang pa bshad lam thams cad rlung me chu dang sa rnams dag las 'byung bar 'gyur //
translated: Speech, hands, feet, and the path of excretion arise from wind, fire, water, and earth, respectively.

original: thur sel ye shes khams la rnam gsum zhes par 'gyur te srog gi rlung yang stong pa dag la 'o //
analyzed: thur sel ye shes khams la rnam gsum zhes par 'gyur te srog gi rlung yang stong pa dag la 'o //
translated: The downward-voiding [wind] becomes the element of wisdom, and the life-force wind is in the empty [channels].

original: rlung gi dbus su mnyam gnas rtse mo can la slar yang gyen rgyu chu la khyab par byed pa nyid //
analyzed: rlung gi dbus su mnyam gnas rtse mo can la slar yang gyen rgyu chu la khyab par byed pa nyid //
translated: The pervasive [wind] is in the center of the wind, the upward-moving [wind] is in the peak [channel], and the fire-coinciding [wind] is in the water [channel].

original: sa la klu ste de nas rus sbal rtsangs pa dang ni lha sbyin nor las rgyal ba dag gi rlung //
analyzed: sa la klu ste de nas rus sbal rtsangs pa dang ni lha sbyin nor las rgyal ba dag gi rlung //
translated: The serpent [wind] is in the earth [channel], and then the tortoise, lizard, Devadatta, and Jyotiska [winds] are in the [channels of the] wind [mandala-petals].

original: bzhi po rlung dang me dag dang ni chu dang sa rnams dag la rim pa yis ni yang dag 'gyur //
analyzed: bzhi po rlung dang me dag dang ni chu dang sa rnams dag la rim pa yis ni yang dag 'gyur //
translated: The four are in the elements of wind, fire, water, and earth, respectively.

original: gtsug tor stong pa'i khams la 'gyur te lha dang mi rnams kyi ni ye shes khams la gsang ba 'o //
analyzed: gtsug tor stong pa'i khams la 'gyur te lha dang mi rnams kyi ni ye shes khams la gsang ba 'o //
translated: The u·π£·πáƒ´·π£a is in the element of space, the gnosis of gods and humans is in the element of gnosis,

original: snying gi padma rlung gi khams la rab gsal rtse mo can la mgrin pa'i 'khor lo gsal bar ro //
analyzed: snying gi padma rlung gi khams la rab gsal rtse mo can la mgrin pa'i 'khor lo gsal bar ro //
translated: the heart lotus is in the element of wind, and the crest is in the throat cakra.

original: chu la smin ma'i nang gi padma nor ni nor gyi 'dab ldan lte ba'i padma sa la 'o //
analyzed: chu la smin ma'i nang gi padma nor ni nor gyi 'dab ldan lte ba'i padma sa la 'o //
translated: The forehead lotus is in the element of water, the padma of wealth is in the element of wealth, and the navel lotus is in the element of earth.

original: rkang pa lag pa dag gi tshigs drug sa dang chu dang bsrog za rlung rnams dag la gsum gyi grangs /
analyzed: rkang pa lag pa dag gi tshigs drug sa dang chu dang bsrog za rlung rnams dag la gsum gyi grangs /
translated: The six joints of the hands and feet are in the elements of earth, water, fire, and wind, respectively.

original: sa sogs khams lnga dag la rnam @58b gsum yon tan dbang gis 'byung ba rkang pa lag pa dag gi ni //
analyzed: sa sogs khams lnga dag la rnam @58b gsum yon tan dbang gis 'byung ba rkang pa lag pa dag gi ni //
translated: The five elements, earth, and so on, are in the three qualities in the hands and feet.

original: mthe bong la sogs sor mo bcu ni gsum gyis bsgyur ba'i tshigs kyi gzugs dang ldan pa mtha' dag ste //
analyzed: mthe bong la sogs sor mo bcu ni gsum gyis bsgyur ba'i tshigs kyi gzugs dang ldan pa mtha' dag ste //
translated: The ten fingers and toes, multiplied by three, are the complete form of the joints.

original: de dag sen mo'i mthar thugs yang dag gzung bar slar yang so rnams de nyid rab tu dbye bas so //
analyzed: de dag sen mo'i mthar thugs yang dag gzung bar slar yang so rnams de nyid rab tu dbye bas so //
translated: The teeth are again divided into those that are held to be at the tips of the nails.

original: gzhan gang spu yi mthar ni lus mchog la 'gyur de dang de ni de bzhin du yang khams la 'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang spu yi mthar ni lus mchog la 'gyur de dang de ni de bzhin du yang khams la 'o //
translated: Whatever is at the tips of the hairs is the supreme body, and that is in the same way in the elements.

original: gsang pa gtsug tor lte ba la yang lhan cig skyes pa rgyal ba'i sku ste rang bzhin med rang bzhin //
analyzed: gsang pa gtsug tor lte ba la yang lhan cig skyes pa rgyal ba'i sku ste rang bzhin med rang bzhin //
translated: The innate body of the Victor, which is without intrinsic nature, is in the secret place, the crown, and the navel.

original: snying kha'i chu skyes la ni chos skur 'gyur te mgrin pa'i chu skyes la yang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku //
analyzed: snying kha'i chu skyes la ni chos skur 'gyur te mgrin pa'i chu skyes la yang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku //
translated: The dharmakƒÅya is in the heart lotus, and the sa·πÉbhogakƒÅya is in the lotus of the throat.

original: thig le la yang sprul pa'i sku ni yon tan dbang gis lhag pa'i lha ru rim pa dag gis 'gyur //
analyzed: thig le la yang sprul pa'i sku ni yon tan dbang gis lhag pa'i lha ru rim pa dag gis 'gyur //
translated: The nirmƒÅ·πáakƒÅya is in the bindu, and the supreme deity is in stages by the power of qualities.

original: snying kha'i 'khor lo mgrin pa'i 'khor lo spyi bo'i padma chos dang longs spyod rdzogs dang dag pa'o //
analyzed: snying kha'i 'khor lo mgrin pa'i 'khor lo spyi bo'i padma chos dang longs spyod rdzogs dang dag pa'o //
translated: The cakra of the heart, the cakra of the throat, and the lotus of the crown are the pure dharmakƒÅya, sa·πÉbhogakƒÅya, and nirmƒÅ·πáakƒÅya.

original: lte ba mgrin pa dag dang gsang ba'i spyi bo dang ni snying kha de bzhin gtsug tor dbus su ni //
analyzed: lte ba mgrin pa dag dang gsang ba'i spyi bo dang ni snying kha de bzhin gtsug tor dbus su ni //
translated: The navel, throat, and secret place, the crown, and the heart, and likewise, the center of the u·π£·πáƒ´·π£a,

original: yum dang gtso bo'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje rnam pa gsum po dag kyang rim pas 'gyur //
analyzed: yum dang gtso bo'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje rnam pa gsum po dag kyang rim pas 'gyur //
translated: The three vajras of body, speech, and mind of the mother and the principal figure also transform in sequence.

original: 'khor lo rin chen mkha' yi padma chu skyes ral gri mchog dang rdo rje dang ldan rigs drug go //
analyzed: 'khor lo rin chen mkha' yi padma chu skyes ral gri mchog dang rdo rje dang ldan rigs drug go //
translated: The six families are endowed with the precious wheel, the lotus of space, the supreme sword, and the vajra.

original: de dag steng 'og rtsa gsum rnam gsum lam la gnas pa rnams te nyi zla ma yi dbye bas so //
analyzed: de dag steng 'og rtsa gsum rnam gsum lam la gnas pa rnams te nyi zla ma yi dbye bas so //
translated: They are located in the three upper and lower channels, in the three paths, by the division of the sun, moon, and so on.

original: lus la bsam ba rab tu gzhugs pa nam mkha' bzhin du ro mnyam bsam pa'i dbus su lus dag kyang //üîΩrnal 'byor ldan pas shes bya rang bzhin yon tan dbang @59a *//
analyzed: lus la bsam ba rab tu gzhugs pa nam mkha' bzhin du ro mnyam bsam pa'i dbus su lus dag kyang // rnal 'byor ldan pas shes bya rang bzhin yon tan dbang @59a *//
translated: The body is in the center of the space of the mind, which is evenly distributed throughout the body like the sky.

original: gis khams kyi kha dog la sogs dbye ba ste //
analyzed: gis khams kyi kha dog la sogs dbye ba ste //
translated: The yogin should know the divisions of the colors of the elements and so on by the power of the qualities of the nature.

original: ser po nag po dag dang kha dog dmar po zhes dang dkar po sa rlung me dang chu la 'o //
analyzed: ser po nag po dag dang kha dog dmar po zhes dang dkar po sa rlung me dang chu la 'o //
translated: Yellow, black, red, and white are the colors of the earth, air, fire, and water elements, respectively.

original: ye shes nam mkha' la yang sngon po ljang khur 'gyur te lus dang bsam pa'i rab tu dbye bas so //
analyzed: ye shes nam mkha' la yang sngon po ljang khur 'gyur te lus dang bsam pa'i rab tu dbye bas so //
translated: Blue and green are the colors of space and wisdom, respectively.

original: shes rab thabs ni rus pa sha dang chu dang bcas pa'i khrag dang me dag dang ni gci ba nyid //
analyzed: shes rab thabs ni rus pa sha dang chu dang bcas pa'i khrag dang me dag dang ni gci ba nyid //
translated: Wisdom, means, bone, flesh, water, blood, fire, and feces.

original: rlung dang bshad ba stong pa khu ba mchog gi lus la dpal ldan rdul dang sems nyid dag tu 'gyur //
analyzed: rlung dang bshad ba stong pa khu ba mchog gi lus la dpal ldan rdul dang sems nyid dag tu 'gyur //
translated: Wind, speech, void, semen, and mind are the glorious particles in the body.

original: rna ba sgra tshogs gzhan rnams rang gi rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dbang gis ngag gi rang bzhin la sogs kyang //
analyzed: rna ba sgra tshogs gzhan rnams rang gi rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dbang gis ngag gi rang bzhin la sogs kyang //
translated: The ear and sound, and the others, are the nature of speech and so on, by the power of one‚Äôs buddha family.

original: de ltar lha mo sangs rgyas dang bcas yul dang yul can rnams kyi dkyil 'khor dag la rig par bya //
analyzed: de ltar lha mo sangs rgyas dang bcas yul dang yul can rnams kyi dkyil 'khor dag la rig par bya //
translated: Thus, one should know the ma·πá·∏çala of the goddesses and the objects and subjects, along with the buddhas.

original: rtsa rnams stong phrag drug ni nyin mor byed bas bsgyur ba mngal gyi dbus dag tu yang 'phel ba ni //
analyzed: rtsa rnams stong phrag drug ni nyin mor byed bas bsgyur ba mngal gyi dbus dag tu yang 'phel ba ni //
translated: The six thousand channels, multiplied by the sun, increase in the middle of the womb.

original: byas nas lo ni rdzogs pan yang gtong ste ri bong 'dzin pa nyi ma dag kyang 'phel bar byed //
analyzed: byas nas lo ni rdzogs pan yang gtong ste ri bong 'dzin pa nyi ma dag kyang 'phel bar byed //
translated: Having done that, they are released in a complete year, and the moon increases.

original: lo ni bcu gnyis dag ni nyin byed khams ni 'phel ba gtong ste rang gi lus po dag la 'o //
analyzed: lo ni bcu gnyis dag ni nyin byed khams ni 'phel ba gtong ste rang gi lus po dag la 'o //
translated: In twelve years, the sun increases the elements and enters one‚Äôs body.

original: rtsa ni 'chad pa rab tu skyes nas nyin zhag nyin zhag dag la rim pas zung gi grangs su 'gyur //
analyzed: rtsa ni 'chad pa rab tu skyes nas nyin zhag nyin zhag dag la rim pas zung gi grangs su 'gyur //
translated: The channels are explained to arise in the first year of life, and then increase by one each day, until they number thirty-two.üîΩThe glorious elements and the pure senses are ten, and the five action faculties,

original: dpal ldan 'byung ba dang ni dbang po rnam dag bcu ru rab 'gyur las kyi dbang po lnga rnams dang // de tsam lnga ru brjod pa rnams dang yon tan bcas pa dag kyang yid dang blo dang ngar 'dzin mchog /
analyzed: dpal ldan 'byung ba dang ni dbang po rnam dag bcu ru rab 'gyur las kyi dbang po lnga rnams dang // de tsam lnga ru brjod pa rnams dang yon tan bcas pa dag kyang yid dang blo dang ngar 'dzin mchog /
translated: and the five sense objects, and the mind, intellect, and great egoity, are said to be the twenty-four tattvas.

original: 'di dag de nyid rnams te lus dang srid pa @59b gsum gyi gnas su 'di ni longs spyod gtso bo dag /
analyzed: 'di dag de nyid rnams te lus dang srid pa @59b gsum gyi gnas su 'di ni longs spyod gtso bo dag /
translated: These are the lords of the body and the three worlds, and they are the chief enjoyers.

original: phung po lnga yi bdag nyid rnam gsum srid pa la gnas bdag gi las ni bsags pa dag gi 'o //
analyzed: phung po lnga yi bdag nyid rnam gsum srid pa la gnas bdag gi las ni bsags pa dag gi 'o //
translated: The three abodes of the five aggregates, abiding in the three worlds, are the accumulation of one‚Äôs karma.

original: sa ni sra ba chu ni gsher ba me yang tsha ba rlung ni yang ba nyid de bug pa ni //
analyzed: sa ni sra ba chu ni gsher ba me yang tsha ba rlung ni yang ba nyid de bug pa ni //
translated: Earth is solidity, water is fluidity, fire is heat, and wind is lightness and motility.

original: stong pa dag ste brtan pa'i rus pa 'chi med ri bo mchog dang char pa 'dir ni bdud rtsir 'gyur //
analyzed: stong pa dag ste brtan pa'i rus pa 'chi med ri bo mchog dang char pa 'dir ni bdud rtsir 'gyur //
translated: Space is emptiness, and the bones are the supreme mountain of immortality. Here, rain becomes nectar.

original: rdo rje sgra dang gzhu yang bshang ba dag ste chu tshong rnams ni dbugs dang dbugs 'byung zung dag ngo //
analyzed: rdo rje sgra dang gzhu yang bshang ba dag ste chu tshong rnams ni dbugs dang dbugs 'byung zung dag ngo //
translated: The vajra, sound, and bow are feces, and the hours are the in-breath and out-breath.

original: zung rnams dgu brgya nyis 'gyur dag gi 'pho ba gcig ste skar rtsis pa rnams bug pa'i dbye ba 'o //
analyzed: zung rnams dgu brgya nyis 'gyur dag gi 'pho ba gcig ste skar rtsis pa rnams bug pa'i dbye ba 'o //
translated: The pairs are the nine hundred and ninety-two movements, which are the divisions of the holes.

original: rgyu skar dag ni so yi phreng ba rjes su nyin zhag chu tshod rnams ni tshigs kyi dbye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: rgyu skar dag ni so yi phreng ba rjes su nyin zhag chu tshod rnams ni tshigs kyi dbye bar 'gyur //
translated: The lunar mansions are the row of teeth, and the days and hours are the divisions of the joints.

original: rtsa rnams chu bo rgyu ma sprin te ri bong can gyi cha gzhan khams rnams gnyis kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rtsa rnams chu bo rgyu ma sprin te ri bong can gyi cha gzhan khams rnams gnyis kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: The channels are the rivers, the intestines are the clouds, and the other parts of the moon are the two natures of the elements.

original: spu dang shig dang khu ba srin po'i rigs dang bcas pa rnams ni 'byung po skye gnas rnam pa bzhi //
analyzed: spu dang shig dang khu ba srin po'i rigs dang bcas pa rnams ni 'byung po skye gnas rnam pa bzhi //
translated: The hair, the lice, and the semen with the demons are the four types of birth of the spirits.

original: dga' ba la sogs mthe pong tshigs rnams spyi bo'i padma lte ba'i padma dag kyang nus pa 'o //
analyzed: dga' ba la sogs mthe pong tshigs rnams spyi bo'i padma lte ba'i padma dag kyang nus pa 'o //
translated: The joints of the toes are the joys and so on, and the lotus of the head and the navel are the powers.

original: tshangs pa'i yul sa mtho ris 'jig rten lag mchog rkang pa dag ni mi yul sa 'og 'jig rten no //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i yul sa mtho ris 'jig rten lag mchog rkang pa dag ni mi yul sa 'og 'jig rten no //
translated: The heaven of Brahma is the upper world, and the hands and feet are the human world and the underworld.

original: chu gter gling dang ri bo rnams ni gsher dang 'jam pa sra ba gsum gyi rang bzhin khams rnams so //
analyzed: chu gter gling dang ri bo rnams ni gsher dang 'jam pa sra ba gsum gyi rang bzhin khams rnams so //
translated: The oceans, islands, and mountains are the three natures of the elements, wet, smooth, and hard.

original: lan tshva'i chu gter gci pa 'di dag rnams kyi me rlung dkyil 'khor rgyal po khrag dang pags pa 'o //
analyzed: lan tshva'i chu gter gci pa 'di dag rnams kyi me rlung dkyil 'khor rgyal po khrag dang pags pa 'o //
translated: The ocean of salt water is urine, and the fire and wind ma·πá·∏çalas are blood and skin.

original: skra rnams grub pa mtha' dag srid pa gsum gyi gnas su du ma'i dbye ba dag gis grub pa 'o //
analyzed: skra rnams grub pa mtha' dag srid pa gsum gyi gnas su du ma'i dbye ba dag gis grub pa 'o //
translated: The hair is the accomplishment of all, in the three existences, by means of many divisions.

original: snying mgrin lte @60a *//üîΩba'i padma dag la rdo rje nyi ma rtse mo can rnams rab 'phro rim pa yis //
analyzed: snying mgrin lte @60a *// ba'i padma dag la rdo rje nyi ma rtse mo can rnams rab 'phro rim pa yis //
translated: In the lotuses of the heart, throat, and navel,üîΩthe vajra, sun, and peak flames spread in stages.

original: gzhu yi rnam pa zlum po dang ni nyin bzhin sreg byed chu gter zur gyi thab khung dag la yang //
analyzed: gzhu yi rnam pa zlum po dang ni nyin bzhin sreg byed chu gter zur gyi thab khung dag la yang //
translated: In the shape of a bow, round, and like the sun, in the hearth of the corner of the ocean,

original: de dag gong na me gzhan dri med 'od zer 'phro ba ye shes gzugs ni mun pa dag gi mthar //
analyzed: de dag gong na me gzhan dri med 'od zer 'phro ba ye shes gzugs ni mun pa dag gi mthar //
translated: above them is another fire, radiating stainless light, the form of intuition, at the end of the darkness.

original: gang zhig nyi ma glog gis mi gdung ri bong 'dzin pa gza' dang skar ma a sogs med pa na'o; ;gza' ni snyid kha'i padma la ste rab tu gsal byas chu tshod drug cu lte ba'i padma la //
analyzed: gang zhig nyi ma glog gis mi gdung ri bong 'dzin pa gza' dang skar ma a sogs med pa na'o; ;gza' ni snyid kha'i padma la ste rab tu gsal byas chu tshod drug cu lte ba'i padma la //
translated: When the sun is not tormented by the planets, the moon, the stars, and so on, the planets are in the lotus of the navel, and the stars are in the lotus of the heart.

original: smin ma'i dbus su nyin zhag rkang pa ma nu slar yang mi bdag longs spyod 'khor lor skar ma 'o; ;slar yang lte ba'i padmar rgyu skar rnams kyi chu tshod rnal 'byor ldan pa dag gis rig par bya //
analyzed: smin ma'i dbus su nyin zhag rkang pa ma nu slar yang mi bdag longs spyod 'khor lor skar ma 'o; ;slar yang lte ba'i padmar rgyu skar rnams kyi chu tshod rnal 'byor ldan pa dag gis rig par bya //
translated: The stars are in the lotus of the navel.

original: chu tshod chu srang gsal bar mtha' dag lus la lag pa rkang pa la sogs dag gi tshigs la 'o //
analyzed: chu tshod chu srang gsal bar mtha' dag lus la lag pa rkang pa la sogs dag gi tshigs la 'o //
translated: The hours and half-hours are in the joints of the hands, feet, and so on, in the entire body.

original: lte ba'i chu skyes nyi ma'i 'dab ma dag la 'khod de mchog gi cha ni 'pho ba rim pas so //
analyzed: lte ba'i chu skyes nyi ma'i 'dab ma dag la 'khod de mchog gi cha ni 'pho ba rim pas so //
translated: The petals of the navel lotus are the petals of the sun. The supreme part is the movement of the breath.

original: srog zung dgu brgya nyis 'gyur dag gis 'phro bar 'gyur te dus spyor karka ta nas mi yi dbang //
analyzed: srog zung dgu brgya nyis 'gyur dag gis 'phro bar 'gyur te dus spyor karka ta nas mi yi dbang //
translated: The life breath moves through 1,800 pairs, O King, from Cancer.

original: dus sbyor gang la nyi ma gnas pas nyin dang mtshan mor 'khor ba de la de ni rig par bya //
analyzed: dus sbyor gang la nyi ma gnas pas nyin dang mtshan mor 'khor ba de la de ni rig par bya //
translated: The day and night are to be known by the sun's position in the lunar mansion in which it is.

original: dus sbyor tshad dang nor dang bu lon mnyam pa dag kyang bgrod pa g-yas dang g-yon la shes par bya //
analyzed: dus sbyor tshad dang nor dang bu lon mnyam pa dag kyang bgrod pa g-yas dang g-yon la shes par bya //
translated: The equinoctial and solstitial points, the balance of wealth and debt, are to be known by the right and left passage.

original: re re'i padma'i 'dab ma dag la rab tu 'bab ste nub tu 'dzin ma dang ni byang du chu //
analyzed: re re'i padma'i 'dab ma dag la rab tu 'bab ste nub tu 'dzin ma dang ni byang du chu //
translated: The sun moves on the petals of each [lunar mansion], holding the west in the west and the north in the north.

original: lho ru me dang shar du rlung ni rab tu 'bab ste 'dab ma'i dbus dag tu yang @60b stong pa'o //
analyzed: lho ru me dang shar du rlung ni rab tu 'bab ste 'dab ma'i dbus dag tu yang @60b stong pa'o //
translated: The sun moves in the south in the south and in the east in the east, and in the middle of the petals it is empty.

original: dbye ba lnga yis 'pho bar 'gyur te mnyam pa rab tu 'bab pa dman pa'i dbugs ni drug cu 'o //
analyzed: dbye ba lnga yis 'pho bar 'gyur te mnyam pa rab tu 'bab pa dman pa'i dbugs ni drug cu 'o //
translated: The movement is fivefold, and the equal movement is sixty breaths of the inferior.

original: de ltar 'pho ba'i dbye ba rnams ni nyin zhag so so'i dus su dus spyor dbye pa dag gis 'gyur //
analyzed: de ltar 'pho ba'i dbye ba rnams ni nyin zhag so so'i dus su dus spyor dbye pa dag gis 'gyur //
translated: Thus, the divisions of the movement are by the conjunctions of the day and night, the divisions of the time.

original: stong pa la sogs de nyid lnga ni nges par byang du rab 'bab sa la sogs pa g-yas su 'o //
analyzed: stong pa la sogs de nyid lnga ni nges par byang du rab 'bab sa la sogs pa g-yas su 'o //
translated: The five realities, such as the empty, definitely move to the north, and the earth, etc., to the right.

original: sgra gcan dus me zla ba nyi ma dag dang gza' lag sa skyes lha min blon po bla ma dang / mjug ring spen pa 'di bcu dag ni nam mkha' la sogs dkyil 'khor rnams la bdag po zhing can no //
analyzed: sgra gcan dus me zla ba nyi ma dag dang gza' lag sa skyes lha min blon po bla ma dang / mjug ring spen pa 'di bcu dag ni nam mkha' la sogs dkyil 'khor rnams la bdag po zhing can no //
translated: RƒÅhu, KƒÅlƒÅgni, Candra, S≈´rya, Budha, B·πõhaspati, ≈öukra, ≈öani, and Ketu are the lords of the ma·πá·∏çalas of the sky, etc.

original: zla ba drug la zla ba dbang phyug tu 'gyur byang dag tu ste mi bdag lho ru nyi ma'o //
analyzed: zla ba drug la zla ba dbang phyug tu 'gyur byang dag tu ste mi bdag lho ru nyi ma'o //
translated: In the north, Candra is the lord of the six months, and S≈´rya is the lord in the south.

original: de steng snying kha'i phyogs su padma nor gyi 'dab ma dag la rtsa yi 'khor lo yang dag gnas //
analyzed: de steng snying kha'i phyogs su padma nor gyi 'dab ma dag la rtsa yi 'khor lo yang dag gnas //
translated: Above them, in the region of the heart, is the cakra of the nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s, situated on the petals of the lotus of wealth.

original: srog la sogs pa rlung gi tshogs te zla ba nyi ma me rnams g-yon dang g-yas dang dbus su 'o //
analyzed: srog la sogs pa rlung gi tshogs te zla ba nyi ma me rnams g-yon dang g-yas dang dbus su 'o //
translated: The groups of prƒÅ·πáa and so on, the moon, sun, and fire, are on the left, right, and in the middle.

original: g-yon du rtsa ni ri bong mtshan ma 'bab ste nges par dkar po g-yas su dmar po nyi ma 'o //
analyzed: g-yon du rtsa ni ri bong mtshan ma 'bab ste nges par dkar po g-yas su dmar po nyi ma 'o //
translated: On the left, the nƒÅ·∏çƒ´ of the moon flows, certainly white; on the right, the red one of the sun.

original: dbus su dus me'i gzugs ni rab tu 'bab ste mnyam pa dag la dman pa'i dbugs ni drug cu 'o //
analyzed: dbus su dus me'i gzugs ni rab tu 'bab ste mnyam pa dag la dman pa'i dbugs ni drug cu 'o //
translated: In the middle, the form of KƒÅlƒÅgni flows, and in the equal [breaths], the inferior ones are sixty.

original: srog dang thur sel mnyam gnas padma nor gyi 'dab ma dag la rlung ni gyen du rgyu ba dang // khyab byed klu dang rus spal dag dang rtsangs pa'i rlung dang lha sbyin dang ni nor las rgyal zhes pa //
analyzed: srog dang thur sel mnyam gnas padma nor gyi 'dab ma dag la rlung ni gyen du rgyu ba dang // khyab byed klu dang rus spal dag dang rtsangs pa'i rlung dang lha sbyin dang ni nor las rgyal zhes pa //
translated: and the pervading, the naga, the tortoise, the lizard, the wind of the god, and the victorious over wealth,

original: rlung ni rnam pa bcu po 'di rnams lte ba'i 'khor lo la ni las kyi dbye bas yang dag gnas //
analyzed: rlung ni rnam pa bcu po 'di rnams lte ba'i 'khor lo la ni las kyi dbye bas yang dag gnas //
translated: these ten winds are in the navel chakra, abiding by their function.

original: dung can mtha' yang ai ta la sogs rang gi snying kha'i padma rtsa yi 'khor lo mtha' dag go /
analyzed: dung can mtha' yang ai ta la sogs rang gi snying kha'i padma rtsa yi 'khor lo mtha' dag go /
translated: The end of the conch shell is the end of the lotus of the heart, the entire chakra of the channels.

original: srog @61a *// ni nyi ma zla ba'i lam la gnas pa dag kyang srog byed bza' dang btung ba ma lus pa //
analyzed: srog @61a *// ni nyi ma zla ba'i lam la gnas pa dag kyang srog byed bza' dang btung ba ma lus pa //
translated: The life [wind] and the downward-voiding [wind] abide in the path of the sun and moon, and they cause the life [wind] to consume all food and drink.

original: de dag thur sel gyis ni 'og tu 'dren te mtha' dag ro mnyam lus la mnyam gnas dag gis 'thob //
analyzed: de dag thur sel gyis ni 'og tu 'dren te mtha' dag ro mnyam lus la mnyam gnas dag gis 'thob //
translated: The downward-voiding [wind] draws them downward, and the upward-moving [wind] causes the body to be filled with them.

original: lus la gyen rgyus g-yo bar byed de kha dang lag pa rkang pa rnams kyis glu dang zlos gar byed //
analyzed: lus la gyen rgyus g-yo bar byed de kha dang lag pa rkang pa rnams kyis glu dang zlos gar byed //
translated: The upward-moving [wind] causes movement in the body, and through the mouth, hands, and feet, one sings and dances.

original: khyab byed kyis ni nang dag byed de rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis lus ni 'jig pa de lta nyid //
analyzed: khyab byed kyis ni nang dag byed de rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis lus ni 'jig pa de lta nyid //
translated: The pervading wind purifies the internal; by the power of the nature qualities, the body is just so destroyed.

original: klu yang sgregs pa nyid de gsal bar lag pa rkang pa bskum pa dag ni rus sbal rlung gis so //
analyzed: klu yang sgregs pa nyid de gsal bar lag pa rkang pa bskum pa dag ni rus sbal rlung gis so //
translated: The wind of the snake is belching; the clear contraction of the hands and feet is the tortoise wind.

original: khro dang g-yeng ba mtha' dag de ni rtsangs pa'i rlung dag gis te glal ba dag kyang lha sbyin gyis //
analyzed: khro dang g-yeng ba mtha' dag de ni rtsangs pa'i rlung dag gis te glal ba dag kyang lha sbyin gyis //
translated: Anger and all distraction are the lizard winds; yawning is the Devadatta wind.

original: lus ni lnga pa nyid gyur gtong bar mi byed mi yi bdag po rlung gcig nor las rgyal ba'o //
analyzed: lus ni lnga pa nyid gyur gtong bar mi byed mi yi bdag po rlung gcig nor las rgyal ba'o //
translated: The body becomes the fifth, not giving up; the one wind of the lord of men is the conqueror of wealth.

original: de ltar srog la sogs pa'i rlung rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis gnas yon tan dag ni gtong mi byed //
analyzed: de ltar srog la sogs pa'i rlung rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis gnas yon tan dag ni gtong mi byed //
translated: Thus all the life-force winds and so on do not give up their natural locations and qualities.

original: dmar ser phra mo dag kyang ai da la sogs rnam gsum lam bgrod snar ma dang ni lag ldan rtse //
analyzed: dmar ser phra mo dag kyang ai da la sogs rnam gsum lam bgrod snar ma dang ni lag ldan rtse //
translated: The subtle reddish ones are the three paths of Ida and so on, the peak of the nose and the arm.

original: drug / pa rgyal dang ri yang rgyal ba nor dang dgu pa aa lam bu sha dpal ldan ku h'a 'o //
analyzed: drug / pa rgyal dang ri yang rgyal ba nor dang dgu pa aa lam bu sha dpal ldan ku h'a 'o //
translated: The six are the victor of wealth, the mountain victor, the wealth, the ninth, the Alambu≈õa, and the glorious Kuha.

original: phyogs kyi grangs na dung can ma gang mi yi bdag po byang chub sa bon bde ba'i mthar zag byed //
analyzed: phyogs kyi grangs na dung can ma gang mi yi bdag po byang chub sa bon bde ba'i mthar zag byed //
translated: The one with the conch-like curls, in the number of the directions, is the lord of men, who makes the seed of enlightenment, bliss, flow to the end.

original: dpal ldan rtsa ba'i 'khor lo 'di ni rnam pa mang por 'gyur te tshigs kyi dbye ba du mas so //
analyzed: dpal ldan rtsa ba'i 'khor lo 'di ni rnam pa mang por 'gyur te tshigs kyi dbye ba du mas so //
translated: This glorious root chakra becomes manifold, with many divisions of the spokes.

original: dbang po me dang gshin rje lha min chur bcas rlung dang gnod sbyin dang ni drag po dag gi dbus //
analyzed: dbang po me dang gshin rje lha min chur bcas rlung dang gnod sbyin dang ni drag po dag gi dbus //
translated: In the middle of the fire of the senses, Yama, the demigods with water, wind, the yakshas, and Rudra,

original: @61b gnas ni 'di dag rnams su de yi rang bzhin bsten zhing nus pa nyin dang mtshan mor 'khor bar byed //
analyzed: @61b gnas ni 'di dag rnams su de yi rang bzhin bsten zhing nus pa nyin dang mtshan mor 'khor bar byed //
translated: in these places, its nature is served, and its power moves in the day and night.

original: de yi steng gi mgrin pa'i phyogs su gza' yi tshogs dang bcas pa'i rgyu skar 'khor lo yang dag gnas //
analyzed: de yi steng gi mgrin pa'i phyogs su gza' yi tshogs dang bcas pa'i rgyu skar 'khor lo yang dag gnas //
translated: Above that, in the throat area, the wheel of the lunar mansions, along with the group of planets, is perfectly situated.

original: tshangs pa'i yul sa dpal ldan dpral ba dag gnas dbyangs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i thig le dkar po zag /
analyzed: tshangs pa'i yul sa dpal ldan dpral ba dag gnas dbyangs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i thig le dkar po zag /
translated: The glorious forehead, in the realm of Brahma, is occupied by the white drop, surrounded by the vowels.

original: rtsa bar sa ste g-yon du chu dang g-yas su bsreg pa dag ni rab tu 'bab ste steng du rlung //
analyzed: rtsa bar sa ste g-yon du chu dang g-yas su bsreg pa dag ni rab tu 'bab ste steng du rlung //
translated: At the base, earth; on the left, water; and on the right, fire flow strongly, and above, wind.

original: gnyis kyi dbus su nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa rab tu 'bab ste sna bug dag las rim pas so //
analyzed: gnyis kyi dbus su nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa rab tu 'bab ste sna bug dag las rim pas so //
translated: In the middle of the two, it falls evenly, like space, from the nostrils, in sequence.

original: 'di dag rnams ni dbugs te nus pa mchog gi gnas dang bcu gnyis mtha' dang cha yi mtha' ru 'gro //
analyzed: 'di dag rnams ni dbugs te nus pa mchog gi gnas dang bcu gnyis mtha' dang cha yi mtha' ru 'gro //
translated: These are the breaths, which go to the supreme power, the twelfth end, and the end of the parts.

original: zhing la sogs pa lag pa rkang pa lag pad sbyar ba dag la mthe bo'i mtha' thug mtha' dag go /
analyzed: zhing la sogs pa lag pa rkang pa lag pad sbyar ba dag la mthe bo'i mtha' thug mtha' dag go /
translated: In the field, etc., the hands, feet, and palms are joined, and the toes are at the end.

original: 'khor lo can ni rang gi lus la rdo rje can te lha mchog bdag rnams yan lag bcu gnyis 'gog /
analyzed: 'khor lo can ni rang gi lus la rdo rje can te lha mchog bdag rnams yan lag bcu gnyis 'gog /
translated: The cakravartin, in his own body, the vajra-holder, the supreme god, stops the twelve limbs.

original: rigs ldan dag ni yang dag ye shes glang po rta dang shing rta mngag gzhug 'phags pa'i tshad med rnams //
analyzed: rigs ldan dag ni yang dag ye shes glang po rta dang shing rta mngag gzhug 'phags pa'i tshad med rnams //
translated: The k·π£atriyas become the perfect wisdom, the elephants, horses, and chariots, the servants, the noble immeasurables,

original: drag po rang rgyal ming can dag tu 'gyur te ha nu m'an ni nyan thos gdug pa kla klo'i dbang //
analyzed: drag po rang rgyal ming can dag tu 'gyur te ha nu m'an ni nyan thos gdug pa kla klo'i dbang //
translated: and the powerful pratyekabuddhas. The ha·πáumƒÅn is the ≈õrƒÅvaka, the evil barbarian king.

original: srog chags rnams kyi sdig pa dag ste gang zhig byed pa'i blo gros sdug bsngal sbyin byed mi dge'i lam //
analyzed: srog chags rnams kyi sdig pa dag ste gang zhig byed pa'i blo gros sdug bsngal sbyin byed mi dge'i lam //
translated: The sins of beings are purified, and the mind that creates suffering gives the path of non-virtue.

original: rta la gnas /
analyzed: rta la gnas /
translated: [He] is mounted on a horse.

original: pa ma rig pa ste lha min dpung rnams mtha' dag bdud kyi phyogs ni rnam pa bzhi //
analyzed: pa ma rig pa ste lha min dpung rnams mtha' dag bdud kyi phyogs ni rnam pa bzhi //
translated: The Asuras are the fourfold army of Mara.

original: de yi yul la sdud pa srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms ba dag ste dpal ldan rgyal ba thar pa'i lam //
analyzed: de yi yul la sdud pa srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms ba dag ste dpal ldan rgyal ba thar pa'i lam //
translated: The object of that is the destruction of the fear of existence, the glorious path of liberation of the Victorious Ones.

original: @62a *// kee la shar ni chos dag sbyin pa srid pa'i 'jigs 'phrog yin te sa ni rdzas kyis gang ba yang //
analyzed: @62a *// kee la shar ni chos dag sbyin pa srid pa'i 'jigs 'phrog yin te sa ni rdzas kyis gang ba yang //
translated: On Kailash, the giver of Dharma, the snatcher of the fear of existence, the earth is filled with substances.

original: skabs gsum pa dang mi yi bla ma'i sras po tshangs dang lha dbang dag ni rgyab dang mdun du gang //
analyzed: skabs gsum pa dang mi yi bla ma'i sras po tshangs dang lha dbang dag ni rgyab dang mdun du gang //
translated: The son of the lord of men, the third of the three worlds, is in front and behind Brahma and Indra.

original: 'jam dpal 'jig rten mgon po srid pa gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dpal ldan rdul dang byang chub sems //
analyzed: 'jam dpal 'jig rten mgon po srid pa gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dpal ldan rdul dang byang chub sems //
translated: Manjushri, Lokeshvara, the glorious conqueror of the three worlds, and Bodhisattva.

original: rgyab tu sa gzhi dag la tshangs pa la sogs sna tshogs rigs rnams du ma'i sangs rgyas rnam dag pa'o //
analyzed: rgyab tu sa gzhi dag la tshangs pa la sogs sna tshogs rigs rnams du ma'i sangs rgyas rnam dag pa'o //
translated: Behind, on the ground, are the various pure Buddhas of the Brahma and other families.

original: de ltar kla klo'i dbang po'i 'khrug par 'gyur te nges par lus can rnams kyi dbus su 'o //
analyzed: de ltar kla klo'i dbang po'i 'khrug par 'gyur te nges par lus can rnams kyi dbus su 'o //
translated: Thus, the lord of the barbarians will arise, certainly in the midst of embodied beings.

original: sgyu ma'i gzugs kyang phyi rol tu ni nges par ma kha'i yul du kla klo 'khrug ste 'khrug pa min //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i gzugs kyang phyi rol tu ni nges par ma kha'i yul du kla klo 'khrug ste 'khrug pa min //
translated: The illusory form is not definitely external, in the land of MƒÅlava, where the barbarians are in turmoil.

original: dus kyi lo ni me grangs lo yi nyin zhag tshogs kyis bsgyur te rigs drug bgrod pa'i yan lag gis //
analyzed: dus kyi lo ni me grangs lo yi nyin zhag tshogs kyis bsgyur te rigs drug bgrod pa'i yan lag gis //
translated: The year of the age is converted by the sum of the days of the year multiplied by the number of the fire, and by the factor of the motion of the six signs.

original: zla ba'i dbye bas sum cu drug ste ro yis bsgyur ba'i ro ni rnal 'byor ma rnams dag gi rigs //
analyzed: zla ba'i dbye bas sum cu drug ste ro yis bsgyur ba'i ro ni rnal 'byor ma rnams dag gi rigs //
translated: The thirty-six divisions of the moon are the families of the yoginƒ´s, converted by the ro.

original: gza' yis bcad pas thob pa rab tu gsal zhing nges par dus kyi 'khor lo dag gi lha rnams so //
analyzed: gza' yis bcad pas thob pa rab tu gsal zhing nges par dus kyi 'khor lo dag gi lha rnams so //
translated: The result of the division by the planets is the clear and definite deities of the wheel of time.

original: phyogs kyis bcad pa dag gi lha dang lha mo rnams kyis mngon par brjod par 'gyur ro mi yi bdag /
analyzed: phyogs kyis bcad pa dag gi lha dang lha mo rnams kyis mngon par brjod par 'gyur ro mi yi bdag /
translated: The deities and goddesses of the division by the directions are the ones that are expressed, O lord of men.

original: sgyu 'phrul dra ba rnam pa gsum yang nyin zhag yan lag las 'gyur yang dag bug par rig byed dang // slar yang 'byung ba rgya mtsho me dang chu gter gyis 'gyur dpal ldan 'dus pa dus kyi dbye ba ni //
analyzed: sgyu 'phrul dra ba rnam pa gsum yang nyin zhag yan lag las 'gyur yang dag bug par rig byed dang // slar yang 'byung ba rgya mtsho me dang chu gter gyis 'gyur dpal ldan 'dus pa dus kyi dbye ba ni //
translated: The three kinds of magical nets also arise from the limbs of the day, the proper hole, and the expression, and again from the ocean of elements, the treasure of fire and water. The glorious GuhyasamƒÅja is the division of time.

original: de nyid ces bya gzhan yang drug gis @62b rnam dman de dag phyed kyi dbye bas rnam par phye ba ste //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya gzhan yang drug gis @62b rnam dman de dag phyed kyi dbye bas rnam par phye ba ste //
translated: The same [is true] for the other six, which are divided into two parts.

original: slar yang bsres pa dag ni dbye ba gnyis te bcu gsum bcu dgu dang ni bug pa de nyid bcas //
analyzed: slar yang bsres pa dag ni dbye ba gnyis te bcu gsum bcu dgu dang ni bug pa de nyid bcas //
translated: Again, the mixed [signs] are divided into two parts, thirteen and nineteen, along with the same [signs] of the orifices.

original: zla ba'i cha shas su nges nyin zhag tshogs las gza' yi cha yis thob pa gang dag nyin zhag drug /
analyzed: zla ba'i cha shas su nges nyin zhag tshogs las gza' yi cha yis thob pa gang dag nyin zhag drug /
translated: The parts of the planets obtained from the collection of days by the parts of the planets, which are ascertained as parts of the moon, are six days.

original: de dag rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya drug ste gzhan pa'i nyin zhag tshogs ni sku gsung thugs kyi rgya //
analyzed: de dag rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya drug ste gzhan pa'i nyin zhag tshogs ni sku gsung thugs kyi rgya //
translated: Those are the six mudrƒÅs of the vajra-holder, and the other collection of days is the mudrƒÅ of body, speech, and mind.

original: shes rab sku la dus sbyor gsum rnams nges par gsal byas rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor rgyud la 'o //
analyzed: shes rab sku la dus sbyor gsum rnams nges par gsal byas rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor rgyud la 'o //
translated: The three junctures are definitely clarified in the wisdom body, and the yoginƒ´s and yogins of the Yoga [tantra] are

original: nus ma khro bo rnams ni rim pas bcu ru rab tu 'gyur te lnga ni sangs rgyas lha mo rnams //
analyzed: nus ma khro bo rnams ni rim pas bcu ru rab tu 'gyur te lnga ni sangs rgyas lha mo rnams //
translated: the ten powerful wrathful ones in order. The five are the buddhas and goddesses.

original: gzugs sogs mig la sogs pa drug ste slar yang mi yi bdag po lha yi tshogs ni drug gnyis so //
analyzed: gzugs sogs mig la sogs pa drug ste slar yang mi yi bdag po lha yi tshogs ni drug gnyis so //
translated: The six, such as form and so forth, are the eyes and so forth. Again, the collection of gods is six times two, O lord of men.

original: rnal 'byor ma dang klu dang gtum mo brgyad ces bya ste srid pa 'di dag thams cad nyis 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma dang klu dang gtum mo brgyad ces bya ste srid pa 'di dag thams cad nyis 'gyur ro //
translated: The yoginis, nagas, and eight chandalis are all doubled.

original: 'di dag dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo bzhi lhag brgya ste de yi phyed kyang khyams gsum dag tu 'o //üîΩnyi ma'i cha las nyin zhag so sor chu tshod 'gyur ba gang zhig zla ba'i dbus su drug cu ste; ;de dag mtha' dag rnal 'byor ma ste srid pa gsum gyi gnas su dus sbyor bsres pa'o nyis 'gyur rnams //
analyzed: 'di dag dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo bzhi lhag brgya ste de yi phyed kyang khyams gsum dag tu 'o // nyi ma'i cha las nyin zhag so sor chu tshod 'gyur ba gang zhig zla ba'i dbus su drug cu ste; ;de dag mtha' dag rnal 'byor ma ste srid pa gsum gyi gnas su dus sbyor bsres pa'o nyis 'gyur rnams //
translated: These are the one hundred and four glorious Kalachakra deities, half of which are in the three galleries.üîΩThe sixty that are in the center of the moon are the yoginis, the total of which, mixed with the ayanas in the three realms, are doubled.

original: nyi ma'i cha las nyin zhag rab phye nyis 'gyur dag kyang gang zhig 'dir ni rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs //
analyzed: nyi ma'i cha las nyin zhag rab phye nyis 'gyur dag kyang gang zhig 'dir ni rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs //
translated: The sixty that are in the center of the sun are the assembly of yoginis, which are doubled from the division of the days from the parts of the sun.

original: mtha' dag bsdus par gyur pa mngon brjod rnams dang bcas pa dag ni nyi ma'i nyin zhag sum 'gyur 'gyur //üîΩnyi ma lo yi rab dbyer 'gyur te ri bong 'dzin @63a *//
analyzed: mtha' dag bsdus par gyur pa mngon brjod rnams dang bcas pa dag ni nyi ma'i nyin zhag sum 'gyur 'gyur // nyi ma lo yi rab dbyer 'gyur te ri bong 'dzin @63a *//
translated: The total of those, together with the abhinayas, are tripled from the days of the sun.

original: pa la ni mtha' dag phyogs kyi dbye ba'o //
analyzed: pa la ni mtha' dag phyogs kyi dbye ba'o //
translated: The division of the days of the sun is a year, and the total of those is the division of the directions of the moon.

original: de ltar dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyud la mkha' lag mi bdag rnams te lha dang lha mo rnams kyis ni //
analyzed: de ltar dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyud la mkha' lag mi bdag rnams te lha dang lha mo rnams kyis ni //
translated: Thus, the first Buddha, the lord of the body, the gods and goddesses,

original: shes rab thabs dag mtshan mo nyin mor 'gyur ba mnyam pa'i cha ste mtshan mo phyed dang nyin phyed la'o //
analyzed: shes rab thabs dag mtshan mo nyin mor 'gyur ba mnyam pa'i cha ste mtshan mo phyed dang nyin phyed la'o //
translated: is the equal part of the night and day, the union of wisdom and means.

original: gang gis rang gi lus la nyin mtshan dus dang zla ba 'pho ba'i dbye ba dag gis shes gyur pa //
analyzed: gang gis rang gi lus la nyin mtshan dus dang zla ba 'pho ba'i dbye ba dag gis shes gyur pa //
translated: He who knows his own body by the divisions of day and night, the passing of the months and the transits,

original: de ni dpal ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rje srid pa'i 'jigs 'joms sangs rgyas skye ba 'di nyid dag la 'o //
analyzed: de ni dpal ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rje srid pa'i 'jigs 'joms sangs rgyas skye ba 'di nyid dag la 'o //
translated: he is the glorious Ma√±juvajra, the destroyer of the fears of existence, the Buddha in this very life.

original: sum cu'i cha yis de las thob pa gsum gyis bsgyur ba nges par dus kyi 'khor lo'i lha rnams dang // phyi rol gyi ni phyag rgya drug ste slar yang de las 'khor lo dag gi rtsa rnams de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: sum cu'i cha yis de las thob pa gsum gyis bsgyur ba nges par dus kyi 'khor lo'i lha rnams dang // phyi rol gyi ni phyag rgya drug ste slar yang de las 'khor lo dag gi rtsa rnams de bzhin nyid //
translated: The thirty parts of that, multiplied by three, are the deities of the KƒÅlacakra, and the six external seals, and again, the channels of the wheels are just so.

original: gtsug tor la ni chu gter snying khar brgyad de spyi bor mi bdag mgrin pa la yang so yi grangs //
analyzed: gtsug tor la ni chu gter snying khar brgyad de spyi bor mi bdag mgrin pa la yang so yi grangs //
translated: In the u·π£·πáƒ´·π£a, there are eight in the heart, on the crown, the lord of men, and on the throat, the number of teeth.

original: lte bar brgyad ni brgyad kyis bsgyur ba dag ste nyis 'gyur mi bdag gsang ba'i dbus su rab tu grags //
analyzed: lte bar brgyad ni brgyad kyis bsgyur ba dag ste nyis 'gyur mi bdag gsang ba'i dbus su rab tu grags //
translated: Eight at the navel, multiplied by eight, are sixteen; in the middle of the secret place of the lord of men, it is well known.

original: rtsa drug rnams ni 'khor lo 'gog cing bcu ni yul rnams 'phrog pa 'dus pa dag gi rang bzhin te //
analyzed: rtsa drug rnams ni 'khor lo 'gog cing bcu ni yul rnams 'phrog pa 'dus pa dag gi rang bzhin te //
translated: The six nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s stop the cakras, and the ten take away the objects. They are the nature of the gatherings.

original: slar yang yang nas yang du nyis 'gyur bsgyur ba dag kyang bad kan rlung dang mkhris pa dag gi cha //
analyzed: slar yang yang nas yang du nyis 'gyur bsgyur ba dag kyang bad kan rlung dang mkhris pa dag gi cha //
translated: Again and again, the double of the double is the portion of phlegm, wind, and bile.

original: 'di dag nges par 'chi ba ster byed bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis tshe dang nad med dag kyang ster //
analyzed: 'di dag nges par 'chi ba ster byed bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis tshe dang nad med dag kyang ster //
translated: These definitely bestow death, but by the power of the guru‚Äôs definitive empowerment, they also bestow longevity and health.

original: 'khor lo drug la dus kyi sa rnams 'chi ba'i 'jigs 'phrog rnal 'byor rnams kyi 'di la ngo @63b mtshar med //
analyzed: 'khor lo drug la dus kyi sa rnams 'chi ba'i 'jigs 'phrog rnal 'byor rnams kyi 'di la ngo @63b mtshar med //
translated: In the six cakras, the stages of time are the thieves of the fear of death. For the yogis, there is no wonder here.

original: gtsug tor la ni  chu gter dpral bar rgya mtshos bsnun pa'i dus rnams bad kan khams ni rab 'khrugs pa 'o //
analyzed: gtsug tor la ni  chu gter dpral bar rgya mtshos bsnun pa'i dus rnams bad kan khams ni rab 'khrugs pa 'o //
translated: In the u·π£·πáƒ´·π£a, the water treasure; in the forehead, the time of the ocean‚Äôs embrace; the phlegm element is disturbed.

original: mgrin par so dang snying kha'i chu skyes dag la mig gis bsgyur ba'i dus rnams mkhris pa'i khams rab 'khrug /
analyzed: mgrin par so dang snying kha'i chu skyes dag la mig gis bsgyur ba'i dus rnams mkhris pa'i khams rab 'khrug /
translated: The eyes, when they are turned to the teeth and the lotus of the heart, disturb the bile.

original: lte ba gsang ba dag la chu gter drug cu mi bdag dag kyang de bzhin rlung gi khams rab 'khrug /
analyzed: lte ba gsang ba dag la chu gter drug cu mi bdag dag kyang de bzhin rlung gi khams rab 'khrug /
translated: The navel and the secret place, when they are turned to the sixty lotuses, disturb the wind.

original: gsang bar gzhan ni phyogs dang drug kyang rab tu gsal byas nges par 'dus pa dag ste 'gog pa 'o //
analyzed: gsang bar gzhan ni phyogs dang drug kyang rab tu gsal byas nges par 'dus pa dag ste 'gog pa 'o //
translated: The secret place, when it is turned to the other six directions, is the gathering and cessation.

original: drug gi rtsa ni 'khor lo 'gog pa zla nyi me yi dbye bas rnam gsum lam la gnas pa gang //
analyzed: drug gi rtsa ni 'khor lo 'gog pa zla nyi me yi dbye bas rnam gsum lam la gnas pa gang //
translated: The three channels of the six wheels, abiding in the path, are the sun, moon, and fire.

original: srog chags rnams la 'chi ba ster ba de ni bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis lus la bsrung bar bya //
analyzed: srog chags rnams la 'chi ba ster ba de ni bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis lus la bsrung bar bya //
translated: The one who gives death to living beings is protected in the body by the power of the guru.

original: drug la gal te srog ni rab zhugs gyur na de tshe mi rnams kyi ni 'chi ba 'joms par nges //
analyzed: drug la gal te srog ni rab zhugs gyur na de tshe mi rnams kyi ni 'chi ba 'joms par nges //
translated: If the life force enters the six, then death is certainly conquered by men.

original: phra mo la ni ma zhugs pa na rnal 'byor rnams kyi 'chi ba'i yul ni gang du gcod par byed //
analyzed: phra mo la ni ma zhugs pa na rnal 'byor rnams kyi 'chi ba'i yul ni gang du gcod par byed //
translated: When it does not enter the subtle, where is the place of death cut off for the yogis?

original: srog ni gal te rtsa gcig nyid la nyin dang mtshan mor 'bab na 'tsho ba dag ni dus kyi lo //üîΩgal te phyogs gcig rnam par ma chad 'bab na mi rnams kyi ni 'tsho ba phyed dang bcas pa'i lo //
analyzed: srog ni gal te rtsa gcig nyid la nyin dang mtshan mor 'bab na 'tsho ba dag ni dus kyi lo // gal te phyogs gcig rnam par ma chad 'bab na mi rnams kyi ni 'tsho ba phyed dang bcas pa'i lo //
translated: If the life [prƒÅ·πáa] flows in one nƒÅ·∏çƒ´ alone, day and night, for a human being, it is a year.üîΩIf it flows in one part without interruption, it is half a year.

original: zla ba gcig tu rnam par ma chad 'bab na mi yi bdag po 'tsho ba dag kyang zla ba gsum //
analyzed: zla ba gcig tu rnam par ma chad 'bab na mi yi bdag po 'tsho ba dag kyang zla ba gsum //
translated: If it flows in one part without interruption for one month, it is three months, O lord of men.

original: de ltar rnal 'byor pas ni rang lus dag la zla bgrod 'chi ba'i dus kyi 'khor lor shes par bya //
analyzed: de ltar rnal 'byor pas ni rang lus dag la zla bgrod 'chi ba'i dus kyi 'khor lor shes par bya //
translated: Thus the yogƒ´ should know the wheel of death in his own body.

original: lnga nas nyi shu rtsa lnga'i nyin zhag bgrod pa skye ba lnga ni 'phel ba dag gis skye ba ste //
analyzed: lnga nas nyi shu rtsa lnga'i nyin zhag bgrod pa skye ba lnga ni 'phel ba dag gis skye ba ste //
translated: The five [prƒÅ·πáas] move for twenty-five days. The five births increase.

original: de nas @64a *//
analyzed: de nas @64a *//
translated: Then

original: re re lhag pas bcu ni gsum gyis bsgyur ba dag kyang gsum ni lhag pa ji srid nyid //
analyzed: re re lhag pas bcu ni gsum gyis bsgyur ba dag kyang gsum ni lhag pa ji srid nyid //
translated: the ten [prƒÅ·πáas] increase by one each, and the three are increased by three as long as [the prƒÅ·πáas] move.

original: dus ni rdzogs na'o lo rnams gsum mig zla ba de dag rnams dang drug gsum zung dang zla dang zla ba gang //
analyzed: dus ni rdzogs na'o lo rnams gsum mig zla ba de dag rnams dang drug gsum zung dang zla dang zla ba gang //
translated: When the time is complete, it is three years, six months, and fifteen days.

original: zla ba da ngag rnams dang nyin zhag tshes phyogs mda' dang yon tan gnyis zla 'tsho ba'i lhag ma 'o //
analyzed: zla ba da ngag rnams dang nyin zhag tshes phyogs mda' dang yon tan gnyis zla 'tsho ba'i lhag ma 'o //
translated: The remainder of the life of the moon, the days, the lunar mansions, the zodiacal signs, the qualities, and the zodiacal asterisms are the same.

original: rang gi gnas nas mchog gi cha yis khyim gyi 'khor lo 'dor te nyams dang lhag ma mtshungs pa yi //
analyzed: rang gi gnas nas mchog gi cha yis khyim gyi 'khor lo 'dor te nyams dang lhag ma mtshungs pa yi //
translated: From its own place, the zodiacal asterism is relinquished by the best part, and the remainder is the same.

original: lo dang zla ba zhag gis kyang ste gsum mig ri bong can dang drug gsum zung dang zla bas kyang //
analyzed: lo dang zla ba zhag gis kyang ste gsum mig ri bong can dang drug gsum zung dang zla bas kyang //
translated: The years, months, and days, the three eyes, the rabbit, the six, the three pairs, and the moon,

original: rdzogs pa nas ni lhag ma mtshungs pa'i tshes phyogs mda' dang yon tan rnams dang lte bar rab zhugs pa'i //
analyzed: rdzogs pa nas ni lhag ma mtshungs pa'i tshes phyogs mda' dang yon tan rnams dang lte bar rab zhugs pa'i //
translated: from completion, the remainder is the same. The zodiacal asterism, the lunar mansion, the quality, and the navel enter.üîΩThe thirty-six days at the end of the day are the death omens of the sun. By the application of death, there is death.

original: sum cu rtsa drug gis te nyin zhag mthar ni nyin mor byed pa'i 'chi ltas sbyor bas 'chi bar 'gyur; ;sngon du nyi ma'i lo gsum dag gi nyin zhag tshogs ni mda' dang me dang 'jig rten 'dor par byed //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa drug gis te nyin zhag mthar ni nyin mor byed pa'i 'chi ltas sbyor bas 'chi bar 'gyur; ;sngon du nyi ma'i lo gsum dag gi nyin zhag tshogs ni mda' dang me dang 'jig rten 'dor par byed //
translated: Previously, the collection of days of three years of the sun is relinquished by the lunar mansion, the fire, and the world.

original: de nas rgyu ba dang bcas mda' dus rtse mo can dang mkha' ri zla ba dag ni gsum pa la'o //
analyzed: de nas rgyu ba dang bcas mda' dus rtse mo can dang mkha' ri zla ba dag ni gsum pa la'o //
translated: Then, the lunar mansion, the time, the crest, the sky, the mountain, and the moon are in the third.

original: mig sprul ri bo mda' dang nor dang lag pa gzhan te bdun pa la ni rgyu ba dag kyang ngo //
analyzed: mig sprul ri bo mda' dang nor dang lag pa gzhan te bdun pa la ni rgyu ba dag kyang ngo //
translated: The eyes, the nose, the tongue, the navel, the penis, the anus, and the hands are the seven moving [winds].

original: de nas tshes la sogs pa'i nyin zhag tshogs pa thams cad dag kyang gang zhig lte ba ji srid nyid //
analyzed: de nas tshes la sogs pa'i nyin zhag tshogs pa thams cad dag kyang gang zhig lte ba ji srid nyid //
translated: Then, all the collections of days beginning with the lunar day move through the navel for as long as [the moon] is in the zodiac.

original: dus kyi lo yi bar du nges par nyin zhag bgrod pa'i dbang gis 'pho zhing rgyu bar byed pa ste //
analyzed: dus kyi lo yi bar du nges par nyin zhag bgrod pa'i dbang gis 'pho zhing rgyu bar byed pa ste //
translated: For as long as a year, they move and shift by the power of counting the days.

original: zla ba zhes dang nyi ma'i lam la mi mnyam mnyam pa'i nyin zhag @64b re re 'phel bas rim pas so //
analyzed: zla ba zhes dang nyi ma'i lam la mi mnyam mnyam pa'i nyin zhag @64b re re 'phel bas rim pas so //
translated: On the paths of the moon and the sun, the days increase unevenly and evenly, respectively, by one.

original: slar yang 'pho ba'i dbye ba mi mnyam mnyam pa'i nyin zhag rnams kyi bcu gnyis rtsibs la byed pa ste //
analyzed: slar yang 'pho ba'i dbye ba mi mnyam mnyam pa'i nyin zhag rnams kyi bcu gnyis rtsibs la byed pa ste //
translated: Again, the divisions of the shift are made on the twelve spokes of the uneven and even days.

original: phyed dang bcas pa'i zla ba ji srid gzhan ni sum cu dag dang 'tsho ba dag gi mtshan mo gsum //
analyzed: phyed dang bcas pa'i zla ba ji srid gzhan ni sum cu dag dang 'tsho ba dag gi mtshan mo gsum //
translated: For as long as the moon is in the zodiac with the half [signs], the thirty [signs], and the three nights of the living.

original: dbugs dang chu srang dang ni chu tshod nyin mtshan dus rnams de ni rim pa dag gis rgyu ba ste //
analyzed: dbugs dang chu srang dang ni chu tshod nyin mtshan dus rnams de ni rim pa dag gis rgyu ba ste //
translated: The breaths, the finger lengths, the hours, the days and nights, and the periods [of the winds] move through them in order.

original: bgrod pa'i yan lag las ni lo bdun dag gis bgrod pa 'gro ba'i dbang las lo ni drug cus kyang //
analyzed: bgrod pa'i yan lag las ni lo bdun dag gis bgrod pa 'gro ba'i dbang las lo ni drug cus kyang //
translated: By the power of the movement, [the breath] moves in a year of thirty days, and by the power of the year, in a year of time.

original: zla ba gsum las sum cu'i lo yi nyin zhag bgrod pa'i dbang gis dus kyi lo dang phyogs kyis kyang //
analyzed: zla ba gsum las sum cu'i lo yi nyin zhag bgrod pa'i dbang gis dus kyi lo dang phyogs kyis kyang //
translated: By the power of the movement, [the breath] moves in a year of time and by the side.

original: dus kyi 'khor lo dag la phyed bcas sum cu gnyis kyis bgos pa'i nyin zhag tshogs kyis rgyu bar 'gyur //
analyzed: dus kyi 'khor lo dag la phyed bcas sum cu gnyis kyis bgos pa'i nyin zhag tshogs kyis rgyu bar 'gyur //
translated: In the wheels of time, [the breath] moves in a group of days divided by thirty-two and a half.

original: phyogs dang phyogs la rtsa ni dgu yis bsnun pa'i lag 'gro lte ba'i 'khor lo dag la gcod par byed //
analyzed: phyogs dang phyogs la rtsa ni dgu yis bsnun pa'i lag 'gro lte ba'i 'khor lo dag la gcod par byed //
translated: In the navel wheel, [the breath] is cut off by the nine channels in each direction, like a crab.

original: las kyi 'khor lo bya ba zhes bya'i tshigs las nyin zhag rtse mo can gyi rtsa ni re re 'dor //üîΩmgrin pa dag las rgyu skar rtsa ni nyin dang nyin la zla ba'i nang du rim pas 'dor ba ste //
analyzed: las kyi 'khor lo bya ba zhes bya'i tshigs las nyin zhag rtse mo can gyi rtsa ni re re 'dor // mgrin pa dag las rgyu skar rtsa ni nyin dang nyin la zla ba'i nang du rim pas 'dor ba ste //
translated: In the wheel of action, [the breath] is cut off in the channel called Action, and in the channel called Peak, [the breath] is cut off in a day.üîΩIn the throat, [the breath] is cut off in the channel of the lunar mansions, in the channel of the moon, and in the channel of the day.

original: thig ler gnas pa zla pa'i rkang pa phyogs kyi nang du 'dor te gza' yi rtsa dang gsang bar gnas //
analyzed: thig ler gnas pa zla pa'i rkang pa phyogs kyi nang du 'dor te gza' yi rtsa dang gsang bar gnas //
translated: In the bindu, [the breath] is cut off in the channel of the lunar mansions, in the channel of the moon, and in the channel of the side.

original: sde pa dbyangs dang bcas pa rnams las nyin mor byed pa khyim gyi dbye bas bgrod par rgyu ba ste //
analyzed: sde pa dbyangs dang bcas pa rnams las nyin mor byed pa khyim gyi dbye bas bgrod par rgyu ba ste //
translated: The sun moves through the zodiacal signs by day, and through the lunar mansions by night.

original: phyi nas re re lhag pas nyin dang nyi na la ldog par 'gyur te dus kyi lo ni ji srid nyid //üîΩlo ni chad na phyogs kyi nang du dbyangs kyi nyin zhag dbang gis rgyu ba dang ni zad pa yang //
analyzed: phyi nas re re lhag pas nyin dang nyi na la ldog par 'gyur te dus kyi lo ni ji srid nyid // lo ni chad na phyogs kyi nang du dbyangs kyi nyin zhag dbang gis rgyu ba dang ni zad pa yang //
translated: After that, it moves in the opposite direction, increasing by one day and one night every month, until it reaches the end of the year.

original: nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su @65a *//
analyzed: nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su @65a *//
translated: When the year is complete, the sun moves through the signs of the zodiac, and also through the lunar mansions, by the power of the vowels, during the day and night.

original: dbugs ni 'byung dang 'jug pa nyams pa 'tsho ba dag gi mtshan mo gcig /
analyzed: dbugs ni 'byung dang 'jug pa nyams pa 'tsho ba dag gi mtshan mo gcig /
translated: The life of living beings is measured by the exhalation and inhalation of breath.

original: lte ba mgrin pa dpral ba rang gi snying ga'i padma dag la rtsa ni lhag ma dang bcas pa //
analyzed: lte ba mgrin pa dpral ba rang gi snying ga'i padma dag la rtsa ni lhag ma dang bcas pa //
translated: The remaining channels are located at the navel, throat, forehead, and heart cakras.

original: nyi ma ro dang me dag gnas te rang gi snying ga'i padmar phyed bcas rtsa ni de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: nyi ma ro dang me dag gnas te rang gi snying ga'i padmar phyed bcas rtsa ni de bzhin nyid //
translated: The sun, the rasanƒÅ, and the fire element are located at the heart cakra, together with half of the lalana.

original: lag pa rkang pa'i tshigs la tshes kyis bsgyur ba'i dus rnams nyin zhag drug ni ji srid nyid du ste //
analyzed: lag pa rkang pa'i tshigs la tshes kyis bsgyur ba'i dus rnams nyin zhag drug ni ji srid nyid du ste //
translated: The days and nights of six finger-widths last for the duration of the months, which are transformed by the lunar mansions.

original: mthar ni kun tu phra mo rab tu 'bab ste nyin zhag snying gi chu skyes yang dag stong par byed //
analyzed: mthar ni kun tu phra mo rab tu 'bab ste nyin zhag snying gi chu skyes yang dag stong par byed //
translated: In the end, the subtle [breath] descends completely, emptying the heart lotus in a day.

original: sum cu drug gi stong phrag dhru brgya'i nyin zhag tshogs rnams dag gis dus kyi rtsa ni rgyu ba ste //
analyzed: sum cu drug gi stong phrag dhru brgya'i nyin zhag tshogs rnams dag gis dus kyi rtsa ni rgyu ba ste //
translated: The time channel moves in a group of days, thirty-six thousand times one hundred and eighty.

original: nyin mtshan dus la nyi ma zla bas rang rang rgyu ba dag gis gang gang rdzogs par mi nus pa //
analyzed: nyin mtshan dus la nyi ma zla bas rang rang rgyu ba dag gis gang gang rdzogs par mi nus pa //
translated: The sun and moon cannot complete their movements in a day and night.

original: nyi ma'i nyin zhag nyi ma rgyu ba la yang bu lon du 'gyur de phyed zla ba'i rgyu ba la //
analyzed: nyi ma'i nyin zhag nyi ma rgyu ba la yang bu lon du 'gyur de phyed zla ba'i rgyu ba la //
translated: The sun's day is also a debt in the movement of the sun, and half a month in the movement of the moon.

original: rgyu skar nyin zhag rab tu dbye bas 'chi ba'i nyi zla rgyu ba stong pa'i zla ba dag la 'o //
analyzed: rgyu skar nyin zhag rab tu dbye bas 'chi ba'i nyi zla rgyu ba stong pa'i zla ba dag la 'o //
translated: The movement of the sun and moon of death is in the empty months by the division of lunar days.

original: srog ni lus la lhag pa gang zhig rab gsal mtshams su rig byed rkang chad kyis dman drug cu ste //
analyzed: srog ni lus la lhag pa gang zhig rab gsal mtshams su rig byed rkang chad kyis dman drug cu ste //
translated: The remaining life in the body is sixty less the cut-off line of the life line at the junction of the channels.

original: 'pho ba'i dbye ba dag gis thams cad nyin zhag so so'i dus su rtsa ni zung dag nges par 'joms //
analyzed: 'pho ba'i dbye ba dag gis thams cad nyin zhag so so'i dus su rtsa ni zung dag nges par 'joms //
translated: By the division of transits, all [channels] are definitely destroyed in pairs in their own time of the day.

original: yang dang yang du lo yi dbus su nyi zla rgyu ba dag las stong pa mig dang ri yi grangs //
analyzed: yang dang yang du lo yi dbus su nyi zla rgyu ba dag las stong pa mig dang ri yi grangs //
translated: The sun and moon move through the middle of the signs, and the empty [signs] are the number of the eyes and mountains.

original: de ltar rang rang tshad kyi lo brgya dag gis lha mi rnams kyi rang gi tshe la dus bgrod do //
analyzed: de ltar rang rang tshad kyi lo brgya dag gis lha mi rnams kyi rang gi tshe la dus bgrod do //
translated: In this way, the years of their own measure are the time for the life of gods and men.

original: zos dang nad dang bsnun pa gal te res 'ga' mi rnams la ni dus kyi rtsa la gyur pa na //
analyzed: zos dang nad dang bsnun pa gal te res 'ga' mi rnams la ni dus kyi rtsa la gyur pa na //
translated: If, by chance, the time of men is affected by eating, illness, or blows,

original: gzhi de yis ni 'phral @65b la myur bar rtsa ba'i 'khor lo dag la dus ni rab tu 'jug par 'gyur //
analyzed: gzhi de yis ni 'phral @65b la myur bar rtsa ba'i 'khor lo dag la dus ni rab tu 'jug par 'gyur //
translated: then, by that cause, the time immediately and quickly enters the basic wheels.

original: 'khor lo dag gi rtsa 'di 'gog ste nyi ma ri bong can gyi bgrod pa bcad nas rim pa yis //
analyzed: 'khor lo dag gi rtsa 'di 'gog ste nyi ma ri bong can gyi bgrod pa bcad nas rim pa yis //
translated: These channels of the wheels are blocked, and the movement of the sun and moon is cut off.

original: dbu mar phra mo la ni brten pa gang zhig 'phrog pa mi bdag srog chags rnams kyi 'tsho ba'o //
analyzed: dbu mar phra mo la ni brten pa gang zhig 'phrog pa mi bdag srog chags rnams kyi 'tsho ba'o //
translated: The subtle one that is based in the central channel is the life of the king of creatures.
