analyzed: gnas de dag tu yon tan dbang gis rnam par nyams par 'gyur te de yis phyir na sbyang par bya; ;sa la rin chen dung dang ma ching bu dag ni rnam rgyal bde byed dkyil 'khor dag gi don du ste //
translated: The jewel, conch, and mirror on the ground are for the sake of the mandala of the Victorious One.

original: khang bzang don dang khyim gyi don dang rab gsal nges par 'dir ni mchod sbyin la sogs slad du 'o //
analyzed: khang bzang don dang khyim gyi don dang rab gsal nges par 'dir ni mchod sbyin la sogs slad du 'o //
translated: The palace, the house, and the light are certainly for the sake of sacrifice and so forth here.

original: rdzogs ba dag la sa ni sbyang dang gzung ba dag kyang de bzhin bu rnams dag ni yang dag bsdu //
analyzed: rdzogs ba dag la sa ni sbyang dang gzung ba dag kyang de bzhin bu rnams dag ni yang dag bsdu //
translated: On the full moon, the earth is purified, and likewise seized, and the sons are truly gathered.

original: bcu gnyis pa la thig gdab 'dod pa ma nu'i @85b nyin zhag dag la dpal ldan rdul tshon dgye ba nyid //
analyzed: bcu gnyis pa la thig gdab 'dod pa ma nu'i @85b nyin zhag dag la dpal ldan rdul tshon dgye ba nyid //
translated: On the twelfth, the desire to lay out the lines, on the MƒÅgha day, the glorious arrangement of the colored powders.

original: dbang la sogs pa nya la mchog gi bla mas sbyin te bdud ni bcom pa'i nyin zhag dag la yang //
analyzed: dbang la sogs pa nya la mchog gi bla mas sbyin te bdud ni bcom pa'i nyin zhag dag la yang //
translated: The consecration of the king and so forth is performed by the best of gurus on the day of the destruction of the demon.

original: de yi mtshan mo rgyal ba'i rigs la rab tu gnas par 'gyur te mtshan mo gzhan la rab gnas min //
analyzed: de yi mtshan mo rgyal ba'i rigs la rab tu gnas par 'gyur te mtshan mo gzhan la rab gnas min //
translated: On that night he will be established in the family of the Victorious One, not on another night.

original: dag pa'i dus sbyor gza' la sogs pas mi yi bdag po mtshan mo gzhan la rab tu gnas par 'gyur //
analyzed: dag pa'i dus sbyor gza' la sogs pas mi yi bdag po mtshan mo gzhan la rab tu gnas par 'gyur //
translated: The lord of men is established on another night by the pure planetary hours, the planets and so forth.

original: srog dang pa sangs nub par gyur na de tshe nges par ba ga ma rab tu gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: srog dang pa sangs nub par gyur na de tshe nges par ba ga ma rab tu gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: When the life [period] of B·πõhaspati has set, then indeed the V·πõddhi will not be established.üîΩThe masters, having understood all the mundane and supramundane [matters] in the places of the earth,

original: slob dpon dag gis sa gzhi'i gnas su 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa dag kyang mtha' dag shes nas ni; ;bya ba gang gad byed pa de de mtha' dag de ltar 'bras bu dag ni rab tu sbyin par 'gyur //
analyzed: slob dpon dag gis sa gzhi'i gnas su 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa dag kyang mtha' dag shes nas ni; ;bya ba gang gad byed pa de de mtha' dag de ltar 'bras bu dag ni rab tu sbyin par 'gyur //
translated: whatever action they perform, that [action] will be completely fruitful in that way.

original: slob ma'i mgo bo snying ga de bzhin gtsug tor lte ba mgrin pa dpal ldan gsang ba'i padmar ni //
analyzed: slob ma'i mgo bo snying ga de bzhin gtsug tor lte ba mgrin pa dpal ldan gsang ba'i padmar ni //
translated: On the head, heart, crown protrusion, navel, throat, and glorious secret lotus of the disciple,

original: rgyal ba la sogs gnyi ga'i rigs su gyur pa sku gsung bthugs kyis phye ba dag gis bsrungs byas shing //
analyzed: rgyal ba la sogs gnyi ga'i rigs su gyur pa sku gsung bthugs kyis phye ba dag gis bsrungs byas shing //
translated: The mandala should be guarded by the two families of the Victorious One and so forth, divided into body, speech, and mind.

original: de bzhin sku gzugs sogs dang glegs bam rnams ni rab gsal nges pa'i dpal ldan dbyangs rnams dag gis te //
analyzed: de bzhin sku gzugs sogs dang glegs bam rnams ni rab gsal nges pa'i dpal ldan dbyangs rnams dag gis te //
translated: Likewise, the images and so forth, as well as the scriptures, are to be guarded by the glorious melodies of the clear and definite [mantras].

original: sems can rnams ni thar pa'i slad du che ge bdag kyang gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor dag ni bzhengs par bgyid //
analyzed: sems can rnams ni thar pa'i slad du che ge bdag kyang gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor dag ni bzhengs par bgyid //
translated: For the sake of the liberation of sentient beings, I, [name], will also erect the principal mandala.

original: dag pa'i gnas ni legs par gang zhing shin du mnyam par bkod pa rus sbal rgyab bzhin mtho ba dag /üîΩkhru tshad gcig la sogs pa dus dang nor dang mi bdag de bzhin stong @86a *//
analyzed: dag pa'i gnas ni legs par gang zhing shin du mnyam par bkod pa rus sbal rgyab bzhin mtho ba dag / khru tshad gcig la sogs pa dus dang nor dang mi bdag de bzhin stong @86a *//
translated: The pure place is well filled and arranged with evenness, raised like the back of a tortoise.

original: phrag dag gi tshad la ni //
analyzed: phrag dag gi tshad la ni //
translated: One cubit and so forth, the time, wealth, and lord of men, likewise the measure of thousands,

original: thig skud rdo rje rdul tshon lha dang gshin rje chu bdag tu ste byang du rdo rje dril bu dag /
analyzed: thig skud rdo rje rdul tshon lha dang gshin rje chu bdag tu ste byang du rdo rje dril bu dag /
translated: The thread line, vajra dust, gods, and Yama, in the north the vajra and bell,

original: bkod nas mtshan ma rnyed na dang po dang ni phyi ma'i phyogs su dkyil 'khor thig ni gdab par bya //
analyzed: bkod nas mtshan ma rnyed na dang po dang ni phyi ma'i phyogs su dkyil 'khor thig ni gdab par bya //
translated: If the signs are found, one should lay out the ma·πá·∏çala lines in the east and west.

original: thig skud chad par gyur na bla ma nyams shing yongs 'joms 'gongs par gyur na bu rnams dag kyang ngo //
analyzed: thig skud chad par gyur na bla ma nyams shing yongs 'joms 'gongs par gyur na bu rnams dag kyang ngo //
translated: If the thread breaks, the guru will decline; if it is too long, the children will be destroyed.

original: gal te rdul tshon rlung gis khyer na 'jigs pa gsal byed yul 'khor dag tu rgyal po 'jigs pa yang //
analyzed: gal te rdul tshon rlung gis khyer na 'jigs pa gsal byed yul 'khor dag tu rgyal po 'jigs pa yang //
translated: If the colored powders are carried away by the wind, there will be danger for the king in the country.

original: mtshan ma ngan pa de dag mthong nas sler yang gtso bo dag gi sngags kyi bzlas pa rab tu bya //
analyzed: mtshan ma ngan pa de dag mthong nas sler yang gtso bo dag gi sngags kyi bzlas pa rab tu bya //
translated: Having seen these bad signs, one should again perform the mantra recitation of the principal deities.

original: slar yang mtshan ma rnyed na mnyam dang mi mnyam rkang pa dag gis thig ni gdab pa bsgrub par bya //
analyzed: slar yang mtshan ma rnyed na mnyam dang mi mnyam rkang pa dag gis thig ni gdab pa bsgrub par bya //
translated: If the signs are found again, one should perform the laying out of the lines with even and uneven steps.

original: shes rab thabs kyi yan lag dbus su yongs 'joms su 'gyur de ni dkyil 'khor dag la spang bar bya //
analyzed: shes rab thabs kyi yan lag dbus su yongs 'joms su 'gyur de ni dkyil 'khor dag la spang bar bya //
translated: The branch of wisdom and means will be in the middle, and that should be abandoned in the ma·πá·∏çala.

original: sa la g-yul gyi dus su rtse mo can dang rlung du gnas pa'i sde yi dbus su gdengs can bzhin //
analyzed: sa la g-yul gyi dus su rtse mo can dang rlung du gnas pa'i sde yi dbus su gdengs can bzhin //
translated: In the earth battle, in the middle of the peak and wind directions, like the hooded nƒÅgas,

original: g-yul du sde ni nyams par 'gyur te sa gzhi dag tu mtshan mo'i 'thab mo la ni bsnun pa'o //
analyzed: g-yul du sde ni nyams par 'gyur te sa gzhi dag tu mtshan mo'i 'thab mo la ni bsnun pa'o //
translated: The army is defeated in battle, and the ground is struck in the nocturnal battle.

original: de phyir g-yul dang dbang dag la yang yongs 'joms shin tu stobs dang ldan par sngags pas rig par bya //
analyzed: de phyir g-yul dang dbang dag la yang yongs 'joms shin tu stobs dang ldan par sngags pas rig par bya //
translated: Therefore, in battle and in the royal court, the mantrin should be known to be very powerful, completely victorious.

original: aa sogs ka sogs rdo rje ldan pa dag gis rang gi snying ga'i padmar zla nyi me steng du //
analyzed: aa sogs ka sogs rdo rje ldan pa dag gis rang gi snying ga'i padmar zla nyi me steng du //
translated: With the vowels and consonants endowed with the vajras, on the moon, sun, and fire in the lotus of one's heart,

original: dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo ri bong can 'dzin 'dod pa mnan pa'i g-yas brkyang zhabs ni bsgoms byas shing //
analyzed: dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo ri bong can 'dzin 'dod pa mnan pa'i g-yas brkyang zhabs ni bsgoms byas shing //
translated: one should meditate on the glorious KƒÅlacakra, with the right leg extended, holding the moon, pressing down on KƒÅma.

original: @86b shes rab gtso bo'i thugs ka'i padma nyi zla sbyar ldan la ste rang rang rdo rje lcags kyu yis //
analyzed: @86b shes rab gtso bo'i thugs ka'i padma nyi zla sbyar ldan la ste rang rang rdo rje lcags kyu yis //
translated: In the lotus of the heart of the chief of wisdom, with the moon and sun joined, with one's own vajra hook,

original: sangs rgyas lha mo rnams bkug rdul tshon dag la ro mnyam bkod cing thig skud la yang bsgom par bya //
analyzed: sangs rgyas lha mo rnams bkug rdul tshon dag la ro mnyam bkod cing thig skud la yang bsgom par bya //
translated: one should summon the buddhas and goddesses, and arrange them in the colored powders, equal in flavor, and also meditate on the chalk line.

original: thig ni ro dang dgu bcu 'di dag tshangs pa'i thig las phyogs kyi cha rnams dag tu rab sbyin bya //
analyzed: thig ni ro dang dgu bcu 'di dag tshangs pa'i thig las phyogs kyi cha rnams dag tu rab sbyin bya //
translated: These lines, with the flavors and ninety, are given in the directions from the line of BrahmƒÅ.

original: sor phyed brjod pa nor dang dus kyi thig rnams dag gis dbus su snying po'i dkyil 'khor dag tu 'gyur //
analyzed: sor phyed brjod pa nor dang dus kyi thig rnams dag gis dbus su snying po'i dkyil 'khor dag tu 'gyur //
translated: The center of the mandala of the essence is by the half-squares, the squares of the directions, and the squares of the time.

original: snying po las ni phyi rol mtha' dag rnams kyis bkod pa dag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po sgo yi mtshams //
analyzed: snying po las ni phyi rol mtha' dag rnams kyis bkod pa dag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po sgo yi mtshams //
translated: The outer array is by the essence, the great mandala, the measure of the door,

original: ra ba rta babs la sogs rtse mo can de g-yo ba'i dkyil 'khor phyi rol sa la blta bar bya //
analyzed: ra ba rta babs la sogs rtse mo can de g-yo ba'i dkyil 'khor phyi rol sa la blta bar bya //
translated: the perimeter, the arch, and so on, the peak, the moving mandala, the outer ground.

original: gtso bo'i 'khor lo chu skyes lha la sogs pa'i gdan las sum 'gyur dag kyang tshangs pa'i gnas su ni //
analyzed: gtso bo'i 'khor lo chu skyes lha la sogs pa'i gdan las sum 'gyur dag kyang tshangs pa'i gnas su ni //
translated: The principal mandala is three times the lotus seat of the deity and so on, in the abode of BrahmƒÅ,

original: nyi ma'i re mig dag gis 'gyur te slar yang ri bong can gyi ka ba rdo rje'i phreng bar 'gyur //
analyzed: nyi ma'i re mig dag gis 'gyur te slar yang ri bong can gyi ka ba rdo rje'i phreng bar 'gyur //
translated: the measure of the sun squares. Again, the moon pillar is the vajra garland.

original: bzhi yis sangs rgyas la sogs padmar rab 'gyur ri bong can gyi phyi rol rdo rje phreng bar yang //
analyzed: bzhi yis sangs rgyas la sogs padmar rab 'gyur ri bong can gyi phyi rol rdo rje phreng bar yang //
translated: By four, it is the excellent lotus of the Buddha and so on, and also the vajra garland outside of the moon.

original: lha mo sangs rgyas dag gi bar du bum pa 'am ni thod pa'i gdan du re mig gsum gyis 'gyur //
analyzed: lha mo sangs rgyas dag gi bar du bum pa 'am ni thod pa'i gdan du re mig gsum gyis 'gyur //
translated: Between the goddesses and the Buddhas, there is a vase or skull seat by the three squares.

original: gnas de nas 'dir ji srid re kh'a'i bar du nyin mor byed pa dag gis tshon gyi sar 'gyur te; ;phyogs zur rnams su chu gter re mig dag gis dri la sogs pa rnams kyi zla nyi padma nyid //
analyzed: gnas de nas 'dir ji srid re kh'a'i bar du nyin mor byed pa dag gis tshon gyi sar 'gyur te; ;phyogs zur rnams su chu gter re mig dag gis dri la sogs pa rnams kyi zla nyi padma nyid //
translated: In the corners, the water-treasure squares are the moon, sun, and lotus of smell, etc.

original: phyed dang bcas pa'i gcig gis re kh'a gsum ste dus dang ro rnams kyis kyang sgo dang @87a *//
analyzed: phyed dang bcas pa'i gcig gis re kh'a gsum ste dus dang ro rnams kyis kyang sgo dang @87a *//
translated: One and a half [squares] are the three lines. The directions and the intermediate directions are the doors and door-lintels,

original: sgo khyud dang // de bzhin logs dang 'gram pa dag ste gsum gyis kyang ni kha khyer chen po dag dang ka ba phyed //
analyzed: sgo khyud dang // de bzhin logs dang 'gram pa dag ste gsum gyis kyang ni kha khyer chen po dag dang ka ba phyed //
translated: and also the walls and the corners. With three [squares], the great ledges and half-pillars are [formed].

original: de nas phyed dang gnyis dang dus kyi nor bu'i rang bzhin snam bu dang ni do shal sa ru 'gyur //
analyzed: de nas phyed dang gnyis dang dus kyi nor bu'i rang bzhin snam bu dang ni do shal sa ru 'gyur //
translated: Then, with one and a half [squares], the garland and the half-garland are the nature of the time-jewel.

original: sgo yi rtsa ba'i dang po nas ni gsum gyis bsgyur ba'i bcu yis rta babs ka bar bcas par 'gyur //
analyzed: sgo yi rtsa ba'i dang po nas ni gsum gyis bsgyur ba'i bcu yis rta babs ka bar bcas par 'gyur //
translated: From the first square at the base of the door, the ten multiplied by three are the pediments with pillars.

original: thig phyed steng du do shal phyed pa dag gi mthar ni b'a ku lir yang rab tu 'gyur //
analyzed: thig phyed steng du do shal phyed pa dag gi mthar ni b'a ku lir yang rab tu 'gyur //
translated: Above half a square, at the end of the half-garland, there is also a vƒÅkucƒ´.

original: re mig drug gi rta babs 'og tu nor gyi padma dang ldan rnal 'byor ma rnams snam bu 'o //
analyzed: re mig drug gi rta babs 'og tu nor gyi padma dang ldan rnal 'byor ma rnams snam bu 'o //
translated: Under the archways of the six squares, the lotuses of wealth, the Yoginis, and the platforms.

original: de nas ro yis bsgyur ba'i dus kyis dpal ldan tshon gyi sa ste re kh'a lnga yi bar du'o //
analyzed: de nas ro yis bsgyur ba'i dus kyis dpal ldan tshon gyi sa ste re kh'a lnga yi bar du'o //
translated: Then, by the time of the transmutation of the corpse, the glorious colors, the five lines.

original: phyogs zur rnams su nyi ma'i padma nyis 'gyur ma nu'i 'dab ldan nyi ma'i re mig dag gis bya //
analyzed: phyogs zur rnams su nyi ma'i padma nyis 'gyur ma nu'i 'dab ldan nyi ma'i re mig dag gis bya //
translated: In the corners, the lotuses of the sun, doubled, with the petals of the moon, with the squares of the sun.

original: snying po'i sgo ni nyis 'gyur rnam pa gsum gyi yon tan dbang gis 'dir ni phyi rol sgo dag kyang //
analyzed: snying po'i sgo ni nyis 'gyur rnam pa gsum gyi yon tan dbang gis 'dir ni phyi rol sgo dag kyang //
translated: The door of the center, doubled, by the power of the three qualities, and also the outer doors here,

original: ra ba sogs dang de bzhin nyid du dkyil 'khor gsum bkod rnams ni brgyad pa gsum gyis rab tu bya //
analyzed: ra ba sogs dang de bzhin nyid du dkyil 'khor gsum bkod rnams ni brgyad pa gsum gyis rab tu bya //
translated: the walls, etc., and likewise the three mandalas arranged, are made with the three eights.

original: de dag rnams kyi thog mtha' cha la nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor dang ni phyi rol rdo rje'i phreng ba yang //
analyzed: de dag rnams kyi thog mtha' cha la nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor dang ni phyi rol rdo rje'i phreng ba yang //
translated: At the beginning and end of those, the mandalas of the sun and moon, and also the outer garland of vajras,

original: de phyed re mig dag gis bya ste 'khor lo gang yin dkyil 'khor mtha' yang rlung gi dkyil 'khor la //
analyzed: de phyed re mig dag gis bya ste 'khor lo gang yin dkyil 'khor mtha' yang rlung gi dkyil 'khor la //
translated: made with half of those squares. The wheel, which is the mandala, is also the wind mandala at the end.

original: ka ba'i 'og tu gdengs can rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du yang rab tu 'gyur te lha rnams shing rta ni //
analyzed: ka ba'i 'og tu gdengs can rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du yang rab tu 'gyur te lha rnams shing rta ni //
translated: Under the pillar, in the middle of the mandala of the Nagas, is the very best.

original: nyi ma dag gis sgo yi dbus dang mkha' dang sa gzhi @87b dag la shar gyi cha dang nub la yang //
analyzed: nyi ma dag gis sgo yi dbus dang mkha' dang sa gzhi @87b dag la shar gyi cha dang nub la yang //
translated: The doors are in the middle of the sun, in the sky and on the ground, in the eastern and western directions.üîΩWith the five jewels such as the vajra, gold, sapphire, coral, pearl, etc.,

original: rdo rje la sogs rin chen lnga dang gser dang ma ra ka ta byi ru mu tig la sogs dang // dbye ba lnga yi 'bru 'am rnam mang nor bu dang ni de bzhin nyid du btags pa'i tshon dag gis //
analyzed: rdo rje la sogs rin chen lnga dang gser dang ma ra ka ta byi ru mu tig la sogs dang // dbye ba lnga yi 'bru 'am rnam mang nor bu dang ni de bzhin nyid du btags pa'i tshon dag gis //
translated: with the five kinds of grain, with many kinds of jewels, and with the colors of the same kind,

original: phyogs kyi cha la tshon gyi sar ni mi yi bdag po sangs rgyas dbye bas rdul tshon gdab par 'gyur //
analyzed: phyogs kyi cha la tshon gyi sar ni mi yi bdag po sangs rgyas dbye bas rdul tshon gdab par 'gyur //
translated: in the directions and in the place of the colors, the king should scatter the colored powder with the divisions of the Buddhas.

original: ser dang dkar dang dmar ba sogs kyis sa chu'i dkyil 'khor dang ni me rlung dag la rim pas so //
analyzed: ser dang dkar dang dmar ba sogs kyis sa chu'i dkyil 'khor dang ni me rlung dag la rim pas so //
translated: With yellow, white, red, etc., on the mandalas of earth and water, and on fire and wind, respectively.

original: shar du dpal ldan nag po'i sa ru 'gyur zhing lho ru nyi ma mtshungs pa dag ste nub tu yang //
analyzed: shar du dpal ldan nag po'i sa ru 'gyur zhing lho ru nyi ma mtshungs pa dag ste nub tu yang //
translated: In the east, it is the ground of glorious Krishna; in the south, it is like the sun; in the west,

original: gser mdog byang du gzhan te ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar rdo rje can gyi zhal gyi dbye bas so //
analyzed: gser mdog byang du gzhan te ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar rdo rje can gyi zhal gyi dbye bas so //
translated: The golden one is in the north, white like the moon, with a face of the color of a diamond.

original: dkar dang dmar dang nag po rim par yongs su bkod pa'i snam bu dang ni do shal dag gi sa //
analyzed: dkar dang dmar dang nag po rim par yongs su bkod pa'i snam bu dang ni do shal dag gi sa //
translated: The bands and necklaces are arranged in order, white, red, and black,

original: padma zla nyi'i kha dog gis te dri med ri bong can mtshungs dam pa dang nag pa'i ri mo gsum //
analyzed: padma zla nyi'i kha dog gis te dri med ri bong can mtshungs dam pa dang nag pa'i ri mo gsum //
translated: with three lines, pure like the moon, and black.

original: dbus su padma 'dab brgyad ljang khu dag ste bung ba dang mtshungs ka ba rdo rje phreng bar 'gyur //
analyzed: dbus su padma 'dab brgyad ljang khu dag ste bung ba dang mtshungs ka ba rdo rje phreng bar 'gyur //
translated: In the center is a green eight-petaled lotus, with pillars like bees, and a vajra garland.

original: dbang ldan lha min me rlung dag tu zla ba nyi ma'i lus dang nag po ser po rim pa yi //
analyzed: dbang ldan lha min me rlung dag tu zla ba nyi ma'i lus dang nag po ser po rim pa yi //
translated: In the northeast, southwest, southeast, and northwest, the moon, sun, and body are black and yellow in order.

original: dung dang gandi nor bu dag dang ljon pa zhes bya de bzhin bum pa dkar po mtshams brgyad du //
analyzed: dung dang gandi nor bu dag dang ljon pa zhes bya de bzhin bum pa dkar po mtshams brgyad du //
translated: The conch, kettle-drum, jewel, and tree are called, and likewise the white vase in the eight directions.

original: zla ba chu skyes dmar po'i steng du rab tu 'gyur te nyin byed padma dkar po'i steng du yang //
analyzed: zla ba chu skyes dmar po'i steng du rab tu 'gyur te nyin byed padma dkar po'i steng du yang //
translated: On the moon and red lotus, and on the sun and white lotus,üîΩthey are well arranged.

original: chu skyes dmar po'i lte ba la ni lha mo rnams kyi ri bong 'dzin pa dag gis gdan du 'gyur //
analyzed: chu skyes dmar po'i lte ba la ni lha mo rnams kyi ri bong 'dzin pa dag gis gdan du 'gyur //
translated: In the center of the red lotus, the moon of the goddesses serves as their seat.

original: chu skyes dkar po'i lte ba dag la lha rnams @88a *//
analyzed: chu skyes dkar po'i lte ba dag la lha rnams @88a *//
translated: In the center of the white lotus, the sun of the gods

original: kyi yang nyin mor byed par 'gyur te phyogs su 'o //
analyzed: kyi yang nyin mor byed par 'gyur te phyogs su 'o //
translated: is situated in the directions.

original: phyi rol du ni gtso bo'i padma'i dbang gis rdo rje phreng bar 'gyur te kha khyer kha dog dkar //
analyzed: phyi rol du ni gtso bo'i padma'i dbang gis rdo rje phreng bar 'gyur te kha khyer kha dog dkar //
translated: Outside, by the power of the principal lotus, the vajra fence becomes the white wall.

original: ka ba ser po b'a ku l'i ni kha ba'i mdog tu rab 'gyur rta babs kha dog sna tshogs so //
analyzed: ka ba ser po b'a ku l'i ni kha ba'i mdog tu rab 'gyur rta babs kha dog sna tshogs so //
translated: The yellow pillars are the color of jasmine, and the gateways are multicolored.

original: dkar po'i mdog ste rnal 'byor ma rnams dag gi nor gyi padma'i snam bu dag kyang phyogs kun tu //
analyzed: dkar po'i mdog ste rnal 'byor ma rnams dag gi nor gyi padma'i snam bu dag kyang phyogs kun tu //
translated: The white platform of the yoginƒ´s is in all directions.

original: phyogs kyi char ni padma dmar por 'gyur te rgyal pa'i dbang gis padma dkar po zur du yang //
analyzed: phyogs kyi char ni padma dmar por 'gyur te rgyal pa'i dbang gis padma dkar po zur du yang //
translated: In the corners, by the power of the Victor, there is a white lotus, and in the directions, a red lotus.

original: zla ba nyi mas rnam dman de bzhin nyid du 'chi med rnams kyi nyis 'gyur ma nu'i 'dab ldan no; ;mkha' sogs re kh'a lnga po gang yin de dag rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis sum cha bar du gnas //
analyzed: zla ba nyi mas rnam dman de bzhin nyid du 'chi med rnams kyi nyis 'gyur ma nu'i 'dab ldan no; ;mkha' sogs re kh'a lnga po gang yin de dag rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis sum cha bar du gnas //
translated: The five lines, beginning with the sky, are in the third part, by the power of the qualities of their nature.

original: ka ba'i 'og gi sgo yi mtshams su gdengs can rnams kyi rlung sogs dkyil 'khor dag tu rab tu 'gyur //
analyzed: ka ba'i 'og gi sgo yi mtshams su gdengs can rnams kyi rlung sogs dkyil 'khor dag tu rab tu 'gyur //
translated: In the corners of the door below the pillars, the mandalas of the wind, etc., of the serpents, are well placed.

original: dbang ldan dang ni lha min zur du sa yi dkyil 'khor la gnas zla nyi dag go mi yi dbang //
analyzed: dbang ldan dang ni lha min zur du sa yi dkyil 'khor la gnas zla nyi dag go mi yi dbang //
translated: In the northeast corner, on the earth mandala, are the moon and sun, the lords of men.

original: phyi rol sgo yi steng gi char ni ri dvags dang bcas chos kyi 'khor lo sprin gyi mdog tu 'gyur //
analyzed: phyi rol sgo yi steng gi char ni ri dvags dang bcas chos kyi 'khor lo sprin gyi mdog tu 'gyur //
translated: Above the outer door, in the part of the sky, is the Dharma wheel, with its deer, the color of a cloud.

original: g-yas su bum pa dmar por 'gyur te nor sbyin dang bcas chur ni rnga bo che dang byang chub shing //
analyzed: g-yas su bum pa dmar por 'gyur te nor sbyin dang bcas chur ni rnga bo che dang byang chub shing //
translated: To the right is the red vase, with Kubera; in the water is the great drum and the tree of enlightenment.

original: dril bu me long ba dan ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar rta babs dag las 'phyang bar gyur pa dang // do shal byed pa kha dog dkar por 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis shing rta sgo yi dbus su 'o //
analyzed: dril bu me long ba dan ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar rta babs dag las 'phyang bar gyur pa dang // do shal byed pa kha dog dkar por 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis shing rta sgo yi dbus su 'o //
translated: The white canopy, like a rabbit's horn, hangs down from the pure architraves, and the white garlands are made of small bells.

original: 'khor lo dkar dang dmar po rang @88b gi rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dbang gis rlung la sgo yi phyi rol du //
analyzed: 'khor lo dkar dang dmar po rang @88b gi rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dbang gis rlung la sgo yi phyi rol du //
translated: The white and red wheels, according to the family, are outside the door of the chariot.

original: rdo rje 'bar ba 'phro ba dag gis mi yi bdag po phyi rol rdo rje phreng ba dag tu'ang 'gyur //
analyzed: rdo rje 'bar ba 'phro ba dag gis mi yi bdag po phyi rol rdo rje phreng ba dag tu'ang 'gyur //
translated: The lord of men should also have a garland of blazing vajras outside the door.

original: sbom pas nad dag phyed cing phra dang re kh'a ngan pas rdzas ni nyams pa rab tu gsal bar byed //
analyzed: sbom pas nad dag phyed cing phra dang re kh'a ngan pas rdzas ni nyams pa rab tu gsal bar byed //
translated: A thick line indicates illness; a thin or bad line indicates loss of wealth.

original: chad pas 'chi ba dang ni 'khyog pos mi yi bdag po dang bcas grong rdal de bzhin nyid du skyod //
analyzed: chad pas 'chi ba dang ni 'khyog pos mi yi bdag po dang bcas grong rdal de bzhin nyid du skyod //
translated: A broken line indicates death; a crooked line indicates the same for the lord of men and the city.

original: mtshan ma nyi ma zla ba chad na sngags pa rnams la srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa'i dngos grub med //
analyzed: mtshan ma nyi ma zla ba chad na sngags pa rnams la srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa'i dngos grub med //
translated: If the signs of the sun and moon are broken, the mantrin will not have the power to destroy the fear of worldly existence.

original: rnam par 'dres pas rigs rgyud 'chad de rgyal ba'i rigs kyis rdul tshon dkyil 'khor dag la rig par bya; ;gang zhig rgyud kyi nang du rgyal bas gsal bar ma gsungs mtshan ma de ni mdzes pa'i don gyi rgyur //
analyzed: rnam par 'dres pas rigs rgyud 'chad de rgyal ba'i rigs kyis rdul tshon dkyil 'khor dag la rig par bya; ;gang zhig rgyud kyi nang du rgyal bas gsal bar ma gsungs mtshan ma de ni mdzes pa'i don gyi rgyur //
translated: The signs that are not clearly taught in the tantras by the Victorious Ones are for the purpose of beauty in the mandala.

original: dkyil 'khor dag la dgod par mi bya de nyid bdud kyi mtshan ma'o rgyal ba skyed mdzad rigs la ni //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor dag la dgod par mi bya de nyid bdud kyi mtshan ma'o rgyal ba skyed mdzad rigs la ni //
translated: They should not be placed in the mandalas, for they are the signs of Mara.

original: de phyir rgyud las gsungs pa'i mtshan mar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis sgo yi mtshams nas dkyil 'khor la'o //
analyzed: de phyir rgyud las gsungs pa'i mtshan mar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis sgo yi mtshams nas dkyil 'khor la'o //
translated: Therefore, the signs taught in the tantras are for the family, and according to the family, from the door threshold to the mandala.

original: do shal phyed pa'i mthar ni sa yi dkyil 'khor gzhi la padma bum sogs mdzes pa rab tu bya //
analyzed: do shal phyed pa'i mthar ni sa yi dkyil 'khor gzhi la padma bum sogs mdzes pa rab tu bya //
translated: At the end of the half-garland, on the ground of the earth mandala, one should make beautiful lotus vases, and so forth.

original: nag po la sogs rkang pa 'phel bar 'gyur ba dag ni rdul tshon dpangs te nas gcig dag nas kyang //
analyzed: nag po la sogs rkang pa 'phel bar 'gyur ba dag ni rdul tshon dpangs te nas gcig dag nas kyang //
translated: The height of the colored powders increases by one part, from black and so forth.

original: ra ba rnams ni sum 'gyur nyin mor byed pa ri bong can dang chu skyes re kh'a nyis 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ra ba rnams ni sum 'gyur nyin mor byed pa ri bong can dang chu skyes re kh'a nyis 'gyur ro //
translated: The ramparts are three times that, and the sun, moon, and lotus lines are double.

original: snying po dag las phyi rol dpangs ni nyis 'gyur du 'gyur mi yi bdag po dkyil 'khor 'di la ste //
analyzed: snying po dag las phyi rol dpangs ni nyis 'gyur du 'gyur mi yi bdag po dkyil 'khor 'di la ste //
translated: The height of the outer [walls] is twice that of the inner [walls], O King, in this mandala.

original: do shal phyed @89a *//
analyzed: do shal phyed @89a *//
translated: [The height of] the half-garland is one-fourth [of the height of the outer wall].

original: pa'i mthar ni nas gcig sa chu bsreg za rlung dang rdo rje pheng ba rnams la'o //
analyzed: pa'i mthar ni nas gcig sa chu bsreg za rlung dang rdo rje pheng ba rnams la'o //
translated: [The height of] the earth, water, fire, wind, and vajra terraces is one-fourth [of the height of the half-garland].

original: dbus nas sgo yi dang bo'i mtshams ni nor gyi blo gros mar gyur 'jig rten khams kyi dkyil 'khor la //
analyzed: dbus nas sgo yi dang bo'i mtshams ni nor gyi blo gros mar gyur 'jig rten khams kyi dkyil 'khor la //
translated: From the center to the first junction of the gate, [the height of] the earth is the height of DhanapƒÅla.

original: sgo nas tsa rtsi ka mthar sum 'gyur gdangs can re mig dag gis lan tshva'i rin chen gnas su 'gyur //
analyzed: sgo nas tsa rtsi ka mthar sum 'gyur gdangs can re mig dag gis lan tshva'i rin chen gnas su 'gyur //
translated: From the gate to the end of CƒÅrvƒÅka, [the height of] the water is three times [the height of the earth]. The squares [of the water] are the abode of salt.

original: de nas rgyal ba'i dbang po'i re mig gis kyang me yi dkyil 'khor de nas de bzhin rlung du 'gyur //
analyzed: de nas rgyal ba'i dbang po'i re mig gis kyang me yi dkyil 'khor de nas de bzhin rlung du 'gyur //
translated: Then, from the square of the Jina, [the height of] the fire is the same as that of the earth. From there, [the height of] the wind is the same as that of the fire.

original: de yi phyi rol du ni de dag rnam par dag pas sa chu bsreg za rlung rnams blta bar bya //
analyzed: de yi phyi rol du ni de dag rnam par dag pas sa chu bsreg za rlung rnams blta bar bya //
translated: Outside of that, the earth, water, fire, and wind [terraces] are seen in their pure form.

original: gtsug tor zhal dang mgrin pa sum 'gyur gdengs can re mig dag gis dkyil 'khor la ni sbyang bar bya //
analyzed: gtsug tor zhal dang mgrin pa sum 'gyur gdengs can re mig dag gis dkyil 'khor la ni sbyang bar bya //
translated: The usnƒ´sa, face, and throat are three times [the height of] the nƒÅgas. The squares [of the throat] are purified in the mandala.

original: de nas lhun po mtha' dag sum 'gyur gdengs can re mig dag gis sa ni ji srid nyid du ste //
analyzed: de nas lhun po mtha' dag sum 'gyur gdengs can re mig dag gis sa ni ji srid nyid du ste //
translated: Then, as far as the end of Meru, the earth is tripled by the squares of the nƒÅgas.

original: re mig drug drug dag gis rim pas gsal bar klu yi srid pa dang ni sa 'og bdun po nyid //
analyzed: re mig drug drug dag gis rim pas gsal bar klu yi srid pa dang ni sa 'og bdun po nyid //
translated: The nƒÅga abodes and the seven underworlds are clearly (stated) by the six squares each.

original: de ltar sa la sogs pa thams cad slar yang de bzhin rang gi lus dag la ni sbyang bar bya //
analyzed: de ltar sa la sogs pa thams cad slar yang de bzhin rang gi lus dag la ni sbyang bar bya //
translated: Thus, the earth and so forth are all again purified in one's own body in the same way.

original: gnyis dang chu gter gcig dang chu gter gcig nyi dus ro rtse mo can gnyis dus phyed dus phyed dang // dus dang dus ni rab phye dag dang dus dang ro dag kyang ste skyon gyi cha rnams rim pa yis //
analyzed: gnyis dang chu gter gcig dang chu gter gcig nyi dus ro rtse mo can gnyis dus phyed dus phyed dang // dus dang dus ni rab phye dag dang dus dang ro dag kyang ste skyon gyi cha rnams rim pa yis //
translated: Two oceans, one ocean, one ocean, two oceans, half an ocean, half an ocean, and an ocean‚Äîthe parts of faults are in order.

original: snying por lte ba rtsibs sam padma'i 'dab ma dag dang de nas ka ba rdo rje'i phreng ba dang // padma rdo rje'i phreng bar 'gyur te sa dag dang ni de nas sgo dang sgo khyud la @89b sogs dang // ka ba ra ba kha khyer dag dang slar yang de nas snam bu dang ni do shal sa dag dang //
analyzed: snying por lte ba rtsibs sam padma'i 'dab ma dag dang de nas ka ba rdo rje'i phreng ba dang // padma rdo rje'i phreng bar 'gyur te sa dag dang ni de nas sgo dang sgo khyud la @89b sogs dang // ka ba ra ba kha khyer dag dang slar yang de nas snam bu dang ni do shal sa dag dang //
translated: the pillars, the parapets, and the cornices, and then again the platforms, the hanging tassels, and the platforms.

original: me longs yi snam bur 'gyur ro mi yi bdag po rta babs rab tu gsungs pa'i cha rnams kyis //
analyzed: me longs yi snam bur 'gyur ro mi yi bdag po rta babs rab tu gsungs pa'i cha rnams kyis //
translated: The crowning platforms are formed by the parts of the gateways, O lord of men.

original: phyi rol du ni sgo sogs thams cad nyis 'gyur du 'gyur phyi rol du yang de yi nyis 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyi rol du ni sgo sogs thams cad nyis 'gyur du 'gyur phyi rol du yang de yi nyis 'gyur ro //
translated: Outside, all the doors and so forth are doubled, and outside again they are doubled.

original: phyi rol du ni padma 'khor lo rnams dang shing rta'i dkyil 'khor rnams ni nyin byed dag gis so //
analyzed: phyi rol du ni padma 'khor lo rnams dang shing rta'i dkyil 'khor rnams ni nyin byed dag gis so //
translated: Outside, the lotus and wheel platforms and the chariot platforms are by the suns.

original: aom yig ye shes las skyes rgyal ba mchog gi padma zla ba nyi ma dag gi gdan steng du //
analyzed: aom yig ye shes las skyes rgyal ba mchog gi padma zla ba nyi ma dag gi gdan steng du //
translated: On a seat of lotus, moon, and sun, is the supreme victor born from the syllable O·πÉ and the wisdom of the Buddha.

original: aa sogs ka sogs stong par bcas pa dag dang srid gsum skyed par byed pa'i yum ni gzhag par bya //
