translated: Again, the signs of the ≈õ≈´dra and so on are the lotus, the plow, the jewel, and the banner, respectively, by the power of their qualities.

original: rgyal rigs ma yi rin chen dar dpyangs su 'gyur mi yi bdag po smyug gu rin chen phreng ba ni //
analyzed: rgyal rigs ma yi rin chen dar dpyangs su 'gyur mi yi bdag po smyug gu rin chen phreng ba ni //
translated: The jewel and the banner are the signs of the k·π£atriya woman, the lord of men, the bamboo, and the jewel rosary.

original: rje rigs ma yi de bzhin du ste de bzhin chu na rgyu ba dang bcas zangs snod gnyis skyes ma'i //
analyzed: rje rigs ma yi de bzhin du ste de bzhin chu na rgyu ba dang bcas zangs snod gnyis skyes ma'i //
translated: The same is true for the vai≈õya woman, and the copper vessel and the two are the signs of the woman of the mixed castes.

original: yum gyi mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi sde d'a ma ru dang rnga chen cod pa na nyid dang bgrang phreng ngo //
analyzed: yum gyi mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi sde d'a ma ru dang rnga chen cod pa na nyid dang bgrang phreng ngo //
translated: The four signs of the mother are the damaru, the great drum, the diadem, and the rosary.

original: bshang ba gcig ba dang ni khrag dang sha dang bcas pa lha mo rnams ni bzhi por 'gyur pa ste //
analyzed: bshang ba gcig ba dang ni khrag dang sha dang bcas pa lha mo rnams ni bzhi por 'gyur pa ste //
translated: The four goddesses are the single excrement, blood, flesh, and bone.

original: rna ba sna dang mig dang lce dang bshad lam dang ni bha ga sgra yi rdo rje la sogs drug /
analyzed: rna ba sna dang mig dang lce dang bshad lam dang ni bha ga sgra yi rdo rje la sogs drug /
translated: The six are the ear, nose, eye, tongue, anus, and vagina, the sound-vajra, and so on.

original: rnag dang bad kan dang ni shig dang srin bu chu ser zhag dang ba sbu skra dang brgyad po yang //
analyzed: rnag dang bad kan dang ni shig dang srin bu chu ser zhag dang ba sbu skra dang brgyad po yang //
translated: The eight are pus, phlegm, dandruff, worms, lymph, grease, body hair, and head hair.

original: sgyu ma mkhris pa rus pa rkang dang sna tshogs lus la gnas pa mchin pa dang ni glo ba dang // rtsa dang pags pa rnams dang snying dang tshil bu ldan pa dag ni bcu ru 'gyur ro mi yi dbang //
analyzed: sgyu ma mkhris pa rus pa rkang dang sna tshogs lus la gnas pa mchin pa dang ni glo ba dang // rtsa dang pags pa rnams dang snying dang tshil bu ldan pa dag ni bcu ru 'gyur ro mi yi dbang //
translated: The ten are the illusion, bile, bone, marrow, and various body parts, the liver, lungs, channels, skin, heart, and fat, O lord of men.

original: rna ba dang ni sna dang mig dang kha dang bshad @105b lam dbus dang bha ga dag dang mchan khung sogs //
analyzed: rna ba dang ni sna dang mig dang kha dang bshad @105b lam dbus dang bha ga dag dang mchan khung sogs //
translated: The ear, nose, eye, mouth, anus, middle of the vagina, and the armpits, and so on,

original: lus kyi yan lag brgyad la gnas pa'i dri ma mi yi bdag po lha min mo rnams brgyad du 'gyur //
analyzed: lus kyi yan lag brgyad la gnas pa'i dri ma mi yi bdag po lha min mo rnams brgyad du 'gyur //
translated: The impurities located in the eight limbs of the body are the eight celestial nymphs of the lord of men.

original: sen me dang bcas so dang yan lag bcu gnyis thod pa rnal 'byor ma rnams brgyad pa brgyad du 'gyur //
analyzed: sen me dang bcas so dang yan lag bcu gnyis thod pa rnal 'byor ma rnams brgyad pa brgyad du 'gyur //
translated: The nails and teeth, the twelve limbs, and the skull are the eight groups of yoginis.

original: bshad ba gci ba khrag dang sha ni sna tshogs lus la gnas pa gnas kyi dbye ba dag la bzhi //
analyzed: bshad ba gci ba khrag dang sha ni sna tshogs lus la gnas pa gnas kyi dbye ba dag la bzhi //
translated: The excrement, urine, blood, and flesh, which are of various kinds, are the four divisions of the places located in the body.

original: rna ba sna dang mig dang lce dang bshang lam dag dang bha ga'i zhing gi dbye ba la yang drug /
analyzed: rna ba sna dang mig dang lce dang bshang lam dag dang bha ga'i zhing gi dbye ba la yang drug /
translated: The ear, nose, eye, tongue, anus, and bhaga are the six divisions of the fields of the places.

original: rnag la sogs pa skra yi bar ni sa yi steng gi gnas su tshando ha yi dbye ba brgyad //
analyzed: rnag la sogs pa skra yi bar ni sa yi steng gi gnas su tshando ha yi dbye ba brgyad //
translated: The pus, etc., up to the hair are the eight divisions of the chandohas, the places on the earth.

original: rgyu ma la sogs tshil gyi bar ni phyogs zhes bya ba mi bdag 'dus pa'i rab tu dbye ba rnams //
analyzed: rgyu ma la sogs tshil gyi bar ni phyogs zhes bya ba mi bdag 'dus pa'i rab tu dbye ba rnams //
translated: The intestines, etc., up to the fat are the directions, the divisions of the assemblies, O lord of men.

original: rna ba la sogs yan lag brgyad kyi lus la nges par rnam mang dri ma dur khrod rab dbye rnams //
analyzed: rna ba la sogs yan lag brgyad kyi lus la nges par rnam mang dri ma dur khrod rab dbye rnams //
translated: The impurities, which are of many kinds, in the body of the eight limbs, such as the ears, are the divisions of the charnel grounds.

original: dus me zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan rab tu gsal zhing nges par gnas kyi dbye ba dag la bzhi //
analyzed: dus me zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan rab tu gsal zhing nges par gnas kyi dbye ba dag la bzhi //
translated: The divisions of the field are six, according to the divisions of the planets, the sun, moon, Mars, Mercury, Jupiter, Venus, and Saturn.

original: sa skyes zla skyes sngags pa pa sangs spen pa gdengs can rnams ni zhing gi dbye ba la yang drug /üîΩsa dang chu dang me dang rlung rnams dang ni sa skyes rlung las skyes pa dag /
analyzed: sa skyes zla skyes sngags pa pa sangs spen pa gdengs can rnams ni zhing gi dbye ba la yang drug / sa dang chu dang me dang rlung rnams dang ni sa skyes rlung las skyes pa dag /
translated: The divisions of the sacred site are eight, according to the divisions of the eight planets, the sun, moon, Mars, Mercury, Jupiter, Venus, Saturn, and RƒÅhu.üîΩThe divisions of the meeting places are ten, according to the divisions of the ten directions, the four directions, the four intermediate directions, and the zenith and nadir.üîΩThe divisions of the charnel grounds are eight, according to the eight directions, the four directions, the four intermediate directions.

original: brgyad ni tshando ha yi dbye ba rnams te slar yang de bzhin ro drug dri dang kha dog dang // reg bya sgra ni de bzhin nyid du rab tu gsal bar 'dus pa bcu yi rab tu dbye ba rnams //üîΩsa dang chu dang me dang rlung ni zad pa dag kyang mdun dang g-yon dang g-yas dang rgyab tu ste /
analyzed: brgyad ni tshando ha yi dbye ba rnams te slar yang de bzhin ro drug dri dang kha dog dang // reg bya sgra ni de bzhin nyid du rab tu gsal bar 'dus pa bcu yi rab tu dbye ba rnams // sa dang chu dang me dang rlung ni zad pa dag kyang mdun dang g-yon dang g-yas dang rgyab tu ste /
translated: The divisions of the sacred sites are six, according to the six families, the vajra family and so on.üîΩThe divisions of the meeting places are four, according to the four families, the tathƒÅgata family and so on.

original: kha dog la sogs bzhi po rnams ni phyogs bral dag tu thim pa dur khrod brgyad kyi dbye @106a *//
analyzed: kha dog la sogs bzhi po rnams ni phyogs bral dag tu thim pa dur khrod brgyad kyi dbye @106a *//
translated: The divisions of the charnel grounds are three, according to the three families, the lotus family and so on.üîΩThe divisions of the sacred sites are two, according to the two families, the buddha family and the lotus family.üîΩThe divisions of the meeting places are two, according to the two families, the buddha family and the vajra family.üîΩThe divisions of the charnel grounds are two, according to the two families, the buddha family and the padma family.üîΩThe divisions of the sacred sites are one, according to the single family, the buddha family.üîΩThe divisions of the meeting places are one, according to the single family, the vajra family.üîΩThe divisions of the charnel grounds are one, according to the single family, the padma family.üîΩThe divisions of the sacred sites are one, according to the single family, the buddha family.üîΩThe divisions of the meeting places are one, according to the single family, the vajra family.üîΩThe divisions of the charnel grounds are one, according to the single family, the padma family.üîΩThe divisions of the sacred sites are one, according to the single family, the buddha family.üîΩThe divisions of the meeting places are one, according to the single family, the vajra family.üîΩThe divisions of the charnel grounds are one, according to the single family, the padma family.

original: ba rnams // gnas ni sgrol ma la sogs khyim ste gsal bar sgra yi rdo rje la sogs de bzhin zhing du brjod //üîΩtshando ha ni tsa rtsi ka la sogs par rab tu 'gyur te me bdag 'dus pa rmugs byed sogs //
analyzed: ba rnams // gnas ni sgrol ma la sogs khyim ste gsal bar sgra yi rdo rje la sogs de bzhin zhing du brjod // tshando ha ni tsa rtsi ka la sogs par rab tu 'gyur te me bdag 'dus pa rmugs byed sogs //
translated: The abodes are the houses of Tara and so forth, and the sound-vajra and so forth are clearly said to be the fields.üîΩThe chandi is the abode of Cauris and so forth, and the assembly of the lords of fire is the charnel ground.

original: dud khrod kyi gdong ma la sogs pa mchog gi sar gnas rtsa ba'i gnas dang gsang bar bcas pa ni //
analyzed: dud khrod kyi gdong ma la sogs pa mchog gi sar gnas rtsa ba'i gnas dang gsang bar bcas pa ni //
translated: The cremation grounds of Sosadini and so forth are the supreme stage, the root abode together with the secret.

original: yum gyi khyim rnams gnyis te de deg rab tu gsal bar sa la mthar skyes ma dang mthar skyes ma //
analyzed: yum gyi khyim rnams gnyis te de deg rab tu gsal bar sa la mthar skyes ma dang mthar skyes ma //
translated: The two houses of the mother are the two, and they are clearly the Sosadini and the Sosadini.

original: gnas ni bud med gsang ba'i padmar rab 'gyur dam tshig dag la rdo rje nyid ni nye ba'i gnas //
analyzed: gnas ni bud med gsang ba'i padmar rab 'gyur dam tshig dag la rdo rje nyid ni nye ba'i gnas //
translated: The abode is the lotus of the secret of the woman, and the vajra is the nearby abode in the commitments.

original: zhing dang tshando ha dang 'dus pa dag dang dur khrod sa gzhi de bzhin de ltar mtha' dag go /
analyzed: zhing dang tshando ha dang 'dus pa dag dang dur khrod sa gzhi de bzhin de ltar mtha' dag go /
translated: The field, the chandi, the assembly, and the charnel ground are the ground, and likewise, all of them.

original: gnas ni g-yon gyi yan lag dag dang mdun te gzhan dang de bzhin g-yas pa dag kyang nye ba'i gnas //
analyzed: gnas ni g-yon gyi yan lag dag dang mdun te gzhan dang de bzhin g-yas pa dag kyang nye ba'i gnas //
translated: The abode is the left limb and the front, and the other and likewise the right are the nearby abode.

original: de ltar zhing la sogs pa thams cad lag pa rkang pa la gnas sor mo'i mtha' yi mtshams su'o //
analyzed: de ltar zhing la sogs pa thams cad lag pa rkang pa la gnas sor mo'i mtha' yi mtshams su'o //
translated: In this way, the field and so forth are located in the hands and feet, up to the tips of the fingers and toes.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang lha mo chu gter du 'gyur dus kyi 'khor lor rab tu grags //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang lha mo chu gter du 'gyur dus kyi 'khor lor rab tu grags //
translated: The applications of mindfulness are the goddesses VƒÅriyoginƒ´, etc., well known as the KƒÅlacakra.

original: shes rab byang chub yan lag yum ste gzhan ba dag kyang sgra yi rdo rje ma la sogs pa drug /
analyzed: shes rab byang chub yan lag yum ste gzhan ba dag kyang sgra yi rdo rje ma la sogs pa drug /
translated: Wisdom is the mother of the limbs of enlightenment, and the others are the six, ≈öabdavajrƒÅ, etc.

original: chu gcan yang dag spong ba rnams dang gzhan pa chu gter rdzu 'phrul rkang pa rnams te brgyad du 'gyur //
analyzed: chu gcan yang dag spong ba rnams dang gzhan pa chu gter rdzu 'phrul rkang pa rnams te brgyad du 'gyur //
translated: The perfect abandonments are the rƒÅk·π£asas, and the others, the ocean, are the eight bases of miraculous action.

original: khro bo lnga ni stobs rnams dag ste rab tu gsal zhing nges par dbang po rnams ni lnga nyid do //
analyzed: khro bo lnga ni stobs rnams dag ste rab tu gsal zhing nges par dbang po rnams ni lnga nyid do //
translated: The five wrathful ones are the powers, and the very clear ones are definitely the five faculties.

original: yang dag yan lag brgyad kyi lam ni mi yi bdag po lha min dag las skyes pa brgyad du 'gyur /
analyzed: yang dag yan lag brgyad kyi lam ni mi yi bdag po lha min dag las skyes pa brgyad du 'gyur /
translated: The eight branches of the path of the noble ones are the eight lords of the demigods.

original: @106b sum cu rtsa bdun rab tu dbye bas srid pa gsum gyi gnas su byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams te //
analyzed: @106b sum cu rtsa bdun rab tu dbye bas srid pa gsum gyi gnas su byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams te //
translated: The thirty-seven factors of enlightenment are in the abodes of the three existences, divided into thirty-seven.

original: de dag mtha' dag rnal 'byor ma rnams sa yi steng gi gnas su rnal 'byor ba yis rig par bya; ;de ltar gnas la sogs pa thams cad mi yi bdag po phyi dang lus la yang ni de bzhin 'gyur //
analyzed: de dag mtha' dag rnal 'byor ma rnams sa yi steng gi gnas su rnal 'byor ba yis rig par bya; ;de ltar gnas la sogs pa thams cad mi yi bdag po phyi dang lus la yang ni de bzhin 'gyur //
translated: In this way, all the places and so forth are also the same for the lord of men externally and internally.

original: sangs rgyas pa dang zhib pa'am gcer bu skal ldan zhes dang de bzhin gtsang gnas bram ze'am //
analyzed: sangs rgyas pa dang zhib pa'am gcer bu skal ldan zhes dang de bzhin gtsang gnas bram ze'am //
translated: The one who is enlightened, the one who is subtle, the naked one, the fortunate one, and likewise the pure one, the brahmin,üîΩthe one with a skull, the one who shaves the hair, the one with white clothes, the one of the class of field protectors, the sage,

original: thod pa can dang skra 'bal dang ni gos dkar dag dang zhing skyong rigs can dang ni thub pa dang // smyon pa'i gzugs can dag dang sdig pa med pa'i sems ldan mkhas pa dang ni grags ba nyid 'gyur te //
analyzed: thod pa can dang skra 'bal dang ni gos dkar dag dang zhing skyong rigs can dang ni thub pa dang // smyon pa'i gzugs can dag dang sdig pa med pa'i sems ldan mkhas pa dang ni grags ba nyid 'gyur te //
translated: the one with the form of a madman, the one with a sinless mind, the wise one, and the famous one‚Äî

original: rnal 'byor ba ni dngos grub don slad mtha' dag yon tan gter na dee nyid thob pa mi yi dbang //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ba ni dngos grub don slad mtha' dag yon tan gter na dee nyid thob pa mi yi dbang //
translated: the yogin, the lord of men, who is a treasure of all good qualities for the sake of accomplishment, attains just that.

original: mthe bong dag ni mdzub mo dag dang slar yang de bzhin du ni gung mo dang ni ming med dang // de yi mthar ni nges par mthe'u chung mtha' dag yon tan gter du rnal 'byor ba yis rig par bya //
analyzed: mthe bong dag ni mdzub mo dag dang slar yang de bzhin du ni gung mo dang ni ming med dang // de yi mthar ni nges par mthe'u chung mtha' dag yon tan gter du rnal 'byor ba yis rig par bya //
translated: and at the end of it is the little finger‚Äîthe yogin should know all of them as the treasure of qualities.

original: phyag rgya'i don du ming gi dbye bar 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis sor mo rnams kyi rim pas so //
analyzed: phyag rgya'i don du ming gi dbye bar 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis sor mo rnams kyi rim pas so //
translated: The names are distinguished for the sake of the mudrƒÅ, by the order of the fingers according to their qualities.

original: bcing ba brjod na rdo rje bcing bar 'gyur te nges par khu tshur bcing ba la yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: bcing ba brjod na rdo rje bcing bar 'gyur te nges par khu tshur bcing ba la yang de bzhin no //
translated: When the binding is mentioned, it is the vajra binding, and likewise the binding of the fists.

original: khu tshur bral yi stang du rdo rje gdan la gnas pa rgyal bzhi bdag po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgyar 'gyur //
analyzed: khu tshur bral yi stang du rdo rje gdan la gnas pa rgyal bzhi bdag po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgyar 'gyur //
translated: The vajra fist is the vajra of the lord of the victors, abiding on the vajra seat, free from the fist.

original: skyil krung la ni lag pa g-yon bar 'gyur te g-yas pa pus mo'i phyogs nas sa la son gyur pa //
analyzed: skyil krung la ni lag pa g-yon bar 'gyur te g-yas pa pus mo'i phyogs nas sa la son gyur pa //
translated: The left hand is in the lap, and the right hand touches the ground at the knee.

original: sa la reg pa mi bskyod phyag rgya slar yang lag pa g-yas @107a *//
analyzed: sa la reg pa mi bskyod phyag rgya slar yang lag pa g-yas @107a *//
translated: The earth-touching mudrƒÅ of Ak·π£obhya, and again the right hand

original: pa mchog sbyin phyag na rin chen gyis //
analyzed: pa mchog sbyin phyag na rin chen gyis //
translated: in the boon-granting mudrƒÅ is the jewel of Ratnasa·πÉbhava.

original: g-yon gyi steng du lag pa g-yas pa gan rkyal mnyam par gnas pa phyag na padma dag gir 'gyur //
analyzed: g-yon gyi steng du lag pa g-yas pa gan rkyal mnyam par gnas pa phyag na padma dag gir 'gyur //
translated: The right hand, lying on the left, is in the gesture of equanimity, holding a lotus.üîΩThe left hand is in the gesture of meditation, with the palm turned outward, holding a sword.

original: g-yon pa skyil krung stong du gzhan pa lag pa'i mthil ni 'jigs pa med pa phyag na ral gri yi //üîΩg-yas kyi khu tshur g-yas min la ste nges par slar yang gzhan gyi mdzub mo khu tshur bcings pa la //
analyzed: g-yon pa skyil krung stong du gzhan pa lag pa'i mthil ni 'jigs pa med pa phyag na ral gri yi // g-yas kyi khu tshur g-yas min la ste nges par slar yang gzhan gyi mdzub mo khu tshur bcings pa la //
translated: The right fist is on the right side, and the left forefinger is in the fist.

original: gsal bar snying khar son pa rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya gzhan pa chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ni //
analyzed: gsal bar snying khar son pa rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya gzhan pa chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ni //
translated: The clear gesture of Vairocana is placed on the heart; the other is the gesture of the Dharma wheel.

original: mdzub mo mthe bong sbyar ba gdu bu bzhin du gyur ba dang ni gud mo la sogs brkyang ba'o //üîΩlag pa g-yon la shin tu gang ba'i dri med ri bong 'dzin pa g-yas la rdo rje nyi ma ste //
analyzed: mdzub mo mthe bong sbyar ba gdu bu bzhin du gyur ba dang ni gud mo la sogs brkyang ba'o // lag pa g-yon la shin tu gang ba'i dri med ri bong 'dzin pa g-yas la rdo rje nyi ma ste //
translated: The forefinger and thumb are joined like a ring, and the middle finger, etc., are extended.üîΩThe left hand holds the full moon, the right hand the sun.

original: nyi ma zla ba sbyar ba la gnas 'jigs byed rdo rje khro bo las skyes rtsa mo lnga pa ni //
analyzed: nyi ma zla ba sbyar ba la gnas 'jigs byed rdo rje khro bo las skyes rtsa mo lnga pa ni //
translated: The sun and moon are joined, and the five-crested Vajra Heruka is born from the wrathful Vajra.

original: bsgoms nas yan lag la ni reg bya cod pan dang bcas mgo nas brtsams te rkang ba'i mtha' nyid du'o //
analyzed: bsgoms nas yan lag la ni reg bya cod pan dang bcas mgo nas brtsams te rkang ba'i mtha' nyid du'o //
translated: Having meditated, one should touch the limbs, beginning with the head and ending with the feet, with the crown of the head.

original: 'di ni rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i dpal ldan mchog gi phyag rgya sdig pa'i dri ma 'phrog pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i dpal ldan mchog gi phyag rgya sdig pa'i dri ma 'phrog pa'o //
translated: This is the glorious supreme seal of the king KƒÅlacakra, which removes the stains of sin.

original: gang zhig cung zad gzung bar bya ba'i dngos po sa skyes chu skyes mngal skyes drod gsher skyes sogs dang // bza' ba btung ba brtson 'grus dang bcas bla ma dang ni zhabs dag la yang phyag rgyas reg par bya //
analyzed: gang zhig cung zad gzung bar bya ba'i dngos po sa skyes chu skyes mngal skyes drod gsher skyes sogs dang // bza' ba btung ba brtson 'grus dang bcas bla ma dang ni zhabs dag la yang phyag rgyas reg par bya //
translated: Whatever things are to be grasped, such as those born from earth, water, wombs, heat, and moisture, and so forth, and food and drink, together with effort, one should touch with the seal the feet and the guru.

original: gang gang bya ba nye bar sbyar bar 'gyur ba yon tan dbang gis de la de ni sbyar bar bya //
analyzed: gang gang bya ba nye bar sbyar bar 'gyur ba yon tan dbang gis de la de ni sbyar bar bya //
translated: Whatever is to be done, one should apply it to that, by the power of the qualities.

original: sa la sogs la dkyil 'khor don dang rkang pa bgrod pa la yang rnal 'byor pa yis bsnun par bya //
analyzed: sa la sogs la dkyil 'khor don dang rkang pa bgrod pa la yang rnal 'byor pa yis bsnun par bya //
translated: The yogƒ´ should strike the ma·πá·∏çala on the earth, and so forth, and also the feet when walking.

original: lag pa dag gis rdo rje bcings @107b ba yis ni nges par khro bo'i mgon po chen po'i phyag rgyar 'gyur //
analyzed: lag pa dag gis rdo rje bcings @107b ba yis ni nges par khro bo'i mgon po chen po'i phyag rgyar 'gyur //
translated: By the gesture of the vajra with the hands, one will certainly become the seal of the great lord of wrath.

original: mdzub mo thog mtha' bcings shing khu tshur bcings pas gtso bo srid pa gsum las rnam par rgyal ba yi //
analyzed: mdzub mo thog mtha' bcings shing khu tshur bcings pas gtso bo srid pa gsum las rnam par rgyal ba yi //
translated: The fingers are bound at the beginning and end, and the fists are bound, of the principal one, the Conqueror in the Three Existences.

original: mtshan ma'i rnams pa dag kyang lhag ma rnams te rab gsal nges par lha dang lha mo rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma'i rnams pa dag kyang lhag ma rnams te rab gsal nges par lha dang lha mo rnams kyi'o //
translated: The remaining parts of the signs are those of the gods and goddesses, clearly defined.
